PO:0004524.definition: A portion of secondary phloem tissue produced by included vascular cambium.
PO:0004524.label: included phloem

PO:0004525.synonyms: wood parenchyma cell (exact);c&#233lula parenquim&#225tica de la madera (Spanish;exact);\u4e8c\u6b21\u6728\u90e8\u67d4\u7d44\u7e54\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0004525.definition: A parenchyma cell (PO:0000074) that is part of a portion of secondary xylem parenchyma (PO:0004532).
PO:0004525.label: secondary xylem parenchyma cell

PO:0004526.synonyms: \u8ef8\u65b9\u5411\u4e8c\u6b21\u6728\u90e8\u67d4\u7d44\u7e54\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula parenquim&#225tica axial de la madera (Spanish;exact);axial wood parenchyma cell (exact)
PO:0004526.definition: A secondary xylem parenchyma cell (PO:0004525) that is part of a portion of axial secondary xylem parenchyma (PO:0004533).
PO:0004526.label: axial secondary xylem parenchyma cell

PO:0004527.synonyms: \u653e\u5c04\u72b6\u4e8c\u6b21\u6728\u90e8\u67d4\u7d44\u7e54\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);ray wood parenchyma cell (exact);c&#233lula parenquim&#225tica de rayo de la madera (Spanish;exact)
PO:0004527.definition: A parenchyma cell (PO:0000074) that develops from a ray initial (PO:0000082) and is part of a portion of ray secondary xylem parenchyma (PO:0004534).
PO:0004527.label: ray secondary xylem parenchyma cell

PO:0025009.synonyms: \u8449\u8eab\u7e01 (Japanese;exact);margen de la l&#225mina de la hoja (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025009.definition: A leaf margin (PO:0020128) that is part of a leaf lamina (PO:0020039).
PO:0025009.label: leaf lamina margin

PO:0025550.definition: A plant structure (PO:0009011) that is the apical most portion of a trichome (PO:0000282).
PO:0025550.label: trichome apex

PO:0030113.definition: A pedicel (PO:0030112) that bears a flower (PO:0009046).
PO:0030113.label: flower pedicel

PO:0025551.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the apical most portion of a multicellular trichome (PO:0025162).
PO:0025551.label: multicellular trichome apex

PO:0009017.definition: A pulvinus (PO:0009000) of an inflorescence branch (PO:0009081).
PO:0009017.label: inflorescence branch pulvinus

PO:0030131.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a sympodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of determinate inflorescence axes (PO:0020122) that bear pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) in a single plane, with the latest-developing flowers on the highest order inflorescence axis which is found at the center of the inflorescence.
PO:0030131.label: rhipidium inflorescence

PO:0009015.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that has as part one or more tracheary elements (PO:0000290) or sieve elements (PO:0025406).
PO:0009015.label: portion of vascular tissue

PO:0030133.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with sympodial and monopodial growth habits, which at anthesis is composed of determinate inflorescence axes (PO:0020122) with pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046), with the latest-developing flowers on the highest order inflorescence axes of the second order inflorescences (PO:0025240).
PO:0030133.label: compound cincinnus inflorescence

PO:0009013.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) in which plant cells (PO:0009002) have retained their embryonic characteristics, or have reverted to them secondarily, and that divide to produce new cells that can undergo differentiation to form mature tissues, i.e. they have a capacity for morphogenesis and growth.
PO:0009013.label: portion of meristem tissue

PO:0030135.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a sympodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) on determinate inflorescence axes (PO:0020122), each of which develops at progressively more acute (PATO:0000389) angles from each higher inflorescence axis (PO:0009081).
PO:0030135.label: drepanium inflorescence

PO:0030136.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with both sympodial and monopodial growth habits, which at anthesis is composed of pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) on determinate inflorescence axes (PO:0020122), each of which develops at progressively more acute (PATO:0000389) angles from each higher inflorescence axis (PO:0009081).
PO:0030136.label: compound drepanium inflorescence

PO:0000284.definition: An epidermal cell associated with a stoma and at least morphologically distinguishable from the other epidermal cells.
PO:0000284.label: subsidiary cell

PO:0008010.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the adaxial/upper portion of the nucellus (PO:0020020) overlying vascular strands in a caryopsis fruit (PO:0030104).
PO:0008010.label: adaxial nucellar projection

PO:0008011.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009) .
PO:0008011.label: plant embryo vascular system

PO:0008012.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a stigma (PO:0009073).
PO:0008012.label: stigma vascular system

PO:0008013.definition: A phyllome vascular system (PO:0025206) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in an anther (PO:0009066).
PO:0008013.label: anther vascular system

PO:0008014.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue (PO:0009015) in their specific arrangement in a filament (PO:0009067).
PO:0008014.label: filament vascular system

PO:0008015.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that is part of a hypocotyl (PO:0020100).
PO:0008015.label: hypocotyl vascular system

PO:0008016.definition: A shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148) that gives rise to the apical growth of vegetative tissues and organs.
PO:0008016.label: vegetative shoot apical meristem

PO:0009018.synonyms: c&#233lula de transferencia del endosperma basal (Spanish;exact);\u57fa\u5e95\u80da\u4e73\u8ee2\u9001\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0009018.definition: A transfer cell that is part of a basal endosperm transfer layer.
PO:0009018.label: basal endosperm transfer cell

PO:0004003.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) centrifugally derived from cork cambium (PO:0005599), non-living at maturity, and having suberized walls.
PO:0004003.label: phellem

PO:0005598.definition: A cambium (PO:0005597) that is located between and gives rise to secondary xylem (PO:0005848) and secondary phloem (PO:0005043).
PO:0005598.label: vascular cambium

PO:0005599.definition: A cambium (PO:0005597) that is part of a periderm (PO:0005046) and produces phellem (PO:0004003) and phelloderm (PO:0005050).
PO:0005599.label: cork cambium

PO:0005597.definition: A lateral meristem (PO:0020145) that has as part a single layer of cambial initial cells (PO:0000295) and their derivatives, arranged orderly in radial files.
PO:0005597.label: cambium

PO:0025323.definition: A reproductive shoot system (PO:0025082) that is a second order inflorescence (PO:0025240), or higher, in which the inflorescence branch (PO:0009081) bears two or more flowers (PO:0009046), but is not elongated.
PO:0025323.label: flower fascicle

PO:0025322.definition: A plant anatomical space that is an opening in a hydathode.
PO:0025322.label: hydathode pore

PO:0025448.synonyms: elemento vaso del xilema primario (Spanish;exact);\u4e00\u6b21\u6728\u8cea\u90e8\u5c0e\u7ba1\u72b6\u8981\u7d20 (Japanese;exact);primary xylem vessel element (exact)
PO:0025448.definition: A xylem vessel member (PO:0002003) that is part of a primary xylem tissue (PO:0005849).
PO:0025448.label: primary xylem vessel member

PO:0025449.definition: A xylem vessel member (PO:0002003) that is part of a portion of secondary xylem tissue (PO:0005848).
PO:0025449.label: secondary xylem vessel member

PO:0025013.definition: A phyllome margin (PO:0025018) that is part of a prophyll (PO:0009042).
PO:0025013.label: prophyll margin

PO:0025326.definition: A petal (PO:0009032) that is one of the two lowest petals of a papilionaceous corolla (PO:0025324).
PO:0025326.label: keel petal

PO:0025325.definition: One of two lateral petals (PO:0009032) that is adjacent to the banner petal of a papilionaceous corolla (PO:0009059).
PO:0025325.label: wing petal

PO:0025324.definition: A petal (PO:0009032) that is the top-most petal of a papilionaceous corolla (PO:0009059).
PO:0025324.label: banner petal

PO:0020122.definition: A shoot axis (PO:0025029) that is part of an inflorescence (PO:0009049).
PO:0020122.label: inflorescence axis

PO:0020123.definition: A portion of root parenchyma (PO:0025095) tissue that is part of the root tip (PO:0000025) and covers the root apical meristem (PO:0020147).
PO:0020123.label: root cap

PO:0030099.definition: A fruit (PO:0009001) which develops from a carpel (PO:0009030) and at maturity comprises a dry exocarp (PO:0009085), dry mesocarp (PO:0009087), and dry endocarp (PO:0009086) that are elongated into a wing-like structure.
PO:0030099.label: samara fruit

PO:0030098.definition: A fruit (PO:0009001) which develops from a gynoecium (PO:0009062) and at maturity comprises a dry exocarp (PO:0009085), dry mesocarp (PO:0009087), and dry endocarp (PO:0009086) that separate into mericarps (PO:0020075).
PO:0030098.label: schizocarp fruit

PO:0025446.definition: A tracheid (PO:0000301) that is part of a xylem tissue (PO:0005849).
PO:0025446.label: primary xylem tracheid

PO:0025447.definition: A tracheid PO:0000301 that is part of a portion of secondary xylem tissue (PO:0005848).
PO:0025447.label: secondary xylem tracheid

PO:0025444.synonyms: elemento de tr&#225quea del xilema primario (Spanish;exact);\u4e00\u6b21\u6728\u8cea\u90e8\u5c0e\u7ba1\u8981\u7d20 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025444.definition: A tracheary element (PO:0000290) that is part of a primary xylem tissue (PO:0005849).
PO:0025444.label: primary xylem tracheary element

PO:0025445.synonyms: elemento de tr&#225quea del xilema secundario (Spanish;exact);\u4e8c\u6b21\u6728\u8cea\u90e8\u4eee\u5c0e\u7ba1\u8981\u7d20 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025445.definition: A tracheary element (PO:0000290) that is part of a portion of secondary xylem tissue (PO:0005848).
PO:0025445.label: secondary xylem tracheary element

PO:0025132.definition: A plant anatomical space (PO:0025117) that is either a groove on the surface, or a tube in the interior of a plant structure (PO:0009011).
PO:0025132.label: canal

PO:0000207.definition: A portion of shoot system epidermis (PO:0006035) that is part of a nectary (PO:0009035) .
PO:0000207.label: nectary epidermis

PO:0000201.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the part of the endosperm (PO:0009089) nearest the chalazal region of the plant ovule (PO:0020003) and forming a cyst-like structure.
PO:0000201.label: chalazal cyst

PO:0000200.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the region of the endosperm closest to the micropyle of the seed.
PO:0000200.label: micropylar endosperm

PO:0005059.definition: A portion of endodermis that is part of a root cortex.
PO:0005059.label: root endodermis

PO:0005058.synonyms: endodermis de eje del epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact);\u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u8ef8\u5185\u80da\u8449 (Japanese;exact);branch endodermis (narrow);stem endodermis (narrow)
PO:0005058.definition: A portion of endodermis (PO:0000252) that is part of a shoot axis cortex (PO:0000223).
PO:0005058.label: shoot axis endodermis

PO:0005057.synonyms: hipodermis del eje del epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact);\u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u8ef8\u771f\u76ae (Japanese;exact);branch hypodermis (narrow)
PO:0005057.definition: A portion of shoot axis hypodermis (PO:0005057) that is part of a stem cortex (PO:0000223).
PO:0005057.label: shoot axis hypodermis

PO:0005052.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that consists of mass of undifferentiated plant cells (PO:0009002).
PO:0005052.label: plant callus

PO:0005051.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) that is the outermost layer of a portion of cortex (PO:0005708).
PO:0005051.label: hypodermis

PO:0005050.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) often resembling cortical parenchyma produced centripetally by the cork cambium.
PO:0005050.label: phelloderm

PO:0030077.synonyms: rama lateral inicial del rizoide proton&#233mico (Spanish;exact);\u539f\u7cf8\u4f53\u5074\u679d\u4eee\u6839\u59cb\u539f\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);protonemal side branch rhizoid initial (exact);protonema side branch rhizoid initial (exact)
PO:0030077.definition: A protonema side branch initial that gives rise to a protonemal rhizoid.
PO:0030077.label: protonemal side branch rhizoid initial cell

PO:0025252.synonyms: sixth order infructescence branch (exact);eje de s\xe9ptimo orden de la infructescencia (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025252.definition: A higher order infructescence axis (PO:0025243) which arises from a sixth order infructescence axis (PO:0025116) and develops from a seventh order inflorescence axis (PO:0025108).
PO:0025252.label: seventh order infructescence axis

PO:0020035.definition: The first stem internode (PO:0020142) above the cotyledonary node (PO:0025321) of a plant embryo (PO:0009009) or a seedling (PO:0000003).
PO:0020035.label: epicotyl

PO:0025070.synonyms: \u5730\u4e0b\u584a\u830e\u814b\u82bd \u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);meristema axilar de yema de tub&#233rculo subterr&#225neo (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025070.definition: A tuber axillary bud meristem that is part of a subterranean tuber.
PO:0025070.label: subterranean tuber axillary bud meristem

PO:0025221.synonyms: \u82b1\u88ab\u7247\u6c17\u5b54\u88c5\u7f6e (Japanese;exact);complejo estom&#225tico del t&#233palo (Spanish;exact);tepal epidermal stomatal complex (exact);tepal epidermis stomatal complex (exact)
PO:0025221.definition: A phyllome stomatal complex that is part of a tepal (PO:0009033).
PO:0025221.label: tepal stomatal complex

PO:0020001.synonyms: placenta de ovario (Spanish;exact);\u5b50\u623f\u80ce\u5ea7 (Japanese;exact);Zea ovary placenta (narrow);Poaceae ovary placenta (narrow)
PO:0020001.definition: A portion of placenta tissue (PO:0025078) which is part of a plant ovary (PO:0009072), and to which plant ovary ovules (PO:0025490) are attached.
PO:0020001.label: plant ovary placenta

PO:0025191.synonyms: \u8449\u5411\u8ef8\u5074\u6c17\u5b54\u88c5\u7f6e (Japanese;exact);leaf adaxial epidermal stomatal complex (exact);complejo estom&#225tico de la superficie adaxial de la hoja (Spanish;exact);leaf adaxial epidermis stomatal complex (exact)
PO:0025191.definition: A leaf stomatal complex that is part of a leaf adaxial epidermis.
PO:0025191.label: leaf adaxial stomatal complex

PO:0025520.synonyms: \u8449\u8eab\u8fba\u7e01\u8449\u8108 (Japanese;exact);vena intramarginal de la l\xe1mina de la hoja (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025520.definition: A leaf lamina vein (PO:0020138) that is just inside the leaf lamina margin (PO:0025009) and extends from the leaf lamina base (PO:0008019) to the leaf apex (PO:0020137).
PO:0025520.label: leaf lamina intramarginal vein

PO:0025523.definition: A root (PO:0009005) that is radially enlarged relative to other lateral roots (PO:0020121) or shoot-borne roots (PO:0000042) on the same plant, but not as enlarged as a tuberous root tuber (PO:0025476).
PO:0025523.label: tuberous root

PO:0008042.synonyms: zona de diferenciaci&#243n del internodo del tallo (Spanish;exact);\u830e\u7bc0\u9593\u5206\u5316\u5e2f\uff08\u5c64\uff09  (Japanese;exact)
PO:0008042.definition: A shoot internode differentiation zone that is part of a stem internode.
PO:0008042.label: stem internode differentiation zone

PO:0019026.definition: A portion of xylem (PO:0005352) tissue that is a distinct ring-like structure composed of tracheids (PO:0000301), that is part of a seed (PO:0009010) and surrounds the hilum (PO:0020063) and forms a groove in the surface of the pericarp (PO:0009084) immediately adjacent to the hilum.
PO:0019026.label: tracheid bar

PO:0009110.definition: An inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009105) that gives rise to a higher order inflorescence axis (PO:0009081) of an ear inflorescence (PO:0020136).
PO:0009110.label: ear inflorescence axillary meristem

PO:0004538.definition: A root nodule characterized by a persistent meristem, presence of vascular transfer cells, and cell division in the inner cortex with non-dividing infected cells and bacteria.
PO:0004538.label: indeterminate nodule

PO:0019023.definition: An arilloid that is an outgrowth of a seed on a raphe.
PO:0019023.label: strophiole

PO:0025062.definition: A tuber perimedullary zone that is part of an aerial tuber pith.
PO:0025062.label: aerial tuber perimedullary zone

PO:0025015.definition: A phyllome margin (PO:0025018) that is part of a tepal (PO:0009033).
PO:0025015.label: tepal margin

PO:0025102.synonyms: \u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u7bc0\u9593\u5206\u5316\u5e2f(\u5c64)  (Japanese;exact);zona de diferenciaci&#243n del internodo del epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025102.definition: A plant axis differentiation zone that is part of a shoot axis.
PO:0025102.label: shoot internode differentiation zone

PO:0020036.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is a flap-like projection of the coleorhiza (PO:0020034), inserted opposite the scutellum (PO:0020110).
PO:0020036.label: epiblast

PO:0025063.definition: A tuber perimedullary zone that is part of a subterranean tuber pith.
PO:0025063.label: subterranean tuber perimedullary zone

PO:0004536.definition: A fruit pedicel (PO:0030114) that bears a fruit (PO:0009001) in an infructescence (PO:0006342).
PO:0004536.label: infructescence fruit pedicel

PO:0025064.synonyms: \u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u8ef8\u9ac4\u51a0 (Japanese;exact);zona perimedular de eje del epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact);branch perimedullary zone (narrow);stem perimedullary zone (narrow)
PO:0025064.definition: A perimedullary zone (PO:0025058) that is part of a shoot axis pith (PO:0005041).
PO:0025064.label: shoot axis perimedullary zone

PO:0008048.synonyms: portion of scutellar epithelium (exact);\u80da\u76e4\u4e0a\u76ae\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);scutellum epithelium (exact);epitelio escutelar (Spanish;exact)
PO:0008048.definition: A continuous layer of cylindrical cells covering the endosperm side of the scutellum. Thought to act as a secretory and absorptive organ.
PO:0008048.label: scutellar epithelium

PO:0025138.synonyms: \u8907\u6570\u306e\u878d\u5408\u82b1\u88ab\u7247\u69cb\u9020 (Japanese;exact);estrutura colectiva de t&#233palo fusionado (Spanish;exact);connate tepal structure (exact);syntepalous perianth (exact)
PO:0025138.definition: A collective tepal structure (PO:0025021) in which there are at least two fused tepals (PO:0025137).
PO:0025138.label: fused collective tepal structure

PO:0006032.definition: An awn that is part of a lemma.
PO:0006032.label: lemma awn

PO:0006438.synonyms: gluma inferior de la espiguilla s&#233sil de la espiga (Spanish;exact);\u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u7121\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u7b2c\u4e00\u82de\u9834(first glume) (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006438.definition: A lower glume of ear spikelet that is part of an ear sessile spikelet.
PO:0006438.label: lower glume of sessile spikelet of ear

PO:0006439.synonyms: \u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u6709\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u7b2c\u4e8c\u82de\u9834(second glume) (Japanese;exact);gluma superior de la espiguilla pedicelada de la espiga (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006439.definition: An upper glume of ear spikelet that is part of an ear pedicellate spikelet.
PO:0006439.label: upper glume of pedicellate spikelet of ear

PO:0025623.definition: A first order infructescence axis (PO:0025244) in an ear infructescence (PO:0025597) that bears kernels (i.e. caryopsis fruit; PO:0030104).
PO:0025623.label: ear infructescence axis

PO:0025139.definition: The apical portion of a phyllome.
PO:0025139.label: phyllome apex

PO:0025281.definition: A microgametophyte (PO:0025280) that develops from a microspore (PO:0020048) is located in a pollen sac (PO:0025277).
PO:0025281.label: pollen

PO:0000332.definition: A shoot epidermal cell that is relatively unspecialized at maturity.
PO:0000332.label: epidermal pavement cell

PO:0006435.synonyms: \u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u6709\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u5c0f\u8ef8 (Japanese;exact);raquilla de la espiguilla pedicelada de la espiga (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006435.definition: The axis of the ear pedicellate spikelet, above the glumes.
PO:0006435.label: rachilla of pedicellate spikelet of ear

PO:0006436.synonyms: \u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u7121\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u5c0f\u8ef8 (Japanese;exact);raquilla de la espiguilla s&#233sil de la espiga (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006436.definition: The axis of the ear sessile spikelet, above the glumes.
PO:0006436.label: rachilla of sessile spikelet of ear

PO:0006437.synonyms: \u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u6709\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u7b2c\u4e00\u82de\u9834(first glume) (Japanese;exact);gluma inferior de la espiguilla pedicelada de la espiga (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006437.definition: A lower glume of ear spikelet that is part of an ear pedicellate spikelet.
PO:0006437.label: lower glume of pedicellate spikelet of ear

PO:0006001.definition: A lateral plant organ (PO:0009008) produced by a shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148).
PO:0006001.label: phyllome

PO:0006000.definition: A collective phyllome structure that encloses a fruit of the Poaceae (caryopsis) and develops from a dried lemma and palea.
PO:0006000.label: caryopsis hull

PO:0006003.definition: A phyllome that is reduced in size relative to a vascular leaf on the same plant and is often associated with a perennating or dormant bud or a vegetatively propagating organ such as a rhizome.
PO:0006003.label: scale leaf

PO:0006002.definition: A glume that is the proximal/basal of the two glumes subtending a pair of florets.
PO:0006002.label: lower glume

PO:0006348.definition: Ultimate pedicellate inflorescence branch of the maize ear that develops from the spikelet pair meristem.
PO:0006348.label: ear pedicellate spikelet

PO:0006004.definition: A glume that is the apical/distal of the two glumes subtending a pair of florets.
PO:0006004.label: upper glume

PO:0006007.synonyms: capa secundaria de c&#233lulas parietales (Spanish;exact);pollen sac secondary parietal cell layer (exact);\u846f\u58c1\u4e8c\u6b21\u5074\u819c\u7d30\u80de\u5c64\u3001\u58c1\u7d30\u80de\u5c64 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006007.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) that is part of an anther wall (PO:0000002) and develops from an anther wall primary parietal cell layer (PO:0006006).
PO:0006007.label: anther wall secondary parietal cell layer

PO:0006006.synonyms: pollen sac primary parietal cell layer (exact);capa primaria de c&#233lulas parietales (Spanish;exact);\u846f\u58c1\u4e00\u6b21\u5074\u819c\u7d30\u80de\u5c64\u3001\u58c1\u7d30\u80de\u5c64 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006006.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) that is part of an anther wall (PO:0000002) and has as parts a primary parietal cell (PO:0006010) and adjacent plant cells.
PO:0006006.label: anther wall primary parietal cell layer

PO:0006009.synonyms: capa externa secundaria de c&#233lulas parietales (Spanish;exact);\u846f\u58c1\u5916\u4e8c\u6b21\u5074\u819c\u7d30\u80de\u5c64\u3001\u58c1\u7d30\u80de\u5c64 (Japanese;exact);pollen sac outer secondary parietal cell layer (exact)
PO:0006009.definition: An anther wall secondary parietal cell layer (PO:0006007) formed towards the outside, after an anther wall primary parietal cell layer (An anther wall secondary parietal cell layer (PO:0006006) undergoes a periclinal division.
PO:0006009.label: anther wall outer secondary parietal cell layer

PO:0006008.synonyms: capa interna secundaria de c&#233lulas parietales (Spanish;exact);\u846f\u58c1\u5185\u4e8c\u6b21\u5074\u819c\u7d30\u80de\u5c64 (Japanese;exact);pollen sac inner secondary parietal cell layer (exact)
PO:0006008.definition: An anther wall secondary parietal cell layer (PO:0006007) that is formed towards the inside, after the cells of an anther wall primary parietal cell layer (PO:0006006) undergo a periclinal division.
PO:0006008.label: anther wall inner secondary parietal cell layer

PO:0005020.definition: A portion of vascular tissue (PO:0009015) that is a unit strand of the vascular system (PO:0000034) and has as part xylem (PO:0005352) or phloem (PO:0005417).
PO:0005020.label: vascular bundle

PO:0005021.definition: A phyllome margin (PO:0025018) which is part of a sepal (PO:0009031).
PO:0005021.label: sepal margin

PO:0005026.definition: Multinucleate cell developed by a series of events involving kayokinesis but not cytokinesis of the initial feeding cell. The events are induced by root knot nematodes (e.g., Meloidogyne sp. ) entering the feeding cells (any cells) of the root vascular system.
PO:0005026.label: root giant cell

PO:0005027.definition: Multinucleate cell developed by a series of events involving fusion with the neighboring dividing cells. The events are induced by cyst nematodes (e.g. Heterodera schachtii) entering the feeding cells (any cells) of the root vascular system.
PO:0005027.label: root syncytium cell

PO:0005024.definition: A portion of ovary epidermis (PO:0006063) which is the inner surface of a plant ovary (PO:0009072).
PO:0005024.label: plant ovary adaxial epidermis

PO:0005025.synonyms: \u5b50\u623f\u58c1\u306e\u4e2d\u9593\u5c64 (Japanese;exact);middle layer of plant ovary wall (exact);capa media de la pared del ovario (Spanish;exact)
PO:0005025.definition: A portion of chlorenchyma tissue (PO:0005426) that is part of the plant ovary wall (PO:0005022) and is composed of mesophyll cells (PO:0004006).
PO:0005025.label: plant ovary wall middle layer

PO:0006346.definition: An intercalary meristem (PO:0006073) that is part of a leaf (PO:0006346) and is intercalated between two portions of non-meristematic tissue between a leaf apex (PO:0020137) and a leaf base (PO:0020040).
PO:0006346.label: leaf intercalary meristem

PO:0006347.definition: An intercalary meristem (PO:0006073) that is part of a stem internode (PO:0020142) and is intercalated between two portions of non-meristematic tissue.
PO:0006347.label: stem intercalary meristem

PO:0025215.synonyms: \u30d5\u30a3\u30ed\u30e0 \u6c17\u5b54\u88c5\u7f6e  (Japanese;exact);phyllome epidermis stomatal complex (exact);phyllome epidermal stomatal complex (exact);complejo estom&#225tico del filoma (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025215.definition: A stomatal complex (PO:0002000) that is part of a phyllome (PO:0006001).
PO:0025215.label: phyllome stomatal complex

PO:0025214.synonyms: \u8449\u5411\u8ef8\u5074\u88ab\u84cb\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula de pavimento de la superficie adaxial de la hoja (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025214.definition: A leaf pavement cell that is part of a leaf adaxial epidermis.
PO:0025214.label: leaf adaxial pavement cell

PO:0006342.definition: A reproductive shoot system (PO:0025082) that develops from an inflorescence (PO:0009049) and has as parts each infructescence axis (PO:0025242) and all of the fruits (PO:0009001) borne by those axes.
PO:0006342.label: infructescence

PO:0006343.definition: A shoot-borne shoot system (PO:0004545) that develops from an axillary bud (PO:0004709).
PO:0006343.label: axillary shoot system

PO:0025211.synonyms: \u8449\u5411\u8ef8\u5074\u6bdb\uff08\u6bdb\u8338\u3001\u7cf8\u72b6\u4f53\uff09 (Japanese;exact);tricoma de la superficie adaxial de la hoja (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025211.definition: A leaf trichome that is part of a leaf adaxial epidermis.
PO:0025211.label: leaf adaxial trichome

PO:0025210.synonyms: tricoma de la superficie abaxial de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u80cc\u8ef8\u5074\u6bdb\uff08\u6bdb\u8338\u3001\u7cf8\u72b6\u4f53\uff09 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025210.definition: A leaf trichome that is part of a leaf abaxial epidermis.
PO:0025210.label: leaf abaxial trichome

PO:0004713.definition: A bud that develops from a shoot apical meristem.
PO:0004713.label: terminal bud

PO:0004712.definition: An axillary bud (PO:0004712) that develops into a shoot system (PO:0009006) that has as organ parts only vegetative organs.
PO:0004712.label: axillary vegetative bud

PO:0004711.definition: An axillary reproductive bud that develops into an inflorescence.
PO:0004711.label: axillary inflorescence bud

PO:0004710.synonyms: yema de flor axilar (Spanish;exact);axillary floral bud (exact);\u814b\u82b1\u82bd (Japanese;exact)
PO:0004710.definition: An axillary bud that develops into a flower.
PO:0004710.label: axillary flower bud

PO:0004717.definition: A more or less rectangular leaf pavement cell in which the proximodistal dimension is several times longer than the transverse dimension.
PO:0004717.label: long cell

PO:0004716.definition: A terminal bud (PO:0004713) that develops into a shoot system (PO:0009006) that has as organ parts only vegetative organs.
PO:0004716.label: terminal vegetative bud

PO:0004715.definition: A terminal reproductive bud develops into an inflorescence.
PO:0004715.label: terminal inflorescence bud

PO:0025218.synonyms: \u82b1\u5f01\u6c17\u5b54\u88c5\u7f6e (Japanese;exact);complejo estom&#225tico del p&#233talo (Spanish;exact);petal epidermis stomatal complex (exact);petal epidermal stomatal complex (exact)
PO:0025218.definition: A phyllome stomatal complex (PO:0025215) that is part of a petal (PO:0009032).

PO:0025432.definition: A phyllome anlagen (PO:0025430) that will give rise to a cotyledon primordium (PO:0000015) and is part of a peripheral zone (PO:000225) of an embryo shoot apical meristem (PO:0006362).

PO:0030116.synonyms: double raceme (exact);compound raceme (exact);heterothetic compound raceme (narrow);homothetic double raceme (narrow);homothetic compound raceme (narrow);heterothetic double raceme (narrow)
PO:0030116.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of an indeterminate first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104) and pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) on indeterminate higher order inflorescence axes (PO:0009081).
PO:0030116.label: compound raceme inflorescence

PO:0006349.definition: Ultimate sessile inflorescence branch of the maize ear that develops from the spikelet pair meristem.
PO:0006349.label: ear sessile spikelet

PO:0030117.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of sessile (PATO:0001436) flowers (PO:0009046) on an indeterminate first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104).
PO:0030117.label: spike inflorescence

PO:0000115.definition: A shoot epidermal cell (PO:0025165) that surrounds a trichome (PO:0000282) and provides its support.
PO:0000115.label: socket cell

PO:0006222.definition: A laticifer cell (PO:0025031) that is not joined longitudinally to other laticifer cells to form a tube.
PO:0006222.label: non-articulated laticifer cell

PO:0025351.definition: An awn that is part of a glume.
PO:0025351.label: glume awn

PO:0025484.definition: A phyllome anlagen (PO:0025430) that will give rise to a petal primordium (PO:0000021) and is part of a peripheral zone (PO:000225) of a flower meristem (PO:0000229).
PO:0025484.label: petal anlagen

PO:0000112.synonyms: epidermis del eje del tallo (Spanish;exact);\u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u8ef8\u8868\u76ae (Japanese;exact);branch epidermis (narrow)
PO:0000112.definition: A portion of shoot system epidermis (PO:0006035) that is part of a shoot axis (PO:0025029).
PO:0000112.label: shoot axis epidermis

PO:0000054.definition: A phyllome vascular system (PO:0025206) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a petal (PO:0025218).
PO:0000054.label: petal vascular system

PO:0025358.definition: A small lateral root that grows from a prop root and has a mealy surface texture.
PO:0025358.label: pneumatorhiza

PO:0030115.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) on an indeterminate first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104).
PO:0030115.label: raceme inflorescence

PO:0000050.synonyms: epidermis adaxial de la l&#225mina de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u8eab\u5411\u8ef8\u5074\u8868\u76ae (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000050.definition: A portion of leaf lamina epidermis that covers the adaxial/upper surface of a leaf lamina.
PO:0000050.label: leaf lamina adaxial epidermis

PO:0000051.definition: A portion of leaf epidermis that is part of a petiole.
PO:0000051.label: petiole epidermis

PO:0000052.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a petiole (PO:0020038).
PO:0000052.label: petiole vascular system

PO:0000053.synonyms: \u8449\u67c4\u76ae\u5c64 (Japanese;exact);cortex (corteza) del pec&#237olo (Spanish;exact);portion of petiole corex tissue (exact)
PO:0000053.definition: A portion of cortex (PO:0005708) that is part of a petiole (PO:0020038).
PO:0000053.label: petiole cortex

PO:0020057.definition: That part of the seed coat that develops from the outer integument, or from the single integument when there is only one.
PO:0020057.label: testa

PO:0030112.definition: A shoot axis (PO:0025029) that bears only a flower (PO:0009046) or a fruit (PO:0009001).
PO:0030112.label: pedicel

PO:0025453.definition: A sieve element (PO:0025406) that is part of a portion of secondary phloem (PO:0005043).
PO:0025453.label: secondary phloem sieve element

PO:0000058.definition: A bud (PO:0000055) that develops into a vegetative shoot system (PO:0025607).
PO:0000058.label: vegetative bud

PO:0000059.definition: An initial cell that is part of a root apical meristem and by division gives rise to two cells, one of which remains in the meristem, while the other is produces different root cells.
PO:0000059.label: root initial cell

PO:0025483.definition: A phyllome anlagen (PO:0025430) that will give rise to a lodicule primordium (PO:0008040) and is part of a peripheral zone (PO:000225) of a flower meristem (PO:0000229).
PO:0025483.label: lodicule anlagen

PO:0020139.definition: A primary leaf vein (PO:0025413) that is the central vein of a vascular leaf (PO:0009025).
PO:0020139.label: leaf midvein

PO:0025261.definition: A ground tissue cell that is part of a portion of pericycle.
PO:0025261.label: pericycle cell

PO:0009033.definition: A phyllome (PO:0006001) that is part of a perianth (PO:0009058) where it is not possible to distinguish between the petals (PO:0009032) and sepals (PO:0009031).
PO:0009033.label: tepal

PO:0006504.definition: A phyllome trichome that is part of a leaf epidermis.
PO:0006504.label: leaf trichome

PO:0006505.synonyms: espiga central de la espiga de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact);\u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u4e2d\u592e\u306e\u7a42 (Japanese;exact);central axis of ear inflorescence (exact);ear inflorescence rachis (exact)
PO:0006505.definition: A first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104) that is the primary axis of an ear inflorescence (PO:0020136).
PO:0006505.label: first order ear inflorescence axis

PO:0025481.synonyms: primordio del fol&#237olo (Spanish;exact);\u5c0f\u8449\u539f\u57fa\uff08\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09 (Japanese;exact);portion of leaflet primordium tissue (exact);leaflet primordia (exact;plural)
PO:0025481.definition: A primordium (PO:0025127) that develops as part of a leaf primordium (PO:0000017) of a compound leaf (PO:0020043) and is committed to the development of a leaflet (PO:0020049).

PO:0025041.synonyms: yema vegetativa axilar de tub&#233rculo a&#233reo (Spanish;exact);\u3080\u304b\u3054\uff08\u73e0\u82bd\uff09\u814b\u679d\u82bd (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025041.definition: A tuber axillary vegetative bud that is part of an aerial tuber.
PO:0025041.label: aerial tuber axillary vegetative bud

PO:0006501.synonyms: zona de absici&#243n de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u96e2\u5c64\u5e2f (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006501.definition: An abscission zone (PO:0000146) at the base of a vascular leaf (PO:0009025) where it separates during leaf abscission (GO:0060866).
PO:0006501.label: leaf abscission zone

PO:0006502.synonyms: zona de absici&#243n de la flor (Spanish;exact);\u843d\u82b1\u5e2f\uff08\u5c64\uff09 (Japanese;exact)

PO:0006503.synonyms: \u843d\u679c\u5b9f (fruit shedding zone) (Japanese;exact);zona de absici&#243n del fruto (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006503.definition: An abscission zone (PO:0000146) at the base of a fruit (PO:0009001) where the fruit separates from a fruit pedicel (PO:0030114) during fruit abscission (GO:0060867).
PO:0006503.label: fruit abscission zone

PO:0025060.definition: A cardinal part of multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025498) that is thin and flat.
PO:0025060.label: lamina

PO:0025061.definition: A perimedullary zone (PO:0025058) that is part of a tuber pith (PO:0025052).
PO:0025061.label: tuber perimedullary zone

PO:0025109.synonyms: eje de octavo orden de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact);seventh order inflorescence branch   (exact)
PO:0025109.definition: A higher order inflorescence axis (PO:0009081) that develops from an inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009105) of a seventh order inflorescence axis (PO:0025109).
PO:0025109.label: eighth order inflorescence axis

PO:0025108.synonyms: sixth order inflorescence branch  (exact);eje de s\xe9ptimo orden de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025108.definition: A higher order inflorescence axis (PO:0009081) that develops from an inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009105) of a sixth order inflorescence axis (PO:0025108).
PO:0025108.label: seventh order inflorescence axis

PO:0008047.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that is part of a scutellum (PO:0020110).
PO:0008047.label: scutellum vascular system

PO:0025065.definition: A perimedullary zone that is part of a root pith.
PO:0025065.label: root perimedullary zone

PO:0025066.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is elongated and sub-cylindrical to cylindrical and supports another cardinal organ part.
PO:0025066.label: stalk

PO:0025067.synonyms: par&#233nquima de reserva de la semilla (Spanish;exact);\u7a2e\u5b50\u8caf\u8535\u67d4\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025067.definition: A portion of storage parenchyma that is part of a seed.
PO:0025067.label: seed storage parenchyma

PO:0025068.synonyms: meristema axilar de yema de tub&#233rculo (Spanish;exact);\u584a\u830e\u814b\u82bd \u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025068.definition: An axillary bud meristem (PO:0000232) that is part of a shoot axis tuber (PO:0004543).
PO:0025068.label: shoot axis tuber axillary bud meristem

PO:0025069.synonyms: \u3080\u304b\u3054\uff08\u73e0\u82bd\uff09\u814b\u82bd\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);meristema axilar de yema de tub&#233rculo a&#233reo (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025069.definition: A tuber axillary bud meristem that is part of an aerial tuber.
PO:0025069.label: aerial tuber axillary bud meristem

PO:0025101.synonyms: \u679d\u7bc0\u9593\u4f38\u9577\u5e2f\uff08\u5c64\uff09 (Japanese;exact);zona de elongaci&#243n de la ramificaci&#243n del internodo (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025101.definition: A shoot axis internode elongation zone (PO:0025100) that is part of a branch internode (PO:0025080).
PO:0025101.label: branch internode elongation zone

PO:0025100.synonyms: zona de elongaci&#243n del internodo de epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact);\u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u7bc0\u9593\u4f38\u9577\u5e2f\uff08\u5c64\uff09 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025100.definition: A plant axis elongation zone (PO:0025180) that is part of a shoot axis internode (PO:0005005).
PO:0025100.label: shoot axis internode elongation zone

PO:0025107.synonyms: eje de sexto orden de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact);fifth order inflorescence branch (exact)
PO:0025107.definition: A higher order inflorescence axis (PO:0009081) that develops from an inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009105) of a fifth order inflorescence axis (PO:0025107).
PO:0025107.label: sixth order inflorescence axis

PO:0025106.synonyms: fourth order inflorescence branch (exact);eje de quinto orden de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025106.definition: A higher order inflorescence axis (PO:0009081) that develops from an inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009105) of a fourth order inflorescence axis (PO:0025106).
PO:0025106.label: fifth order inflorescence axis

PO:0025105.synonyms: third order inflorescence branch (exact);tertiary inflorescence branch (exact);eje de cuarto orden de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact);third order paraclade (exact)
PO:0025105.definition: A higher order inflorescence axis (PO:0009081) that develops from an inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009105) of a third order inflorescence axis (PO:0025105).
PO:0025105.label: fourth order inflorescence axis

PO:0025104.synonyms: primary inflorescence axis (exact);inflorescence rachis (exact);inflorescence rhachis (exact);primer orden del eje de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact);\u7b2c\u4e00\u82b1\u5e8f\u8ef8 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025104.definition: An inflorescence axis (PO:0020122) that is the primary or main axis of an inflorescence (PO:0009049).
PO:0025104.label: first order inflorescence axis

PO:0025262.definition: A septum (PO:0000030) that divides a multilocular plant ovary (PO:0009072).
PO:0025262.label: plant ovary septum

PO:0025263.definition: A plant anatomical space (PO:0025117) that is a cavity a reproductive structure.
PO:0025263.label: locule

PO:0025260.definition: A portion of shoot procambium that is part of a shoot apical meristem and gives rise to the primary vascular tissue of a shoot axis.
PO:0025260.label: shoot axis procambium

PO:0025258.definition: A meristematic cell (PO:0004010) that is part of a portion of procambium (PO:0025275).
PO:0025258.label: procambial cell

PO:0025266.definition: A locule (PO:0025263) that is a cavity in a plant ovary (PO:0009072).

PO:0025267.definition: A portion of fruit placenta tissue  (PO:0004535) that divides a fruit (PO:0009001) into two or more chambers and develops from a plant ovary replum (PO:0025272).
PO:0025267.label: fruit replum

PO:0025264.definition: A sporangium locule that is part of an anther and is a cavity within a single pollen sac or two or more fused pollen sacs.
PO:0025264.label: anther locule

PO:0025265.definition: A locule (PO:0025263) that is a cavity in a sporangium (PO:0025094) or several fused sporangia.
PO:0025265.label: sporangium locule

PO:0025154.definition: A phyllome apex (PO:0025139) that is part of a bract (PO:0009055).
PO:0025154.label: bract apex

PO:0025268.definition: A septum that divides a cavity or mass of tissue in a fruit and develops from an ovary septum.
PO:0025268.label: fruit septum

PO:0025269.synonyms: &#243rgano colectivo de una parte de la estructura (Spanish;exact);\u96c6\u5408\u7684\u5668\u5b98\u306e\u90e8\u5206\u69cb\u9020 (Japanese;exact)

PO:0030014.synonyms: gametophytic meristematic apical cell (exact);gametophyte apical initial (exact);gametophyte apical cell (exact);c&#233lula apical gametof&#237tica (Spanish;exact);\u914d\u5076\u4f53\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0030014.definition: An apical cell that is part of a whole plant in the gametophytic phase.
PO:0030014.label: gametophyte meristematic apical cell

PO:0006309.definition: A spikelet (PO:0009051) that is part of the tassel inflorescence (PO:0020126) and bears tassel florets (PO:0006310) at maturity.
PO:0006309.label: tassel spikelet

PO:0030126.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of a determinate first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104) and pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) on paired, determinate higher order inflorescence axes (PO:0009081).
PO:0030126.label: cyme inflorescence

PO:0025587.definition: A sepal (PO:0009031) that is part of a perianth (PO:0009058) that contains fused sepals (PO:0025584) and/or fused petals (PO:0025583), but is separate from the other sepals (PO:0009031) and petals (PO:0009032).

PO:0025253.synonyms: seventh order infructescence branch (exact);eje de octavo orden de la infructescencia (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025253.definition: A higher order infructescence axis (PO:0025243) which arises from a seventh order infructescence axis (PO:0025252) and develops from an eighth order inflorescence axis (PO:0025109).

PO:0025584.definition: A sepal (PO:0009031) that is part of the fused calyx (PO:0025582) or a fused perianth (PO:0025580).
PO:0025584.label: fused sepal

PO:0025583.definition: A petal (PO:0009032) that is part of a fused corolla (PO:0025581) or a fused perianth (PO:0025580).
PO:0025583.label: fused petal

PO:0025582.definition: A calyx (PO:0009060) that is composed of fused sepals (PO:0025584).
PO:0025582.label: fused calyx

PO:0025581.definition: A corolla (PO:0009059) that is composed of fused petals (PO:0025583).
PO:0025581.label: fused corolla

PO:0025580.definition: A perianth (PO:0009058) in which one or more of the petals (PO:0009032), sepals (PO:0009031), and/or tepals (PO:0009033) are fused (PATO:0000642).
PO:0025580.label: fused perianth

PO:0025381.synonyms: espacio intercelular en el mes&#243filo esponjoso de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u6d77\u7dbf\u72b6\u8449\u8089\u7d30\u80de\u9593\u9593\u9699 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025381.definition: A leaf mesophyll intercellular space that is part of a spongy mesophyll.
PO:0025381.label: spongy mesophyll intercellular space

PO:0025589.definition: A leaf tip (PO:0025142) that is the distal portion of the leaf lamina (PO:0020039).
PO:0025589.label: leaf lamina tip

PO:0006017.definition: A portion of endosperm (PO:0009089) tissue in which the first karyokinetic event is accompanied by the formation of a horizontal wall which divides the embryo sac central cell (PO:0020090) into unequal regions. The larger one is the micropylar chamber in which cytokinesis does not occur and the smaller one is the chalazal chamber.
PO:0006017.label: helobial endosperm

PO:0030121.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of sessile (PATO:0001436) flowers (PO:0009046) on a radially-enlarged, determinate first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104).
PO:0030121.label: capitulum inflorescence

PO:0025442.synonyms: meristema de engrosamiento secundario del tallo (Spanish;exact);\u830e\u4e8c\u6b21\u80a5\u539a\u5206\u88c2\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025442.definition: A secondary thickening meristem (PO:0025414) that is part of a stem (PO:0009047).
PO:0025442.label: stem secondary thickening meristem

PO:0025367.definition: A prophyll that is slender and coiling and lacks a lamina.
PO:0025367.label: prophyll tendril

PO:0025366.definition: A leaf rachis (PO:0020055) that is slender and coiling and lacks a lamina.
PO:0025366.label: leaf rachis tendril

PO:0025365.definition: A shoot axis that arises from the apical part of a stem and is slender and coiling.
PO:0025365.label: stem apex tendril

PO:0030120.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of sessile (PATO:0001436) flowers (PO:0009046) on a radially-enlarged, indeterminate first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104), and a basal, enveloping inflorescence bract (PO:0009054).
PO:0030120.label: spadix inflorescence

PO:0025363.definition: A leaf apex of a laminar vascular leaf that is slender and coiling.
PO:0025363.label: leaf apex tendril

PO:0025362.definition: A leaflet that is slender and coiling and lacks a lamina.
PO:0025362.label: leaflet tendril

PO:0025361.definition: A vascular leaf that is slender and coiling and lacks a lamina.
PO:0025361.label: leaf tendril

PO:0025360.definition: A collective plant organ structure (PO:0025007) on the surface of a vascular leaf that has as parts two or more fused sori (PO:0025359).
PO:0025360.label: ceonosorus

PO:0025569.definition: A petal (PO:0009032) that is part of a perianth (PO:0009058) that contains fused sepals (PO:0025584) and/or fused petals (PO:0025583), but is separate from the other sepals (PO:0009031) and petals (PO:0009032).
PO:0025569.label: free petal

PO:0025407.definition: A sclerenchyma cell (PO:0000077) that is elongated and tapering.
PO:0025407.label: plant fiber cell

PO:0025404.definition: A portion of meristem (PO:0009013) tissue that is part of a phyllome margin (PO:0025018) of an expanding phyllome (PO:0006001) and has as parts marginal and submarginal initials.
PO:0025404.label: phyllome marginal meristem

PO:0025405.definition: A portion of phyllome marginal meristem (PO:0025404) tissue that is part of a leaf margin (PO:0025009) of a vascular leaf (PO:0009025) during a leaf expansion stage (PO:0001052) and has parts marginal and submarginal initials.
PO:0025405.label: leaf marginal meristem

PO:0025402.synonyms: \u30d5\u30a3\u30ed\u30e0\u80cc\u8ef8\u5074\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);meristema abaxial del filoma (Spanish;exact);phyllome abaxial unifacial meristem (narrow);phyllome abaxial rounding meristem  (narrow)
PO:0025402.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) that is found on the abaxial side of a developing phyllome (PO:0006001).
PO:0025402.label: phyllome abaxial meristem

PO:0025487.synonyms: bract primordia (exact;plural);primordio de la br&#225ctea (Spanish;exact);portion of bract primordium tissue (exact);\u82de\u539f\u57fa\uff08\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025487.definition: A phyllome primordium (PO:0025487) that is committed to the development of a flower bract (PO:0009055).
PO:0025487.label: bract primordium

PO:0025400.synonyms: meristema adaxial del filoma (Spanish;exact);\u30d5\u30a3\u30ed\u30e0\u5411\u8ef8\u5074\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);phyllome adaxial unifacial meristem (narrow);phyllome adaxial rounding meristem  (narrow)
PO:0025400.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) that is found on the adaxial side of a developing phyllome (PO:0006001).
PO:0025400.label: phyllome adaxial meristem

PO:0025401.synonyms: \u8449\u5411\u8ef8\u5074\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);leaf ventral meristem (narrow);leaf adaxial rounding meristem (narrow);leaf adaxial unifacial meristem (narrow)
PO:0025401.definition: A portion of phyllome adaxial meristem (PO:0025400) tissue that is found on the adaxial side of a developing vascular leaf (PO:0009025).
PO:0025401.label: vascular leaf adaxial meristem

PO:0020041.definition: A cardinal organ part that is an appendage at the base of a vascular leaf.
PO:0020041.label: stipule

PO:0020040.definition: A phyllome base (PO:0025140) that is part of a leaf (PO:0025034).
PO:0020040.label: leaf base

PO:0020043.definition: A leaf having two or more distinct leaflets that are evident as such from early in development.
PO:0020043.label: compound leaf

PO:0020042.definition: A leaf in which the lamina is undivided.
PO:0020042.label: simple leaf

PO:0020045.definition: A once-compound leaf with leaflets borne along a rachis.
PO:0020045.label: pinnate leaf

PO:0020044.definition: The unifacial terete apical portion of a monocot cotyledon, sometimes also visible on other leaves.
PO:0020044.label: hyperphyll

PO:0020047.definition: A sporocyte (PO:0006204) that produces four haploid (1n) microspores (PO:0020048).
PO:0020047.label: microsporocyte

PO:0025409.definition: A portion of vascular tissue (PO:0009015) that develops from a vascular cambium (PO:0005598).
PO:0025409.label: secondary vascular tissue

PO:0006019.definition: A portion of leaf epidermis (PO:0006016) that covers the abaxial/lower surface of a leaf.
PO:0006019.label: leaf abaxial epidermis

PO:0025007.definition: A collective plant structure (PO:0025497) that is a proper part of a whole plant (PO:0000003), and is composed of two or more adjacent plant organs (PO:0009008) and the associated portions of plant tissue (PO:0009007).
PO:0025007.label: collective plant organ structure

PO:0025308.definition: A sporangium wall that is part of a megasporangium.
PO:0025308.label: megasporangium wall

PO:0025149.definition: A phyllome tip that is part of a petal apex.
PO:0025149.label: petal tip

PO:0025486.definition: A phyllome anlagen (PO:0025430) that will give rise to a stamen primordium (PO:0004705) and is part of a peripheral zone (PO:000225) of a flower meristem (PO:0000229).
PO:0025486.label: stamen anlagen

PO:0008002.definition: A cardinal part of multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025498) that is the end of a fruit (PO:0009001) proximal to a fruit pedicel (PO:0004536).
PO:0008002.label: fruit proximal end

PO:0030040.definition: A cardinal organ part that is the basal (distal) part of a sporangium.
PO:0030040.label: sporangium base

PO:0030041.definition: A cardinal organ part that is the main body of a sporangium and has spores located in it.
PO:0030041.label: sporangium theca

PO:0030042.definition: A single or double circle of peristome teeth inside a sporangium mouth.
PO:0030042.label: peristome

PO:0030043.definition: A cardinal organ part that is a single lobe of a peristome.
PO:0030043.label: peristome tooth

PO:0030044.synonyms: spore capsule opercula (exact;plural);sporangium lid (exact);op&#233rculo de la c&#225psula productora de esporas (Spanish;exact);\u80de\u5b50\u56a2\u84cb (Japanese;exact);spore capsule lid (exact)
PO:0030044.definition: A cardinal organ part that is the apical part of a spore capsule that separates from the rest of the capsule during dehiscence.
PO:0030044.label: spore capsule operculum

PO:0020090.definition: An embryo sac cell (PO:0025026) that is largest cell in a mature embryo sac (PO:0025074).
PO:0020090.label: embryo sac central cell

PO:0009028.definition: A structure on which one or more microsporangia are borne; in flowering plants, the stamen.
PO:0009028.label: microsporophyll

PO:0030047.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that has as parts hydroid (PO:0025032) cells and cells of no other types.
PO:0030047.label: hydrome

PO:0009026.definition: A leaf-like organ on which one or more sporangia are borne.
PO:0009026.label: sporophyll

PO:0009027.definition: A structure upon which (or in the axil of which) one or more megasporangia are borne; in flowering plants, a carpel.
PO:0009027.label: megasporophyll

PO:0009025.synonyms: leaf;vascular (exact);hoja vascular (Spanish;exact);vascular leaves (exact;plural);\u7dad\u7ba1\u675f\u306e\u3042\u308b\u8449;\u307e\u305f\u306f\u7dad\u7ba1\u675f\u690d\u7269\u306e\u8449 (Japanese;exact);foliage leaf (exact);ascidium (narrow);trophophyll (narrow);scale-like leaf (narrow);needle-like leaf (narrow);pitcher blade (narrow);sterile frond (narrow);pitcher (narrow);ascidia (narrow);frond (narrow);pitcher-blade (narrow);fiddlehead (narrow)
PO:0009025.definition: A leaf (PO:0025034) in a vascular plant.
PO:0009025.label: vascular leaf

PO:0009022.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) beneath a meristem L2 layer (PO:0009021) in a shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148) which gives rise to internal tissues of leaf and stem.
PO:0009022.label: meristem L3 layer

PO:0009023.definition: An axil that is the space between a shoot axis and a leaf that branches from the shoot axis.
PO:0009023.label: leaf axil

PO:0009020.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) that is the outermost layer of a shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148) and gives rise to a shoot system epidermis (PO:0006035).
PO:0009020.label: meristem L1 layer

PO:0009021.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) directly beneath a meristem L1 layer (PO:0009020) in a shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148) which gives rise to ground tissue (PO:0025059).
PO:0009021.label: meristem L2 layer

PO:0025456.definition: A sieve cell (PO:0025415) that is part of a portion of secondary phloem (PO:0005043).
PO:0025456.label: secondary phloem sieve cell

PO:0005702.definition: A portion of parenchyma tissue containing particularly large intercellular spaces of schizogenous or lysigenous origin.
PO:0005702.label: aerenchyma

PO:0006332.definition: A cardinal part of multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025498) that is attached to a seed (PO:0009010) and is the remnants of a funicle (PO:0020006).
PO:0006332.label: seed funicle

PO:0005708.definition: A maximal portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) between the vascular system (PO:0000034) and the epidermis (PO:0005679) in a plant.
PO:0005708.label: cortex

PO:0006331.definition: A cardinal part of multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025498) that is a ridge on a seed (PO:0009010) that develops from a raphe (PO:0020027).
PO:0006331.label: seed raphe

PO:0030094.definition: A capsule fruit (PO:0030091) which at maturity dehisces through both the fruit septa (PO:0025268) and the fruit locules (PO:0025270).
PO:0030094.label: coccarium capsule fruit

PO:0025485.definition: A phyllome anlagen (PO:0025430) that will give rise to a sepal primordium (PO:0004704) and is part of a peripheral zone (PO:000225) of a flower meristem (PO:0000229).
PO:0025485.label: sepal anlagen

PO:0025318.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the basal part of an axillary hair (PO:0025316), below the axillary hair terminal cell (PO:0025317).
PO:0025318.label: axillary hair base

PO:0025319.synonyms: c&#233lula basal del pelo axilar (Spanish;exact);axillary hair base cell (exact);\u814b\u6bdb\u57fa\u5e95\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025319.definition: A trichome cell (PO:0008030) that is part of a base of an axillary hair (PO:0025316).
PO:0025319.label: axillary hair basal cell

PO:0025312.definition: An exothecium that is part of a megasporangium wall.
PO:0025312.label: megasporangium exothecium

PO:0025313.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) that is the inner-most layer of a sporangium wall (PO:0025306).
PO:0025313.label: tapetum

PO:0025310.definition: A sporangium wall endothecium (PO:0030049) that is part of a megasporangium wall.
PO:0025310.label: megasporangium endothecium

PO:0030102.definition: A fruit (PO:0009001) which develops from a gynoecium (PO:0009062) and at maturity comprises a dry exocarp (PO:0009085), dry mesocarp (PO:0009087), and dry endocarp (PO:0009086) that are not fused to a seed coat (PO:0009088).
PO:0030102.label: nut fruit

PO:0025316.definition: A multicellular trichome (PO:0025162) that has as parts a long terminal cell atop a basal stalk and grows in a leaf axil (PO:0009023).
PO:0025316.label: axillary hair

PO:0025317.definition: A trichome cell (PO:0008030) that is the long terminal cell of an axillary hair (PO:0008030).
PO:0025317.label: axillary hair terminal cell

PO:0025314.definition: An tapetum (PO:0025313) that is part of a microsporangium wall (PO:0025307).
PO:0025314.label: microsporangium tapetum

PO:0006336.synonyms: obturador de la semilla (Spanish;exact);portion of seed obturator tissue (exact);\u7a2e\u5b50\u9589\u585e\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006336.definition: An outgrowth of the seed funicle, that forms a bridge between the seed micropyle and other tissues. It is also a remnant form of the obturator found in the ovular funicle.
PO:0006336.label: seed obturator

PO:0025088.synonyms: surco del ginoecio (Spanish;exact);gynoecial ridge (exact);\u96cc\u854a\u7e01 (Japanese;exact);stylar ridge (exact);Zea gynoecium ridge (narrow);gynoecium ridge of upper floret of sessile spikelet of ear (narrow);gynoecium ridge of lower floret of sessile spikelet of ear (narrow);Poaceae gynoecium ridge (narrow);gynoecium ridge of lower floret of pedicellate spikelet of ear (narrow);gynoecium ridge of upper floret of pedicellate spikelet of ear (narrow)
PO:0025088.definition: A gynoecium in the early stages of development, characterized as a ridge on the abaxial surface of the floral meristem that develops from a gynoecium primordium.
PO:0025088.label: gynoecium ridge

PO:0006049.definition: A portion of shoot system epidermis (PO:0006035) that is part of the scutellum (PO:0020110).
PO:0006049.label: scutellum epidermis

PO:0006048.synonyms: \u7a2e\u5b50\u7a2e\u76ae\u8868\u76ae (Japanese;exact);epidermis de la cubierta de la semilla (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006048.definition: A portion of epidermis (PO:0005679) that is part of a seed coat (PO:0009088).
PO:0006048.label: seed coat epidermis

PO:0000372.definition: A portion of primary xylem (PO:0005849) tissue that has as part one or more metaxylem tracheary elements (PO:0025576) embedded in parenchyma (PO:0005421) tissue and may contain xylem fiber cells (PO:0000274).
PO:0000372.label: metaxylem

PO:0006045.definition: A portion of integument epidermis (PO:0006043) of the outer integument (PO:0020023) in a plant ovule (PO:0020003).
PO:0006045.label: outer integument epidermis

PO:0006044.definition: A portion of integument epidermis (PO:0006043) of the inner integument (PO:0020022) in a plant ovule (PO:0020003).
PO:0006044.label: inner integument epidermis

PO:0025080.definition: A shoot axis internode (PO:0005005) that is part of a branch (PO:0025073).
PO:0025080.label: branch internode

PO:0025081.definition: An axillary shoot that develops from a subterranean tuber axillary bud.
PO:0025081.label: subterranean tuber axillary shoot

PO:0006041.definition: A portion of phyllome epidermis (PO:0025157) that is part of a petal (PO:0009032).
PO:0006041.label: petal epidermis

PO:0006040.definition: A portion of phyllome epidermis (PO:0025157) that is part of a sepal (PO:0009031).
PO:0006040.label: sepal epidermis

PO:0025084.definition: A bud that develops into a reproductive shoot system.
PO:0025084.label: reproductive bud

PO:0006042.definition: A  multiseriate portion of root epidermis (PO:0006036) found in aerial roots of some monocots. Most of its cells are dead and store water like a sponge.
PO:0006042.label: velamen

PO:0005060.definition: A portion of endodermis that is part of a vascular leaf.
PO:0005060.label: leaf endodermis

PO:0025428.definition: A portion of meristem (PO:0009013) tissue in which the planes of cell division in each layer are anticlinal to the surface of the phyllome (PO:0006001).
PO:0025428.label: phyllome plate meristem

PO:0025276.definition: A portion of procambium (PO:0025275) tissue that is part of a shoot system (PO:0009006).
PO:0025276.label: shoot procambium

PO:0005415.definition: A portion of seed storage parenchyma that is part of an endosperm.
PO:0005415.label: endosperm parenchyma

PO:0025525.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that gives rise to one or more plant sperm cells (PO:0000084).
PO:0025525.label: spermatogenous cell

PO:0025099.definition: A plant structure (PO:0009011) that is part of an plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0025099.label: embryo plant structure

PO:0025556.definition: A portion of exarch protoxylem (PO:002554) tissue in which the maturation of primary xylem (PO:0005849) of the shoot system (PO:0009006) progresses centripetally, with the oldest elements (protoxylem) farthest from the center of the plant axis (PO:0025004).
PO:0025556.label: shoot system exarch protoxylem

PO:0000262.definition: A root epidermal cell that is the smaller cell produced by the asymmetric division of an epidermal intial and gives rise to a root hair.
PO:0000262.label: trichoblast

PO:0025288.definition: A coleorhiza (PO:0020034) that is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0025288.label: embryo coleorhiza

PO:0009064.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is the region at the distal end of either a peduncle or a pedicel where the floral appendages (e.g.: sepals, petals, stamens and pistils) are attached.
PO:0009064.label: receptacle

PO:0000010.definition: A plant embryo (PO:0009009) that is grown or maintained in vitro.
PO:0000010.label: cultured plant embryo

PO:0000011.definition: A somatic plant embryo grown and maintained in vitro.
PO:0000011.label: cultured somatic plant embryo

PO:0004009.definition: Cells with deposits of silica in them. One of the two types of short cells in the epidermis of grasses and bamboos. It is usually paired with epidermal cork cell.
PO:0004009.label: silica cell

PO:0000013.definition: A vascular leaf (PO:0009025), borne on the stem (PO:0009047).
PO:0000013.label: cauline leaf

PO:0000014.definition: A vascular leaf (PO:0009025) born in a circular pattern around a stem (PO:0009047) with compressed stem internodes (PO:0020142).
PO:0000014.label: rosette leaf

PO:0000015.synonyms: primordio de cotiled&#243n (Spanish;exact);cotyledon primordia (exact;plural);\u5b50\u8449\u539f\u57fa\uff08\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09(Japanese;exact);portion of cotyledon primordium tissue (exact)
PO:0000015.definition: A phyllome primordium (PO:0025128) that develops from a cotyledon anlagen (PO:0025432) and is part of a vegetative shoot apex (PO:0025223) and is committed to the development of a cotyledon (PO:0020030).
PO:0000015.label: cotyledon primordium

PO:0000016.synonyms: primordio de ra&#237z lateral (Spanish;exact);portion of lateral root primordium tissue (exact);\u5074\u6839\u539f\u57fa (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000016.definition: A root primordium (PO:0005029) that is part of a root (PO:0009005) and is committed to the development of a lateral root (PO:0020121).
PO:0000016.label: lateral root primordium

PO:0000017.synonyms: leaf primordium (exact);portion of vascular leaf primordium tissue (exact);primordio de hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u539f\u57fa (Japanese;exact);vascular leaf primordia (exact;plural)
PO:0000017.definition: A phyllome primordium (PO:0025128) that develops from a vascular leaf anlagen (PO:0025431) and is part of a vegetative shoot apex (PO:0025223) and is committed to the development of a vascular leaf (PO:0009025).
PO:0000017.label: vascular leaf primordium

PO:0006330.definition: A shoot axis that is an elongation of the floral axis that supports the carpels.
PO:0006330.label: gynophore

PO:0000019.synonyms: \u96cc\u854a\u539f\u57fa(\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09   (Japanese;exact);pistil primordium (exact);primordio de gineceo (Spanish;exact);portion of gynoecium primordium tissue (exact)
PO:0000019.definition: A floral structure primordium (PO:0025477) that is committed to the development of a gynoecium (PO:0009062).
PO:0000019.label: gynoecium primordium

PO:0004001.definition: An enlarged more or less thin-walled leaf pavement cell, present, with other similar cells, in longitudinal rows in leaves of monocots.
PO:0004001.label: bulliform cell

PO:0004006.definition: A chlorenchyma cell that is part of a mesophyll.
PO:0004006.label: mesophyll cell

PO:0019018.synonyms: hypocotyl-root axis (exact);eje del embri&#243n (Spanish;exact);\u690d\u7269\u80da\u8ef8 (Japanese;exact);zygotic plant embryo axis (narrow)
PO:0019018.definition: A plant axis (PO:0025004) that is the axial part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0019018.label: plant embryo axis

PO:0025380.synonyms: \u8449\u8089\u7d30\u80de\u5185\u7a7a\u9593\uff08\u9593\u9699\uff09 (Japanese;exact);espacio intercelular en el mes&#243filo de la hoja (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025380.definition: An intercellular space that is part of a leaf mesophyll.
PO:0025380.label: leaf mesophyll intercellular space

PO:0025356.definition: A short, enlarged shoot system (PO:0009006) that has as parts a short stem (PO:0009047) in which the shoot internodes (PO:0005005) do not elongate, and one or more buds (PO:0000055) enclosed by fleshy leaves (PO:0009025) or leaf bases (PO:0020040).
PO:0025356.label: bulb

PO:0025124.definition: A plant organ (PO:0009008) that produces one or more gametes (PO:0025006) and participates in the gametophyte development stage (PO:0028003).
PO:0025124.label: multicellular plant gametangium

PO:0025565.definition: A xylem sap (PO:0025539) that is located in the shoot system (PO:0009006).
PO:0025565.label: shoot system xylem sap

PO:0025357.definition: A lateral root (PO:0020121) that is erect and protrudes above the surface of the soil or water.
PO:0025357.label: pneumatophore

PO:0025321.definition: A stem node (PO:0020141) from which cotyledons (PO:0020030) may develop.
PO:0025321.label: cotyledonary node

PO:0030056.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that divides to gives rise to a sporocyte (PO:0006204) and is part of a sporangium (PO:0025094).
PO:0030056.label: archesporial cell

PO:0025289.definition: A coleorhiza (PO:0020034) that is part of a whole plant (PO:0000003) in the seedling development stage (PO:0007131).
PO:0025289.label: seedling coleorhiza

PO:0005001.definition: An axillary shoot system (PO:0006343) that is part of a stem base (PO:0008039).
PO:0005001.label: basal axillary shoot system

PO:0005669.definition: A gland or a cavity lined with cells that secrete oils.
PO:0005669.label: oil gland

PO:0025147.definition: A phyllome base that is part of a sepal.
PO:0025147.label: sepal base

PO:0005660.definition: A cardinal organ part that releases water through a hydathode pore.
PO:0005660.label: hydathode

PO:0005661.definition: A specialized tissue where excess salt absorbed in water from the soil is concentrated, being stores or excreted.
PO:0005661.label: salt gland

PO:0005665.definition: A canal (PO:0025132) of schizogenous origin, lined with secretory resin cells (PO:0025604) and containing plant resin (PO:0025603).
PO:0005665.label: resin canal

PO:0006319.definition: Inflorescence branch that terminates in a spikelet.
PO:0006319.label: spikelet pedicel

PO:0025146.definition: A phyllome base (PO:0025140) that is part of a petal (PO:0009032).
PO:0025146.label: petal base

PO:0025145.definition: A phyllome apex that is part of a sepal.
PO:0025145.label: sepal apex

PO:0025144.definition: A phyllome apex (PO:0025139) that is part of a petal (PO:0009032).
PO:0025144.label: petal apex

PO:0025143.synonyms: \u82b1\u88ab\u7247\u9802 (Japanese;exact);&#225pice del t&#233palo (Spanish;exact);compound tepal lobe (narrow);free tepal apex (narrow)
PO:0025143.definition: A phyllome apex PO:0025139) that is part of a tepal (PO:0009033).
PO:0025143.label: tepal apex

PO:0025142.definition: A phyllome tip (PO:0025141) that is part of a leaf apex (PO:0020137).
PO:0025142.label: leaf tip

PO:0025141.definition: The apical most portion of a phyllome apex.
PO:0025141.label: phyllome tip

PO:0025140.definition: The basal part of a phyllome (PO:0006001), where it attaches to a shoot axis (PO:0025029).
PO:0025140.label: phyllome base

PO:0006311.definition: Ultimate inflorescence branch of the maize tassel without a pedicel, developing from the spikelet pair meristem.
PO:0006311.label: tassel sessile spikelet

PO:0025227.definition: A portion of plant tissue consisting of four megaspores that remained joined together shortly after meiosis. One cell will give rise to a female gametophyte.
PO:0025227.label: tetrad of megaspores

PO:0006313.synonyms: florete inferior de la espiguilla pedicelada (Spanish;exact);\u96c4\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u6709\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u4e0b\u4f4d\u5c0f\u82b1 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006313.definition: A tassel floret that is the lower of the two florets of a pedicellate spikelet of a tassel inflorescence.
PO:0006313.label: lower floret of pedicellate spikelet of tassel

PO:0006312.definition: Ultimate inflorescence branch of the maize tassel with a pedicel, developing from the spikelet pair meristem.
PO:0006312.label: tassel pedicellate spikelet

PO:0025222.definition: A shoot apex that has as part a reproductive shoot apical meristem.
PO:0025222.label: reproductive shoot apex

PO:0025223.definition: A shoot apex PO:0000037) that has as part a vegetative shoot apical meristem (PO:0008016).
PO:0025223.label: vegetative shoot apex

PO:0025220.synonyms: stamen epidermal stomatal complex (exact);stamen epidermis stomatal complex (exact);\u96c4\u854a\u6c17\u5b54\u88c5\u7f6e (Japanese;exact);complejo estom&#225tico del estambre (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025220.definition: A phyllome stomatal complex that is part of a stamen.
PO:0025220.label: stamen stomatal complex

PO:0006316.synonyms: florete superior de la espiguilla s&#233sil (Spanish;exact);\u96c4\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u7121\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u4e0a\u4f4d\u5c0f\u82b1 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006316.definition: A tassel floret that is one of the two florets placed above the lower floret on a sessile spikelet rachilla of a tassel inflorescence.
PO:0006316.label: upper floret of sessile spikelet of tassel

PO:0004722.synonyms: portion of pedicel cortex tissue (exact);cortex (corteza) del pedicelo (Spanish;exact);\u5c0f\u82b1\u67c4\u76ae\u5c64 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0004722.definition: A portion of cortex (PO:0005708) that is part of a pedicel (PO:0030112).
PO:0004722.label: pedicel cortex

PO:0020131.definition: A portion of root parenchyma tissue that is part of a root cap and is parallel to the sides of a root axis.
PO:0020131.label: lateral root cap

PO:0004721.synonyms: \u5074\u751f\u5206\u679d\u76ae\u5c64 (Japanese;exact);cortex (corteza) del paraclado (Spanish;exact);portion of paraclade cortex tissue (exact);inflorescence branch cortex (exact)
PO:0004721.definition: A portion of cortex (PO:0005708) that is part of an inflorescence branch (PO:0009081), also called a paraclade.
PO:0004721.label: paraclade cortex

PO:0004726.synonyms: \u8449\u539f\u57fa(\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09\u306e\u8868\u5074\u3001\u5411\u8ef8\u5074 (Japanese;exact);lado adaxial del primordio de la hoja (Spanish;exact)
PO:0004726.definition: A portion of vascular leaf primordium (PO:0000017) that is proximal to the axis of the shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148) and develops into the adaxial side of the leaf lamina (PO:0020039).
PO:0004726.label: vascular leaf primordium adaxial side

PO:0004724.synonyms: union del hipoc&#243tile con la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);\u80da\u8ef8-\u6839\u5408\u6d41\u70b9 (Japanese;exact);embryo axis transition zone (exact);Poaceae crown (narrow)
PO:0004724.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is the part of a plant axis (PO:0025004) where a radicle (PO:0020031) joins a hypocotyl (PO:0020100).
PO:0004724.label: hypocotyl-root junction

PO:0020130.synonyms: columella cells (exact);caliptra de la ra&#237z central (Spanish;exact);columella rootcap (exact);\u4e2d\u5fc3\u6839\u51a0 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0020130.definition: A portion of root parenchyma tissue that is the central part of a root cap in which the cells are arranged in longitudinal files.
PO:0020130.label: central root cap

PO:0019024.synonyms: seed lid (exact);portion of seed operculum tissue (exact);seed opercula (exact;plural);\u7a2e\u5b50\u861a\u84cb   (Japanese;exact);op&#233rculo de la semilla (Spanish;exact)
PO:0019024.definition: A plug-like structure formed in the micropylar region of the seed coat.
PO:0019024.label: seed operculum

PO:0006088.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) is formed by the division of the male archesporial initial. After several mitotic divisions these cells differentiate into pollen mother cells.
PO:0006088.label: primary sporogenous cell

PO:0030046.synonyms: protonema apical cell (exact);protonema apical initial (exact);\u539f\u7cf8\u4f53\u3001\u7cf8\u72b6\u4f53\u306e\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula meristem&#225tica apical del protonema (Spanish;exact)
PO:0030046.definition: A gametophyte meristematic apical cell that is part of a protonema.
PO:0030046.label: protonema meristematic apical cell

PO:0020133.synonyms: columella root cap initial (exact);columella stem cell (exact);\u67f1\u8ef8\u6839\u51a0\u59cb\u539f\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula inicial de la columela del caliptra de la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);columella root cap stem cell (exact)
PO:0020133.definition: A root initial cell that produces columella cells in the root cap. In direct contact with quiescent center.
PO:0020133.label: columella root cap initial cell

PO:0003015.synonyms: zona de diferenciaci&#243n de la ra&#237z primary (Spanish;exact);\u4e00\u6b21\u6839\u5206\u5316\u5e2f\uff08\u5c64\uff09 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0003015.definition: A root differentiation zone that is part of a primary root.
PO:0003015.label: primary root differentiation zone

PO:0003017.definition: A root cap that is part of a primary root tip.
PO:0003017.label: root cap of primary root

PO:0003016.synonyms: zona de diferenciaci&#243n de la ra&#237z lateral (Spanish;exact);\u5074\u6839\u5206\u88c2\u5e2f\uff08\u5c64\uff09  (Japanese;exact)
PO:0003016.definition: A root differentiation zone that is part of a lateral root.
PO:0003016.label: lateral root differentiation zone

PO:0003011.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a root (PO:0009005).
PO:0003011.label: root vascular system

PO:0025168.definition: A papilla cell that is part of a stigma epidermis.
PO:0025168.label: stigma papilla cell

PO:0025389.definition: A portion of cuticular wax (PO:0025386) that is an amorphous mixture of lipids embedded in the cutin (PO:0025385) of a plant cuticle proper (PO:0025387).
PO:0025389.label: intercuticular wax

PO:0020135.synonyms: region of root maturation (exact);\u6839\u5206\u5316\u5e2f\uff08\u5c64\uff09  (Japanese;exact);zona de diferenciaci&#243n de la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);root specialization zone (exact);root maturation zone (exact)
PO:0020135.definition: A plant axis differentiation zone that is the part of a root and is located behind a root elongation zone.
PO:0020135.label: root differentiation zone

PO:0000084.definition: A gamete (PO:0025006) produced by an antheridium (PO:0025125) or a microgametophyte (PO:0025280).
PO:0000084.label: plant sperm cell

PO:0003019.synonyms: caliptra de la ra&#237z central de la ra&#237z lateral (Spanish;exact);\u5074\u6839\u306e\u4e2d\u5fc3\u6839\u51a0 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0003019.definition: A central root cap that is part of a root cap of lateral root.
PO:0003019.label: central root cap of lateral root

PO:0000082.definition: A cambial initial cell (PO:0000295) that gives rise to ray cells of the secondary xylem (PO:0005848) and secondary phloem (PO:0005043).
PO:0000082.label: ray initial cell

PO:0009005.definition: A plant axis (PO:0025004) that lacks shoot axis nodes (PO:0005004) and usually grows indeterminately.
PO:0009005.label: root

PO:0006380.synonyms: raquilla de la espiga de la espiguilla (Spanish;exact);\u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u5c0f\u7a42\u5c0f\u8ef8 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006380.definition: The axis of the ear spikelet, above the glumes.
PO:0006380.label: ear spikelet rachilla

PO:0006386.synonyms: gluma inferior de la espiguilla s&#233sil del penacho (borla) (Spanish;exact);\u96c4\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u7121\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u7b2c\u4e00\u82de\u9834(first glume) (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006386.definition: A lower glume of tassel spikelet that is part of a tassel sessile spikelet.
PO:0006386.label: lower glume of sessile spikelet of tassel

PO:0006387.synonyms: \u96c4\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u7121\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u7b2c\u4e8c\u82de\u9834(second glume) (Japanese;exact);gluma superior de la espiguilla s&#233sil del penacho (borla) (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006387.definition: An upper glume of tassel spikelet that is part of a tassel sessile spikelet.
PO:0006387.label: upper glume of sessile spikelet of tassel

PO:0006385.synonyms: \u96c4\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u6709\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u7b2c\u4e00\u82de\u9834(first glume) (Japanese;exact);gluma inferior de la espiguilla pedicelada del penacho (borla) (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006385.definition: A lower glume of tassel spikelet that is part of a tassel pedicellate spikelet.
PO:0006385.label: lower glume of pedicellate spikelet of tassel
