PO:0006388.synonyms: gluma superior de la espiguilla pedicelada del penacho (borla) (Spanish;exact);\u96c4\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u6709\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u7b2c\u4e8c\u82de\u9834(second glume) (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006388.definition: An upper glume of tassel spikelet that is part of a tassel pedicellate spikelet.
PO:0006388.label: upper glume of pedicellate spikelet of tassel

PO:0006389.synonyms: raquilla de la espiguilla s&#233sil del penacho (borla) (Spanish;exact);\u96c4\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u7121\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u82b1\u5e8f\u8ef8 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006389.definition: The axis of the tassel sessile spikelet, above the glumes.
PO:0006389.label: rachilla of sessile spikelet of tassel

PO:0025562.definition: A portion of root exarch protoxylem (PO:0025555) tissue in which the primary xylem (PO:0005849) of the root system (PO:0025025) has five protoxylem strands or poles, and differentiation progresses centripetally, with the oldest elements (protoxylem) farthest from the center of the plant axis (PO:0025004).
PO:0025562.label: pentarch protoxylem

PO:0009071.synonyms: pollen sac tapetum (exact);\u846f\u58c1\u30bf\u30da\u30fc\u30c8\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);tapete (Spanish;exact);portion of anther wall tapetal tissue (exact);Zea tapetum (narrow);Poaceae tapetum (narrow)
PO:0009071.definition: A microsporangium tapetum (PO:0025314) that is part of an anther wall (PO:0000002).
PO:0009071.label: anther wall tapetum

PO:0009073.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001), usually apical, that is part of a carpel (PO:0009030) or group of fused carpels on which the pollen (PO:0025281) germinates.
PO:0009073.label: stigma

PO:0009072.definition: A plant structure (PO:0009011) that is the basal portion of a carpel (PO:0009030) or group of fused carpels (gynoecium; PO:0009062) and encloses the plant ovule(s) (PO:0020003).
PO:0009072.label: plant ovary

PO:0000289.synonyms: sieve tube segment (exact);miembro del tubo criboso (Spanish;exact);sieve tube member (exact);sieve-tube element (exact);\u5e2b(\u7be9\uff09\u7ba1\u8981\u7d20 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000289.definition: A sieve element (PO:0025406) that is part of a sieve tube (PO:0025416) and has as parts sieve areas aggregated into sieve plates (GO:0097218).
PO:0000289.label: sieve tube element

PO:0009074.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) which is an elongated part of a carpel (PO:0009030) or gynoecium (PO:0009062) between the plant ovary (PO:0009072) and the stigma (PO:0009073), and through which the pollen tube (GO:0090406) grows.
PO:0009074.label: style

PO:0025033.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that resembles in structure the sieve elements (PO:0025406) of vascular plants.
PO:0025033.label: leptoid

PO:0025031.definition: A ground tissue cell (PO:0025030) that contains latex.
PO:0025031.label: laticifer cell

PO:0025030.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that is part of a portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059).
PO:0025030.label: ground tissue cell

PO:0025037.synonyms: par&#233nquima de reserva de fruto (Spanish;exact);fruit flesh (exact);\u679c\u5b9f\u8caf\u8535\u67d4\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025037.definition: A portion of storage parenchyma that is part of a fruit.
PO:0025037.label: fruit storage parenchyma

PO:0025036.definition: A portion of storage parenchyma (PO:0025035) that is part of a tuber (PO:0025522).
PO:0025036.label: tuber storage parenchyma

PO:0025035.synonyms: \u8caf\u8535\u67d4\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);flesh (exact);fleshy tissue (exact);portion of storage parenchyma (exact);par&#233nquima de reserva (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025035.definition: A portion of parenchyma (PO:0005421) specialized for carbohydrate storage.
PO:0025035.label: storage parenchyma

PO:0025034.definition: A phyllome (PO:0006001) that is not associated with a reproductive structure.
PO:0025034.label: leaf

PO:0020005.definition: A portion of parenchyma tissue that is part of a connective and projects into a pollen sac.
PO:0020005.label: placentoid

PO:0020004.synonyms: \u846f\u58c1\u5916\u76ae (Japanese;exact);anther epidermis (exact);pollen sac exothecium (exact);anther sac epidermis (exact);exotecio de la pared de la antera (Spanish;exact);Zea exothecium (narrow);Poaceae exothecium (narrow)
PO:0020004.definition: An microsporangium exothecium that is part of an anther wall.
PO:0020004.label: anther wall exothecium

PO:0025130.definition: A leaf near the apex of a stem that is still rolled into a cylinder.
PO:0025130.label: cigar leaf

PO:0020006.definition: A stalk (PO:0025066) that attaches a plant ovule (PO:0020003) to a placenta (PO:0025078).
PO:0020006.label: funicle

PO:0025136.definition: A tepal (PO:0009033) that is part of a collective tepal structure (PO:0025021), along with a fused collective tepal structure (PO:0025138), but is separate from (PATO:0001505) the other tepals.
PO:0025136.label: free tepal

PO:0025137.definition: A tepal (PO:0009033) that is part of a fused collective tepal structure (PO:0025138) in which it is fused to at least one other tepal.
PO:0025137.label: fused tepal

PO:0004539.definition: A root nodule characterized by a dividing infected cells and bacteria, vascular transfer cells absent and cell division is in the outer cortex.
PO:0004539.label: determinate nodule

PO:0025135.synonyms: cigar leaf dorsal surface (exact);epidermis abaxial de la l&#225mina de la hoja en cigarro (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u5dfb\u72b6\u8449\u306e\u8449\u8eab\u80cc\u8ef8\u5074\u8868\u76ae (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025135.definition: A portion of leaf lamina abaxial epidermis that covers the abaxial surface of a cigar leaf.
PO:0025135.label: cigar leaf lamina abaxial epidermis

PO:0025516.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is a rounded projection on a phyllome margin (PO:0025018) for which the corresponding phyllome sinus (PO:0025383) extends less than one quarter of the distance to the center of the long axis of the phyllome lamina (PO:0025396).
PO:0025516.label: phyllome lamina crena

PO:0000065.synonyms: c&#233lula del polo floem&#225tico del periciclo (Spanish;exact);\u5e2b\u90e8\u6975\u5185\u9798\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000065.definition: A pericycle cell that is adjacent to the protophloem of a vascular bundle.
PO:0000065.label: phloem pole pericycle cell

PO:0004535.definition: A portion of placenta tissue (PO:0025078) that is part of a fruit (PO:0009001) and to which seeds (PO:0009010) are attached.
PO:0004535.label: fruit placenta

PO:0004534.synonyms: par&#233nquima de rayo de la madera (Spanish;exact);ray wood parenchyma (exact);\u653e\u5c04\u72b6\u4e8c\u6b21\u6728\u8cea\u90e8\u67d4\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0004534.definition: A portion of secondary xylem parenchyma (PO:0004532) that is part of a ray system (PO:0025411) and has as parts ray secondary xylem parenchyma cells (PO:0004527).
PO:0004534.label: ray secondary xylem parenchyma

PO:0004533.synonyms: \u8ef8\u65b9\u5411\u4e8c\u6b21\u6728\u90e8\u67d4\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);axial wood parenchyma (exact);par&#233nquima axial de la madera (Spanish;exact)
PO:0004533.definition: A portion of secondary xylem parenchyma (PO:0004532) that is part of an axial system (PO:0025410) and has as parts axial secondary xylem parenchyma cells (PO:0004526).
PO:0004533.label: axial secondary xylem parenchyma

PO:0004532.definition: A portion of parenchyma (PO:0005421) tissue that is part of a portion of secondary xylem (PO:0005848) and has as parts secondary xylem parenchyma cells (PO:0004525).
PO:0004532.label: secondary xylem parenchyma

PO:0004531.definition: Cell on the margin of, and tending to form a sheath around, the procumbent cells of a multi-seriate ray as seen in tangential section.
PO:0004531.label: sheath cell

PO:0004530.definition: Empty upright ray cell of approximately the same height as the procumbent ray cell and occurring in indeterminate horizontal series usually interspersed among the procumbent cells.
PO:0004530.label: tile cell

PO:0020049.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is one of the ultimate segments of a compound leaf (PO:0020043).
PO:0020049.label: leaflet

PO:0002002.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that is the lower-most cell formed after the first division of the plant zygote (PO:0000423) and is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0002002.label: embryo basal cell

PO:0020048.definition: The smaller, in general, of the two kinds of spores produced after meiosis in the life cycle of a heterosporous plant, and on germination giving rise to the male gametophyte.
PO:0020048.label: microspore

PO:0000263.definition: A root epidermal cell (PO:0025164) that develops from an epidermal initial (PO:0000349) and does not have as part a root hair (GO:0035618).
PO:0000263.label: non-hair root epidermal cell

PO:0025032.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that is dead at maturity, lacks specialized wall thickenings or lignin, and has tapered ends that are thin and partially hydrolyzed.
PO:0025032.label: hydroid

PO:0000290.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that has a lignified cell wall with secondary thickening and bordered pits.
PO:0000290.label: tracheary element

PO:0030127.synonyms: diplothyrsoid (exact);monothyrsic inflorescence (exact);indeterminate thyrse (exact);double thyrsoid (exact);pleiothyrsoid (exact);conjunct-hetercladic thyrse (exact);disjunct-heterocladic thyrse (exact);heterocladic thyrse (exact)
PO:0030127.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049) which at anthesis is composed of an indeterminate first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104) and dichasial second order inflorescences (PO:0025240) with pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) and determinate higher order inflorescence axes (PO:0009081).
PO:0030127.label: indeterminate thyrse inflorescence

PO:0005360.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the outermost layer of endosperm (PO:0009089) in a seed (PO:0009010), its cells being characterized by presence of protein bodies (GO:0042735).
PO:0005360.label: aleurone layer

PO:0030125.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with both monopodial and sympodial growth habits, which at anthesis is composed of a determinate first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104) and determinate higher order inflorescence axes (PO:0020122) with pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) that collectively form a concave plane of flowers (PO:0009046).
PO:0030125.label: anthela inflorescence

PO:0030124.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with both monopodial and sympodial growth habits, which at anthesis is composed of a determinate first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104) and determinate higher order inflorescence axes (PO:0020122) with pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) that collectively form a convex plane of flowers (PO:0009046).
PO:0030124.label: corymb inflorescence

PO:0030123.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis (PO:ID) is composed of pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046), or spikelets (PO:0009051), on determinate inflorescence axes (PO:0020122).
PO:0030123.label: panicle inflorescence

PO:0030122.synonyms: compound capitulum (exact);double capitulum (exact);homothetic compound capitulum (narrow);glomerule (narrow);heterothetic double capitulum (narrow);homothetic double capitulum (narrow);heterothetic compound capitulum (narrow);glome (narrow)
PO:0030122.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of a radially enlarged inflorescence axis (PO:0020122) and sessile (PATO:0001436) flowers (PO:0009046) on determinate higher order inflorescence axes (PO:0009081) with basal involucral bracts (PO:0009045).
PO:0030122.label: compound capitulum inflorescence

PO:0008009.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the abaxial/lower portion of the nucellus (PO:0020020) overlying vascular strands in a caryopsis fruit (PO:0030104).
PO:0008009.label: abaxial nucellar projection

PO:0008008.definition: A portion of aleurone layer (PO:0005360) which is morphologically distinct and is located adjacent to the nucellar projection (PO:0008007).
PO:0008008.label: modified aleurone

PO:0008007.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the morphologically distinct portion of the nucellus overlying the vascular strands in the grass caryopsis.
PO:0008007.label: nucellar projection

PO:0008006.definition: A portion of plant tissue that is the morphologically distinct outer layer of the nucellus.
PO:0008006.label: nucellar epidermis

PO:0008005.definition: A nucellus that is part of a fruit.
PO:0008005.label: fruit nucellus

PO:0025564.definition: A tapetum cell (PO:0025543) that is part of a megasporangium tapetum (PO:0025315).
PO:0025564.label: megasporangium tapetum cell

PO:0008003.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue (PO:0009015) in their specific arrangement in a fruit (PO:0009001).
PO:0008003.label: fruit vascular system

PO:0020093.definition: Cell, commonly three in number as in the eight-nucleate embryo sac, located at the other end of the embryo sac from the egg cell.
PO:0020093.label: antipodal cell

PO:0030129.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) on a first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104) with compressed inflorescence axis internodes (PO:0006326).
PO:0030129.label: umbel inflorescence

PO:0030128.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), which at anthesis is composed of an determinate first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104) and dichasial second order inflorescences with pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) and determinate higher order inflorescence axes (PO:0009081).
PO:0030128.label: determinate thyrse inflorescence

PO:0005427.synonyms: \u539a\u819c\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);portion of sclerenchyma tissue (exact);portion of sclerenchymatous tissue (exact);escler&#233nquima (Spanish;exact)
PO:0005427.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) which comprises supporting tissue composed of plant fiber cells (PO:0025407) or sclereid cells (PO:0025418).
PO:0005427.label: sclerenchyma

PO:0005423.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) which comprises living tissue composed of more or less elongated cells with thick, non-lignified primary cell walls.
PO:0005423.label: collenchyma

PO:0025002.definition: A shoot-borne internode root (PO:0025593) that arises from a part of the hypocotyl (PO:0020100).
PO:0025002.label: basal root

PO:0005421.synonyms: portion of parenchyma tissue (exact);par&#233nquima (Spanish;exact);portion of parenchymatous tissue (exact);\u67d4\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0005421.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) composed of polyhedral cells typically with thin, non-lignified cellulosic cell walls and nucleate, living protoplasts.
PO:0005421.label: parenchyma

PO:0025526.definition: A spermatogenous cell (PO:0025525) of the microgametophyte (PO:0025280) that divides to produce a vegetative cell (PO:0020099) and the pollen sperm cell (PO:0025121).
PO:0025526.label: body cell

PO:0009008.definition: A multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025496) that is a functional unit, is a proper part of a whole plant (PO:0000003), and includes portions of plant tissue (PO:0009007) of at least two different types that derive from a common developmental path.
PO:0009008.label: plant organ

PO:0025521.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that produces one or more gametes (PO:0025006) and participates in the gametophyte development stage (PO:0028003).
PO:0025521.label: unicellular plant gametangium

PO:0025459.synonyms: \u901a\u5e38\u306e\uff1f\u4f34\u7d30\u80de  (Japanese;exact);standard companion cell (exact);regular companion cell (exact);c&#233lula ordinaria acompa&#241ante (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025459.definition: A companion cell (PO:0000400) that lacks cell wall invaginations and has few or no plasmodesmata connecting it to adjacent mesophyll cells.
PO:0025459.label: ordinary companion cell

PO:0025458.definition: A companion cell (PO:0000400) that is a transfer cell (PO:0000078) with many cell wall invaginations.
PO:0025458.label: transfer companion cell

PO:0025354.definition: A shoot axis that is flattened and expanded.
PO:0025354.label: cladode

PO:0025355.definition: A shoot system (PO:0009006) that has as parts a short, enlarged stem (PO:0009047) in which the shoot internodes (PO:0005005) do not elongate, and one or more buds (PO:0000055).
PO:0025355.label: corm

PO:0025352.definition: An enlarged leaf base (PO:0020040) that is fused with adjacent shoot axis (PO:0025029) tissue.
PO:0025352.label: tubercle

PO:0025353.definition: An axillary vegetative bud (PO:0004712) that is not elongated, in which the vascular leaves (PO:0009025) develop as spine leaves (PO:0025173).
PO:0025353.label: areole bud

PO:0025350.definition: An awn that is part of a palea.
PO:0025350.label: palea awn

PO:0030063.definition: A axillary hair base that is the basal part of a gametophore axillary hair, below the gametophore axillary hair terminal cell.
PO:0030063.label: gametophore axillary hair base

PO:0000230.definition: A meristem that gives rise to an inflorescence.
PO:0000230.label: inflorescence meristem

PO:0030050.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059)  that has as parts stereid cells (PO:0030045) and no other cell types.
PO:0030050.label: stereome

PO:0000232.definition: A shoot system meristem (PO:0006079) formed in an axil (PO:0025224).
PO:0000232.label: axillary bud meristem

PO:0020132.synonyms: \u67f1\u8ef8\u6839\u51a0\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula de la columela del caliptra de la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact)
PO:0020132.definition: Cell that constitutes the central part of the root cap, arranged in longitudinal files.
PO:0020132.label: columella root cap cell

PO:0025455.synonyms: primary phloem sieve-tube element (exact);\u4e00\u6b21\u5e2b\u90e8 \u5e2b\uff08\u7be9\uff09\u7ba1 (Japanese;exact);elemento de tubo criboso del floema primario (Spanish;exact);primary phloem sieve tube member (exact)
PO:0025455.definition: A sieve tube element (PO:0000289) that is part of a portion of primary phloem (PO:0006075).
PO:0025455.label: primary phloem sieve tube element

PO:0025454.definition: A sieve cell (PO:0025415) that is part of a portion of primary phloem (PO:0006075).
PO:0025454.label: primary phloem sieve cell

PO:0025457.synonyms: elemento de tubo criboso del floema secundario (Spanish;exact);secondary phloem sieve tube member (exact);\u4e8c\u6b21\u5e2b\u90e8\uff08\u5e2b\u7ba1\u90e8\uff09 \u7be9\u7ba1\u8981\u7d20 (Japanese;exact);secondary phloem sieve-tube element (exact)
PO:0025457.definition: A sieve tube element (PO:0000289) that is part of a portion of secondary phloem (PO:0005043).
PO:0025457.label: secondary phloem sieve tube element

PO:0025359.definition: A collective plant organ structure (PO:0025007) on the surface of a vascular leaf (PO:0009025) that has as part a cluster of two or more adjacent sporangia (PO:0025094).
PO:0025359.label: sorus

PO:0004548.definition: A shoot axis tuber (PO:0004543) that develops above ground.
PO:0004548.label: aerial tuber

PO:0000252.synonyms: \u5185\u76ae (Japanese;exact);portion of endodermal tissue (exact);endodermis (Spanish;exact);portion of epidermis tissue (exact)
PO:0000252.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) that is the inner most layer of a cortex (PO:0005708) and has a casparian strip in its anticlinal cell walls.
PO:0000252.label: endodermis

PO:0009054.synonyms: \u82b1\u5e8f\u82de (Japanese;exact);br&#225ctea de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact);squamule (narrow);spathe (narrow);inflorescence bract of ear (narrow);squamella (narrow);squamellae (narrow)
PO:0009054.definition: A bract (PO:0009055) subtending a branch of the inflorescence (PO:0009049) or borne on the inflorescence axis (PO:0020122) below any branch (PO:0025073) or flower (PO:0009046).
PO:0009054.label: inflorescence bract

PO:0004542.definition: A swollen shoot axis (PO:0025029) that grows horizontally at or below the substrate surface and produces shoots above and roots or rhizoids below.
PO:0004542.label: rhizome

PO:0004543.definition: A shoot axis (PO:0025029) that develops from a branch (PO:0025073) and is radially enlarged for storage.
PO:0004543.label: shoot axis tuber

PO:0004540.synonyms: fruit carpophore (exact);columela del fruto (Spanish;exact);\u679c\u5b9f\u67f1\u8ef8 (Japanese;exact);fruit columellae (narrow);fruit columellas (narrow)
PO:0004540.definition: A columella (PO:0025230) that forms the central axis of a fruit.
PO:0004540.label: fruit columella

PO:0025438.definition: A vascular cambium (PO:0005598) that is part of a root (PO:0009005).
PO:0025438.label: root vascular cambium

PO:0004546.definition: A shoot-borne shoot system (PO:0004546) developing from a stem (PO:0009047).
PO:0004546.label: epicormic shoot system

PO:0004547.definition: A shoot axis tuber (PO:0004543) that develops below ground.
PO:0004547.label: subterranean shoot axis tuber

PO:0004544.synonyms: \u6839\u7531\u6765\u82d7\u6761\u7cfb (Japanese;exact);sistema de epiblasto (epiblastema) que nace en la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact)
PO:0004544.definition: A shoot system that is initiated from a root.
PO:0004544.label: root-borne shoot system

PO:0004545.synonyms: \u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u7531\u6765\u82d7\u6761\u7cfb (Japanese;exact);sistema de epiblasto (epiblastema) que nace en el epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact)
PO:0004545.definition: A shoot system that is initiated from a shoot.
PO:0004545.label: shoot-borne shoot system

PO:0030019.synonyms: \u830e\u8449\u4f53\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);gametophore apical cell (exact);gametophore apical initial (exact);c&#233lula apical del gamet&#243foro (Spanish;exact)
PO:0030019.definition: A shoot meristematic apical cell that is part of a gametophore.
PO:0030019.label: gametophore meristematic apical cell

PO:0030018.definition: A shoot system (PO:0009006) that consists of the shoot axes (PO:0025029) and non-vascular leaves (PO:0025075) of a plant in the gametophyte development stage (PO:0028003) .
PO:0030018.label: gametophore

PO:0025408.definition: A portion of vascular tissue (PO:0009015) that develops from a procambium (PO:0025275).
PO:0025408.label: primary vascular tissue

PO:0025566.synonyms: savia del floema del sistema del epiblasto (Spanish;exact);\u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u7d44\u7e54\u5e2b\u7ba1\u6db2 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025566.definition: A phloem sap (PO:0025540) that is located in the shoot system (PO:0009006).
PO:0025566.label: shoot system phloem sap

PO:0020100.definition: A stem internode (PO:0020142) below the cotyledonary node (PO:0025321) and transitional to a root (PO:0009005) of a plant embryo (PO:0009009) or a seedling (PO:0000003).
PO:0020100.label: hypocotyl

PO:0030012.synonyms: vascular leaf apical initial (exact);c&#233lula apical de la hoja vascular (Spanish;exact);vascular leaf apical cell (exact);\u7dad\u7ba1\u675f\u3092\u6301\u3064\u8449\u306e\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0030012.definition: A leaf meristematic apical cell that is part of the leaf apex of a vascular leaf.
PO:0030012.label: vascular leaf meristematic apical cell

PO:0030011.synonyms: leaf apical initial (exact);\u8449\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula apical de la hoja (Spanish;exact);leaf apical cell (exact)
PO:0030011.definition: A shoot meristematic apical cell that is part of a leaf apex.
PO:0030011.label: leaf meristematic apical cell

PO:0020046.definition: A once-compound leaf divided into several leaflets which arise at the same point, there being no rachis.
PO:0020046.label: palmate leaf

PO:0030017.synonyms: sporangium mouth (exact);\u80de\u5b50\u56a2\u53e3 (Japanese;exact);boca de la c&#225psula productora de esporas (Spanish;exact)
PO:0030017.definition: A plant anatomical space that is the opening on the apical end of a spore capsule.
PO:0030017.label: spore capsule mouth

PO:0009068.definition: The part of the stamen that connects the microsporangia/pollen sacs.
PO:0009068.label: connective

PO:0030015.synonyms: sporophytic meristematic apical cell (exact);\u80de\u5b50\u4f53\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula apical esporof&#237tica (Spanish;exact)
PO:0030015.definition: A meristematic apical cell that is part of a whole plant in the sporophytic phase.
PO:0030015.label: sporophyte meristematic apical cell

PO:0025148.definition: A phyllome base (PO:0025140) that is part of a tepal (PO:0009033).
PO:0025148.label: tepal base

PO:0009109.definition: The meristem which gives rise to the female inflorescence or ear in maize.
PO:0009109.label: ear meristem

PO:0009108.definition: A reproductive shoot apical meristem that gives rise to the apical growth of the inflorescence. It develops from the shoot apical meristem (SAM) after it undergoes transition from vegetative to reproductive phase.
PO:0009108.label: inflorescence apical meristem

PO:0000295.synonyms: cambial initial (exact);cambial cell (exact);\u5f62\u6210\u5c64\u59cb\u539f\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula inicial del cambium (Spanish;exact)
PO:0000295.definition: An initial cell (PO:0004011) that is part of the vascular cambium (PO:0005598) or cork cambium (PO:0005599), and by periclinal divisions, produces cells to the outside or inside of the cambial axis.
PO:0000295.label: cambial initial cell

PO:0009052.definition: A flower pedicel (PO:0030113) that bears a flower (PO:0009046) in an inflorescence (PO:0009049).
PO:0009052.label: inflorescence flower pedicel

PO:0009101.definition: The long branch that arise from the central spike of tassel in maize.
PO:0009101.label: long lateral tassel branch

PO:0009100.definition: A collective phyllome structure composed of two or more involucral bracts at the base of a cluster of flowers, as found in Asteraceae or Compositae.
PO:0009100.label: involucre

PO:0009103.synonyms: meristema de la ramificaci&#243n corta del penacho (borla) (Spanish;exact);\u96c4\u7a42\u77ed\u679d\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0009103.definition: The meristem present on either or both the long lateral branch and central spike of a maize tassel that gives rise to short tassel branch.
PO:0009103.label: short tassel branch meristem

PO:0009102.definition: The very short branch that may arise from either or both the long lateral branch and the central spike of tassel in maize.
PO:0009102.label: short tassel branch

PO:0009105.definition: An inflorescence meristem (PO:0009108) that gives rise to a higher order inflorescence axis (PO:0009081).
PO:0009105.label: inflorescence axillary meristem

PO:0009104.synonyms: \u96c4\u7a42\u306e\u9577\u5074\u679d\u306e\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);meristema de la ramificaci&#243n larga del penacho (borla) (Spanish;exact)
PO:0009104.definition: The meristem that gives rise to the long lateral branch in the maize tassel.
PO:0009104.label: long lateral tassel branch meristem

PO:0009107.definition: An inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009105) that gives rise to the long lateral tassel branch (PO:0009101), short tassel branch (PO:0009102), and tassel spikelets (PO:0006309) in a tassel inflorescence (PO:0020126).
PO:0009107.label: tassel inflorescence axillary meristem

PO:0009106.definition: Meristem that gives rise to the apical and lateral structures of the tassel inflorescence in maize.
PO:0009106.label: tassel meristem

PO:0025577.definition: A flower bract (PO:0009034) that is part of the epicalyx (PO:0009063).
PO:0025577.label: epicalyx bract

PO:0030013.synonyms: \u7dad\u7ba1\u675f\u3092\u6301\u305f\u306a\u3044\u8449\u306e\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula apical de la hoja no vascular (Spanish;exact);non-vascular leaf apical initial (exact);non-vascular leaf apical cell (exact);phyllid apical initial (exact);phyllid apical cell (exact)
PO:0030013.definition: A leaf meristematic apical cell (PO:0030011) that is part of a leaf apex of a non-vascular leaf.
PO:0030013.label: non-vascular leaf meristematic apical cell

PO:0025025.definition: A collective plant organ structure (PO:0025007) that produces root meristems (PO:0006085), the plant structures (PO:0009011) that arise from them and the parts thereof.
PO:0025025.label: root system

PO:0025431.definition: A phyllome anlagen (PO:0025430) that will give rise to a vascular leaf primordium (PO:0000017) and is part of a peripheral zone (PO:0000225) of a shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148).
PO:0025431.label: vascular leaf anlagen

PO:0025450.definition: A xylem vessel (PO:0025417) that is part of a primary xylem tissue (PO:0005849).
PO:0025450.label: primary xylem vessel

PO:0025329.synonyms: operculum calyx (exact);calycine operculum (exact);calyx calyptrae (exact;plural);\u861a\u5e3d\u304c\u304f (Japanese;exact);caliptra c&#225liz (Spanish;exact);outer operculum (exact)
PO:0025329.definition: A fused calyx (PO:0025582) that is composed of fused sepals (PO:0025584).
PO:0025329.label: calyptra calyx

PO:0025336.definition: A transition vascular leaf in which the basal portion of the leaf has unifacial lamina development in a median plane, similar to a phyllode, and the apical portion of the leaf develops leaflets similar to a juvenile leaf.
PO:0025336.label: transition phyllode leaf

PO:0025379.definition: A plant anatomical space that is part of a portion of plant tissue between two or more cells.
PO:0025379.label: intercellular space

PO:0004528.synonyms: upright ray wood parenchyma cell (exact);\u76f4\u7acb\u653e\u5c04\u72b6\u4e8c\u6b21\u6728\u90e8\u67d4\u7d44\u7e54\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);rayo par&#233nquim&#225tico vertical de la madera (Spanish;exact)
PO:0004528.definition: A ray secondary xylem parenchyma cell (PO:0004527) that is oriented with its longest dimension parallel to the plant axis (PO:0025004) in which it is found.
PO:0004528.label: upright ray secondary xylem parenchyma cell

PO:0030010.synonyms: c&#233lula apical del eje del epiblasto (Spanish;exact);shoot axis apical cell (exact);\u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u8ef8\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);shoot axis apical initial (exact)
PO:0030010.definition: A shoot meristematic apical cell that is part of a shoot apex.
PO:0030010.label: shoot axis meristematic apical cell

PO:0000309.definition: A portion of parenchyma tissue (PO:0005421) that is part of a nectary (PO:0009035).
PO:0000309.label: nectary parenchyma

PO:0004529.synonyms: procumbent ray wood parenchyma cell (exact);c&#233lula procumbente del rayo de la madera (Spanish;exact);\u5e73\u4f0f\u653e\u5c04\u4e8c\u6b21\u6728\u90e8\u67d4\u7d44\u7e54\u7d30\u80de   (Japanese;exact)
PO:0004529.definition: A ray secondary xylem parenchyma cell (PO:0004527) that is oriented with its longest dimension radial to the plant axis (PO:0025004) in which it is found.
PO:0004529.label: procumbent ray secondary xylem parenchyma cell

PO:0000301.definition: A tracheary element (PO:0000290) that has no perforations in its cell wall.
PO:0000301.label: tracheid

PO:0025518.synonyms: \u8449\u8eab\u6b6f (Japanese;exact);diente de la l\xe1mina de la hoja (Spanish;exact);leaf lamina teeth (exact;plural)
PO:0025518.definition: A phyllome lamina tooth (PO:0025515) that is an angular projection on a leaf margin (PO:0020128) for which the corresponding leaf sinus (PO:0025384) extends less than one quarter of the distance to the center of the long axis of the leaf lamina (PO:0020039).
PO:0025518.label: leaf lamina tooth

PO:0030058.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that develops from a cell in a protonema (PO:0030003) and has a thick cell wall.
PO:0030058.label: brachycyte

PO:0005039.definition: A shoot lateral meristem (PO:0006344) that is part of a shoot axis (PO:0025029) and has a parts multiple layers of meristematic cells (PO:0004010) located near the shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148).
PO:0005039.label: primary thickening meristem

PO:0006035.definition: A portion of epidermis (PO:0005679) that is part of a shoot system (PO:0009006) and arises from the meristem L1 layer (PO:0009020).
PO:0006035.label: shoot system epidermis

PO:0006036.definition: A portion of epidermis (PO:0005679) that is part of a root (PO:0009005).
PO:0006036.label: root epidermis

PO:0025328.synonyms: hoja unifacial EXACT Spanish [POC:Maria_Alejandra_Gandolfo] (Spanish;exact);unifacial leaf (exact);hoja unifacial (exact);\u5358\u9762\u7dad\u7ba1\u675f\u7cfb\u8449 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025328.definition: A vascular leaf that has increased activity of either the adaxial or abaxial meristem early in development, leading to absence of the opposite surface on the mature leaf.
PO:0025328.label: unifacial vascular leaf

PO:0006033.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) which is a short, abrupt, flexible point at the apex of the palea (PO:0009038).
PO:0006033.label: palea apiculus

PO:0005031.definition: A strobilus (PO:0025083) that bears only pollen (PO:0025281).
PO:0005031.label: microsporangiate strobilus

PO:0005030.definition: A glandular trichome (PO:0004509) that synthesizes terpenophenolic resins and prenylflavonoids.
PO:0005030.label: lupulin gland

PO:0030118.synonyms: compound spike (exact);heterothetic compound spike (exact);double spike (exact);heterothetic double spike (narrow);homothetic compound spike (narrow);homothetic double spike (narrow)
PO:0030118.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of an indeterminate first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104) and sessile (PATO:0001436) flowers (PO:0009046), or spikelets (PO:0009051), on indeterminate higher order inflorescence axes (PO:0009081).
PO:0030118.label: compound spike inflorescence

PO:0006039.definition: A portion of root epidermis (PO:0006036) that is part of a shoot-borne root (PO:0000042).
PO:0006039.label: shoot-borne root epidermis

PO:0025006.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that has half the chromosome complement of the sporophyte and is capable of fertilization to create a plant zygote (PO:0000423).
PO:0025006.label: plant gamete

PO:0025533.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) which is vegetative and develops from the division of the microspore (PO:0020048) of vascular plants other than angiosperms.
PO:0025533.label: prothallial cell

PO:0006354.definition: A small, pistillate flower (PO:0025599) that is part of a ear spikelet (PO:0006320).
PO:0006354.label: ear floret

PO:0006488.definition: A collective organ part structure (PO:0025269) that has as parts an elongated stigma (PO:0009073) with stigma papilla (GO:0090397), and an elongated style (PO:0009074).
PO:0006488.label: silk

PO:0006218.definition: A portion of seed coat epidermis (PO:0006048) which is part of the seed coat (PO:0009088) and develops from the outer surface of the inner integument (PO:0020022).
PO:0006218.label: exotegmen

PO:0006219.definition: A portion of seed coat epidermis (PO:0006048) which is part of the seed coat (PO:0009088) and develops from the inner epidermis of the inner integument (PO:0020022).
PO:0006219.label: endotegmen

PO:0006353.synonyms: florete inferior de la espiguilla s&#233sil de la espiga (Spanish;exact);\u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u6709\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u4e0b\u4f4d\u5c0f\u82b1 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006353.definition: An ear floret that is the lower of the two florets of a pedicellate spikelet rachilla of an ear inflorescence.
PO:0006353.label: lower floret of pedicellate spikelet of ear

PO:0006352.synonyms: florete superior de la espiguilla s&#233sil de la espiga (Spanish;exact);\u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u7121\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u4e0a\u4f4d\u5c0f\u82b1 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006352.definition: An ear floret that is one of the two florets placed above the lower floret on a sessile spikelet rachilla of an ear inflorescence.
PO:0006352.label: upper floret of sessile spikelet of ear

PO:0006214.definition: A portion of aerenchyma that is part of a stem.
PO:0006214.label: stem aerenchyma

PO:0006215.definition: A portion of parenchyma tissue containing particularly large intercellular spaces in the leaf mesophyll.
PO:0006215.label: leaf aerenchyma

PO:0006216.definition: A portion of primary phloem tissue positioned internal to the primary xylem.
PO:0006216.label: internal phloem

PO:0006210.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) that is the outer layer of an apical meristem (PO:0020144), or the outer layer of a plant embryo proper (PO:0000001), and gives rise to a portion of epidermis (PO:0005679).
PO:0006210.label: protoderm

PO:0006358.synonyms: par de meristemas del penacho (borla) de la espiguilla (Spanish;exact);\u96c4\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u5c0f\u7a42\u5bfe\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006358.definition: The meristem present on short tassel branch that produces two spikelet meristems, each of which produces two floral meristems in a maize tassel.
PO:0006358.label: tassel spikelet pair meristem

PO:0006212.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) composed of a layer of cells that is part of the abscission zone (PO:0000146) that have lignin and suberin depositions and are found on the axial side of the break or exposed surface of abscission.
PO:0006212.label: protective layer

PO:0006213.definition: Parenchyma tissue containing particularly large intercellular spaces in the tissue of roots.
PO:0006213.label: root aerenchyma

PO:0025567.synonyms: savia del floema del sistema de la raiz (Spanish;exact);\u6839\u7d44\u7e54\u5e2b\u7ba1\u6db2 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025567.definition: A phloem sap (PO:0025540) that is located in the root system (PO:0025025).
PO:0025567.label: root system phloem sap

PO:0000049.synonyms: epidermis abaxial de la l&#225mina de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u8eab\u80cc\u8ef8\u5074\u8868\u76ae (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000049.definition: A portion of leaf lamina epidermis that covers the abaxial/lower surface of a leaf lamina.
PO:0000049.label: leaf lamina abaxial epidermis

PO:0000048.synonyms: \u8449\u8eab\u7dad\u7ba1\u7cfb (Japanese;exact);sistema vascular de la l&#225mina de la hoja (Spanish;exact)
PO:0000048.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a leaf lamina (PO:0020039).
PO:0000048.label: leaf lamina vascular system

PO:0000043.definition: A shoot-borne nodal root (PO:0003005) formed at a stem base (PO:0008039).
PO:0000043.label: crown root

PO:0000042.synonyms: \u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u7d30\u80de\u7531\u6765\u306e\u6839  (Japanese;exact);epiblasto (epiblastema) que se origina en la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);aerial root (narrow);stilt root (narrow)
PO:0000042.definition: A root (PO:0009005) that develops from shoot axis (PO:0025029) tissue.
PO:0000042.label: shoot-borne root

PO:0000041.definition: One of the two types of short cells in the epidermis of grasses and bamboos. It is usually paired with silica cell.
PO:0000041.label: epidermal cork cell

PO:0000040.definition: Enlargement or swelling at position of dormant adventitious root primordium (on the stem), inhabited by nitrogen-fixing bacteria.
PO:0000040.label: adventitious root nodule

PO:0000047.synonyms: epidermis de la l&#225mina de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u8eab\u8868\u76ae (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000047.definition: A portion of leaf epidermis that is part of a leaf lamina.
PO:0000047.label: leaf lamina epidermis

PO:0000046.definition: An embryo root (PO:0000045) formed within the scutellar node (PO:0004708) of the plant embryo (PO:0009009) in some monocotyledonous plants.
PO:0000046.label: seminal root

PO:0000045.definition: A root (PO:0009005) that is initiated in a developing plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0000045.label: embryo root

PO:0000044.definition: A shoot-borne nodal root (PO:0003005) formed at a stem node (PO:0020141) above the ground and growing directly into the soil.
PO:0000044.label: prop root

PO:0025509.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that is the larger, distal cell arising from the first division of an archegonium initial cell (PO:0025510).
PO:0025509.label: archegonium central cell

PO:0025010.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is the edge of a petiole lamina (PO:0025129) and the area immediately internally adjacent to it.
PO:0025010.label: petiole margin

PO:0025028.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0025028.label: embryo plant cell

PO:0025029.definition: A plant axis (PO:0025004) that is part of a shoot system (PO:0009006).
PO:0025029.label: shoot axis

PO:0006109.definition: A maximal portion of parenchyma (PO:0005421) in the center of a shoot axis (PO:0025029) or root (PO:0009005).
PO:0006109.label: pith

PO:0025538.definition: A portion of plant substance (PO:0025161) that is an aqueous solution that can be transported through the apoplast (GO:0048046) or symplast (GO:0055044).
PO:0025538.label: plant sap

PO:0020026.synonyms: \u30ab\u30e9\u30b6\uff08\u5408\u70b9\uff09=\u73e0\u5fc3\u3068\u73e0\u76ae\u304c\u73e0\u67c4\u306b\u3064\u306a\u304c\u308b\u3068\u3053\u308d\u3001\u73e0\u5b54\u306e\u53cd\u5bfe\u5074 (Japanese;exact);ovular chlaza (exact);calaza (Spanish;exact);chalazae (exact;plural);portion of chalaza tissue (exact);chalazas (exact;plural);Poaceae chalaza (narrow);Zea chalaza (narrow)
PO:0020026.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the region in a plant ovule (PO:0020003) where the integuments (PO:0020021) and the nucellus (PO:0020020) join with the funicule (PO:0020006).
PO:0020026.label: chalaza

PO:0030031.definition: A collective phyllome structure that consists of two or more of the most distal perichaetal bracts on a gametophore axis and surround a capsule.
PO:0030031.label: gametophyte perianth

PO:0025443.synonyms: \u6839\u4e8c\u6b21\u80a5\u539a\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);meristema de engrosamiento secundario de la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025443.definition: A secondary thickening meristem (PO:0025414) that is part of a root (PO:0009005).
PO:0025443.label: root secondary thickening meristem

PO:0020019.definition: The larger, in general, of the two kinds of spores produced after meiosis in the life cycle of a heterosporous plant, and on germination giving rise to the female gametophyte (embryo sac).
PO:0020019.label: megaspore

PO:0005032.definition: A strobilus (PO:0025083) that bears only plant ovules (PO:0020003).
PO:0005032.label: megasporangiate strobilus

PO:0020025.definition: A plant anatomical space (PO:0025117) that is enclosed by and forms an opening in an integument at the apex of a plant ovule (PO:0020003).
PO:0020025.label: plant ovule micropyle

PO:0030045.definition: A ground tissue cell with thickened cell walls.
PO:0030045.label: stereid

PO:0008036.definition: A portion of meristem tissue that forms the cortex.
PO:0008036.label: periblem

PO:0025076.definition: An axillary reproductive bud that develops into a strobilus.
PO:0025076.label: axillary strobilus bud

PO:0025075.definition: A leaf (PO:0025034) in a non-vascular plant.
PO:0025075.label: non-vascular leaf

PO:0008035.definition: A meristem forming the core of the axis composed of the primary vascular tissues and associated ground tissue, such as pith and interfascicular regions.
PO:0008035.label: plerome

PO:0025073.synonyms: shoot axis branch (exact);ramificaci&#243n (Spanish;exact);\u679d (Japanese;exact);higher order axis (narrow);branchlet (narrow);twig (narrow);secondary axis (narrow);tertiary axis (narrow)
PO:0025073.definition: A shoot axis (PO:00025029) that develops from an axillary bud meristem (PO:0000232) or from equal divisions of a meristematic apical cell (PO:0030007).
PO:0025073.label: branch

PO:0025072.definition: An axillary bud (PO:0004709) that develops into an reproductive shoot system (PO:0025082).
PO:0025072.label: axillary reproductive bud

PO:0025071.definition: A terminal bud that develops into a reproductive structure.
PO:0025071.label: terminal reproductive bud

PO:0025179.definition: A portion of shoot axis epidermis (PO:0006035) that is part of a branch (PO:0025073).
PO:0025179.label: branch epidermis

PO:0005848.definition: A portion of xylem (PO:0005352) tissue that develops from a vascular cambium (PO:0005598).
PO:0005848.label: secondary xylem

PO:0005849.definition: A portion of xylem (PO:0005352) tissue that develops from the procambium (PO:0025275).
PO:0005849.label: primary xylem

PO:0025174.definition: A stipule that is sclerified and pointed.
PO:0025174.label: spine stipule

PO:0025175.definition: A prickle (PO:0025169) that is part of a leaf (PO:0025034).
PO:0025175.label: leaf prickle

PO:0025172.definition: A branch that is a sclerified, pointed outgrowth.
PO:0025172.label: thorn

PO:0025173.definition: A leaf that is a sclerified and pointed and lacks a lamina.
PO:0025173.label: spine leaf

PO:0025536.definition: A portion of plant cuticle (PO:000022) that forms a ridge, may be overlayed with epicuticular wax (PO:0025388).
PO:0025536.label: plant cuticle ridge

PO:0025171.definition: A prickle (PO:0025169) that is part of a shoot axis (PO:0025029).
PO:0025171.label: shoot axis prickle

PO:0030048.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that has as parts leptoid (PO:0025033) cells and cells of no other types.
PO:0030048.label: leptome

PO:0025273.definition: A portion of shoot axis procambium gives rise to the primary vascular tissue of a stem.
PO:0025273.label: stem procambium

PO:0025272.synonyms: placental septum (exact);false ovary septum (exact);\u5b50\u623f\u9694\u819c  (Japanese;exact);replo (replum) del ovario (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025272.definition: A portion of ovary placenta tissue (PO:0020001) which divides a plant ovary (PO:0009072) into two or more chambers, and develops from contact of the placental tissue from opposite sides of the plant ovary early in gynoecium development (GO:0048467).
PO:0025272.label: plant ovary replum

PO:0025275.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) that undergoes differentiation to form the primary vascular tissue (PO:0025408).
PO:0025275.label: procambium

PO:0025053.definition: A portion of tuber pith (PO:0025052) that is part of a subterranean tuber storage parenchyma (PO:0025038).
PO:0025053.label: subterranean tuber pith

PO:0025277.definition: A microsporangium that is part of a sporophyll and where the pollen grains develop and are located after they develop.
PO:0025277.label: pollen sac

PO:0030049.synonyms: endotecio de la pared del esporangio (Spanish;exact);endothecium of sporangium wall (exact);\u80de\u5b50\u56a2\u58c1\u5185\u76ae (Japanese;exact)
PO:0030049.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) that is the sub-epidermal layer of a sporangium wall (PO:0025306).
PO:0030049.label: sporangium wall endothecium

PO:0025279.definition: A whole plant in the gametophyte development stage (PO:0028003) that produces only plant egg cells (PO:0020094).
PO:0025279.label: megagametophyte

PO:0025278.definition: A scale leaf that grows from a rhizome.
PO:0025278.label: rhizome scale leaf

PO:0020020.definition: A megasporangium (PO:0025201) in a seed plant, composed of fleshy subepidermal tissue that is part of a plant ovule (PO:0020003) and surrounds a megasporocyte (PO:0000431).
PO:0020020.label: nucellus

PO:0025541.synonyms: celula de la vaina del haz vascular (Spanish;exact);\u7dad\u7ba1\u675f\u9798\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025541.definition: A ground tissue cell (PO:0000076) that is part of a bundle sheath (PO:0006023).
PO:0025541.label: bundle sheath cell

PO:0009061.synonyms: androecium of tassel floret (exact);androecio (Spanish;exact);androecium of upper floret of pedicellate spikelet of tassel (exact);androecia (exact;plural);\u96c4\u854a\u7fa4 (Japanese;exact);androecium of lower floret of sessile spikelet of tassel (narrow);androecium of ear floret (narrow);Zea androecium (narrow);androecium of upper floret of pedicellate spikelet of ear (narrow);androecium of lower floret of pedicellate spikelet of ear (narrow);androecium of lower floret of sessile spikelet of ear (narrow);androecium column (narrow);androecium of upper floret of sessile spikelet of tassel (narrow);Poaceae androecium (narrow);androecium of upper floret of sessile spikelet of ear (narrow)
PO:0009061.definition: A collective phyllome structure (PO:0025023) composed all of the stamens (PO:0009029) in a flower (PO:0009046).
PO:0009061.label: androecium

PO:0025151.definition: A phyllome tip that is part of a tepal apex.
PO:0025151.label: tepal tip

PO:0025115.synonyms: fourth order infructescence branch (exact);eje de quinto orden de la infructescencia (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025115.definition: A higher order infructescence axis (PO:0025243) which arises from a fourth order infructescence axis (PO:0025114) and develops from a fifth order inflorescence axis (PO:0025106).
PO:0025115.label: fifth order infructescence axis

PO:0025098.definition: A phyllome trichome that is part of a bract epidermis.
PO:0025098.label: bract trichome

PO:0025403.synonyms: \u8449\u80cc\u8ef8\u5074\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);leaf abaxial unifacial meristem (narrow);leaf abaxial rounding meristem (narrow)
PO:0025403.definition: A portion of phyllome abaxial meristem (PO:0025402) tissue that is found on the abaxial side of a developing vascular leaf (PO:0009025).
PO:0025403.label: vascular leaf abaxial meristem

PO:0025439.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is part of a plant axis (PO:0025004) and has as parts a cambium (PO:0005597) and adjacent cells.
PO:0025439.label: cambial zone

PO:0030059.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) at the base of a gemma (PO:0025614) or adjacent to a brachycyte (PO:0030058) that breaks down to allow abscission of the gemma or brachycyte.
PO:0030059.label: tmema cell

PO:0025539.definition: A plant sap (PO:0025538) that is an aqueous solution which may contain mineral elements, nutrients, and plant hormones, and is transported from the root system (PO:0025025) toward the leaves through the tracheary elements (PO:0000290) of the xylem.
PO:0025539.label: xylem sap

PO:0025568.synonyms: savia del xilema del sistema de la raiz (Spanish;exact);\u6839\u7d44\u7e54\u6728\u90e8\u6a39\u6db2 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025568.definition: A xylem sap (PO:0025539) that is located in the root system (PO:0025025).
PO:0025568.label: root system xylem sap

PO:0025441.definition: A cambial zone that is part of a root (PO:0009005).
PO:0025441.label: root cambial zone

PO:0025152.definition: A portion of branch epidermis that is part of a peduncle.
PO:0025152.label: peduncle epidermis

PO:0009088.synonyms: \u7a2e\u5b50\u7a2e\u76ae (Japanese;exact);cubierta de la semilla (Spanish;exact);portion of seed coat tissue (exact)
PO:0009088.definition: A portion of plant tissue that is the covering of a seed derived from ovular - mainly integumentary - tissue.
PO:0009088.label: seed coat

PO:0009089.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) which is a maximal portion of nutritive plant tissue in a seed (PO:0009010).
PO:0009089.label: endosperm

PO:0025390.definition: A leaf lamina vein (PO:0020138) above the first order that is connected to another vein only at one end.
PO:0025390.label: free ending veinlet

PO:0025391.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is part of a phyllome lamina (PO:0025396) and is completely surrounded by phyllome lamina veins (PO:0025348) and cannot be divided into any smaller parts that are completely surrounded by phyllome lamina veins.
PO:0025391.label: phyllome lamina areole

PO:0030026.definition: A vegetative bud that develops into a gametophore.
PO:0030026.label: gametophore bud

PO:0030027.definition: A whole plant in the gametophytic phase that has a flat growth form and no distinct organs.
PO:0030027.label: thallus

PO:0025394.synonyms: elemento del papu (Spanish;exact);\u51a0\u6bdb\u306e\u8981\u7d20 (Japanese;exact);pappus scale (narrow);pappus awn (narrow);pappus bristle (narrow)
PO:0025394.definition: A cardinal organ part that is a segment of a pappus.
PO:0025394.label: pappus element

PO:0025395.definition: A plant organ (PO:0009008) that is part of a flower (PO:0009046).
PO:0025395.label: floral organ

PO:0009080.definition: The axis of the spikelet, above the glumes.
PO:0009080.label: spikelet rachilla

PO:0009081.definition: An inflorescence axis (PO:0020122) that develops from an inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009105) of an inflorescence axis (PO:0020122).
PO:0009081.label: higher order inflorescence axis

PO:0009082.synonyms: florete de la espiguilla (Spanish;exact);\u5c0f\u7a42\u5c0f\u82b1 (Japanese;exact);Poaceae floret (narrow);grass floret (narrow)
PO:0009082.definition: A small flower (PO:0009046) that is part of a spikelet (PO:0009051).
PO:0009082.label: spikelet floret

PO:0030029.definition: A plant organ that is the base of a whole plant in the sporophytic phase and attaches it to the gametophore.
PO:0030029.label: sporophyte foot

PO:0009084.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the outer layer (wall) of a fruit (PO:0009001), and develops from a plant ovary (PO:0009072) or a carpel (PO:0009030) wall.
PO:0009084.label: pericarp

PO:0009085.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the outer layer of a pericarp (PO:0009084).
PO:0009085.label: exocarp

PO:0009086.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the innermost differentiated layer of a pericarp (PO:0009084).
PO:0009086.label: endocarp

PO:0009087.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the middle layer of a pericarp (PO:0009084).
PO:0009087.label: mesocarp

PO:0025415.definition: A sieve element (PO:0025406) in which the sieve areas are not aggregated into sieve plates (GO:0097218).
PO:0025415.label: sieve cell

PO:0025003.definition: An axillary shoot that develops from a tuber axillary bud.
PO:0025003.label: tuber axillary shoot

PO:0025417.definition: A portion of xylem (PO:0005352) tissue that has as parts a tube-like series of vessel members (PO:0002003), the common walls of which have perforations.
PO:0025417.label: xylem vessel

PO:0025416.definition: A portion of phloem tissue (PO:0005417) that has as parts a series of sieve tube elements (PO:0000289) arranged end to end and interconnected through sieve plates.
PO:0025416.label: sieve tube

PO:0025411.definition: A portion of secondary vascular tissue (PO:0025409) that has as part ray wood parenchyma (PO:0004534) and extends radially in the secondary xylem (PO:0005848) and secondary phloem (PO:0005848) of a plant axis (PO:0025004).
PO:0025411.label: ray system

PO:0025410.definition: A portion of secondary vascular tissue (PO:0025409) that has as parts cells derived from fusiform initials (PO:0000079) and oriented with their longest diameter parallel to a plant axis (PO:0025004).
PO:0025410.label: axial system

PO:0025412.definition: A parenchyma cell (PO:0000074) that is morphologically and physiologically associated with a sieve cell (PO:0025415) but does is not derived from the same initial cell (PO:0004011) as the sieve cell.
PO:0025412.label: albuminous cell

PO:0025554.definition: A portion of protoxylem (PO:0000272) tissue in which the maturation of primary xylem (PO:0005849) progresses centripetally, the oldest elements (protoxylem) are farthest from the center of the plant axis (PO:0025004).
PO:0025554.label: exarch protoxylem

PO:0008021.definition: A leaf lamina vein (PO:0020138) arising from a secondary leaf vein (PO:0020140).
PO:0008021.label: tertiary leaf vein

PO:0025008.definition: A phyllome margin (PO:0025018) which is part of a petal (PO:0009032).
PO:0025008.label: petal margin

PO:0025557.definition: A portion of protoxylem (PO:0000272) tissue in which the maturation of primary xylem (PO:0005849) of the shoot system (PO:0009006) progresses centrifugally, with the oldest elements (protoxylem) towards the center of the plant axis (PO:0025004).
PO:0025557.label: endarch protoxylem

PO:0025419.definition: A fiber tracheid (PO:0000355) that has as parts one or more thin internal partitions or septa.
PO:0025419.label: septate fiber tracheid

PO:0025418.definition: A sclerenchyma cell (PO:0000077) with many pits in the secondary cell wall.
PO:0025418.label: sclerid cell

PO:0025552.definition: A portion of protoxylem (PO:0000272) tissue in which the maturation of primary xylem of the shoot system progresses centrifugally with the oldest elements (protoxylem) in the center of the axis.
PO:0025552.label: centarch protoxylem

PO:0025553.definition: A portion of protoxylem (PO:0000272) tissue in which the maturation of primary xylem (PO:0005849) of the shoot system (PO:0009006) progresses both centripetally and centrifugally from the center.
PO:0025553.label: mesarch protoxylem

PO:0009067.definition: A stalk  (PO:0025066) that is part of a stamen (PO:0009029).
PO:0009067.label: filament

PO:0008018.definition: A vascular leaf that is part of an heteroblastic series, and is characterized by anatomical features that are intermediate between juvenile and adult leaves.
PO:0008018.label: transition vascular leaf

PO:0030083.definition: A protonema sub-apical initial hat gives rise to a gametophore bud.
PO:0030083.label: gametophore bud initial cell

PO:0025392.definition: A phyllome lamina areole (PO:0025391) that is part of a leaf lamina (PO:0020039) and is completely surrounded by leaf lamina veins (PO:0020138) and cannot be divided into any smaller parts that are completely surrounded by leaf lamina veins.
PO:0025392.label: leaf lamina areole

PO:0008019.synonyms: base de la l&#225mina de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u8eab\u57fa\u90e8 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0008019.definition: The region of the leaf lamina proximal to the stem and usually connected to it by means of a petiole.
PO:0008019.label: leaf lamina base

PO:0025082.definition: A shoot system (PO:0009006) in the sporophytic phase that has as part at least one sporangium (PO:0025094).
PO:0025082.label: reproductive shoot system

PO:0025118.definition: A plant anatomical space that is a pore at the apex of an anther.
PO:0025118.label: anther pore

PO:0030093.synonyms: septifragal capsule (exact);c\xe1psula sept\xedfraga (exact;Spanish);c\xe1psula septicida (exact;Spanish);septizide kapsel (exact;German);septicidal capsule (exact)
PO:0030093.definition: A capsule fruit (PO:0030091) which dehisces through a fruit septa (PO:0025268).
PO:0030093.label: septicidal capsule fruit

PO:0030132.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a sympodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of determinate inflorescence axes (PO:0020122) with pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046), with the latest-developing flowers on the highest order inflorescence axis.
PO:0030132.label: cincinnus inflorescence

PO:0006307.definition: A portion of procambium (PO:0025275) tissue that undergoes differentiation to form the primary vascular tissue (PO:0025408) of a root (PO:0009005).
PO:0006307.label: root procambium

PO:0004509.definition: A trichome (PO:0000282) that secretes or sequesters a portion of plant substance (PO:0025161).
PO:0004509.label: glandular trichome

PO:0030057.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) located at the base of a non-vascular leaf (PO:0025075) adjacent to where the leaf attaches to the stem (PO:0009047).
PO:0030057.label: alar cell

PO:0009065.definition: A cup- or tube-shaped cardinal organ part, bearing perianth and stamens on its rim, so these arise above the base, and often above the top, of the ovary.
PO:0009065.label: hypanthium

PO:0030055.definition: A gametophore axis that is a leafless extension of a gametophore stem or branch on which a sporophyte is borne.
PO:0030055.label: pseudopodium

PO:0030054.definition: A portion of parenchyma tissue that forms a circular membrane extending from a spore capsule columella and attached to the ends of the peristome teeth that covers a spore capsule mouth.
PO:0030054.label: epiphragm

PO:0030053.synonyms: antheridium wall (exact);sterile jacket layer (exact);antheridial jacket layer (exact);capa de la cubierta del anteridio (Spanish;exact);\u9020\u7cbe\u5668\u88ab\u8986\u5c64 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0030053.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is a single layer of cells on the outside of an antheridium (PO:0025125).
PO:0030053.label: antheridium jacket layer

PO:0009038.synonyms: palea of lower floret of sessile spikelet of ear (exact);palea (Spanish;exact);\u5185\u9834 (Japanese;exact);palea of tassel floret (narrow);palea of ear floret (narrow);palea of lower floret of sessile spikelet of tassel (narrow);palea of lower floret of pedicellate spikelet of ear (narrow);palea of upper floret of pedicellate spikelet of tassel (narrow);palea of upper floret of sessile spikelet of tassel (narrow);palea of lower floret of pedicellate spikelet of tassel (narrow);palea of upper floret of sessile spikelet of ear (narrow);palea of upper floret of pedicellate spikelet of ear (narrow)
PO:0009038.definition: The upper (distal), usually smaller, of the pair of flower bracts (PO:0009034) enclosing a (PO:0009082) spikelet floret.
PO:0009038.label: palea

PO:0030051.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is an axial strand in the center of a gametophore axis (PO:0030020) or seta (PO:0030032) and has as part a hydrome (PO:0030047) or a leptome (PO:0030048).
PO:0030051.label: central strand

PO:0030119.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of  indeterminate first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104) and sessile (PATO:0001436), unisexual flowers (PO:0009046) that are each subtended by conspicuous (PATO:0000463) inflorescence bracts (PO:0009054).
PO:0030119.label: catkin inflorescence

PO:0009035.definition: A portion of secretory tissue (PO:0005656) which is a multicellular glandular structure secreting a liquid containing organic substances, including sugars.
PO:0009035.label: nectary

PO:0030134.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a sympodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) on determinate inflorescence axes (PO:0020122), each of which develop at a branch angle (PATO:1000009) of approximately 90 degree angles from each higher inflorescence axis (PO:0009081).
PO:0030134.label: bostryx inflorescence

PO:0009037.synonyms: \u5916\u9834 (Japanese;exact);lemmas (exact;plural);lemma del florete del penacho (borla) o de la espiga (Spanish;exact);lemmata (exact;plural);lemma (Spanish;exact);lemma of upper floret of sessile spikelet of ear (narrow);lemma of lower floret of pedicellate spikelet of ear (narrow);lemma of upper floret of pedicellate spikelet of tassel (narrow);lemma of upper floret of sessile spikelet of tassel (narrow);lemma of upper floret of pedicellate spikelet of ear (narrow);lemma of lower floret of sessile spikelet of ear (narrow);lemma of lower floret of pedicellate spikelet of tassel (narrow);lemma of lower floret of sessile spikelet of tassel (narrow);lemma of tassel floret (narrow);lemma of ear floret (narrow)
PO:0009037.definition: The lower, usually larger, of the pair of flower bracts (PO:0009034) enclosing a (PO:0009082) spikelet floret.
PO:0009037.label: lemma

PO:0009036.synonyms: squamule (exact);lod&#237culo (Spanish;exact);\u9c57\u88ab (Japanese;exact);squamella (exact);squamellae (exact;plural);lodiculus (exact);lodicule of ear floret (narrow);lodicule of tassel floret (narrow)
PO:0009036.definition: A phyllome that is part of a grass floret and is one of two or three tiny scales or flaps of tissue outside the stamens.
PO:0009036.label: lodicule

PO:0009031.definition: A phyllome (PO:0006001) that is usually green, and is part of the calyx (PO:0009060).
PO:0009031.label: sepal

PO:0009030.definition: A megasporophyll, almost always at the center of a flower, its margins more or less fused together or with other carpels to enclose the ovule(s).
PO:0009030.label: carpel

PO:0025480.synonyms: primordio del eje  del epiblasto de la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);\u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u7d30\u80de\u7531\u6765\u306e\u6839\u539f\u57fa\uff08\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09 (Japanese;exact);portion of shoot-borne root primordium tissue (exact)
PO:0025480.definition: A root primordium (PO:0005029) that is committed to the development of a shoot-borne root (PO:0000042).
PO:0025480.label: shoot-borne root primordium

PO:0009032.definition: A phyllome (PO:0006001) that is part of the corolla (PO:0009059), and is usually colored (not green).
PO:0009032.label: petal

PO:0030097.definition: A circumscissile capsule fruit (PO:0030096) which at maturity contains one seed (PO:0009010) that is not attached to a pericarp (PO:0009084).
PO:0030097.label: utricle capsule fruit

PO:0005772.definition: The sub-epidermal layer or layers of cells of the root similar in structure and cytochemical characteristics of the endodermis, the outermost layer or layers of cells of the cortex.
PO:0005772.label: exodermis

PO:0009011.definition: An anatomical structure that is or was part of a plant, or was derived from a part of a plant.
PO:0009011.label: plant structure

PO:0025161.definition: A portion of organism substance that is or was part of a plant.
PO:0025161.label: portion of plant substance

PO:0030092.definition: A capsule fruit (PO:0030091) which at maturity dehisces through fruit locules (PO:0025270).
PO:0030092.label: loculicidal capsule fruit

PO:0009010.definition: A multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025496) that develops from a plant ovule (PO:0020003) and has as parts a plant embryo (PO:0009009) enclosed in a seed coat (PO:0009088).
PO:0009010.label: seed

PO:0030008.synonyms: root apical cell (exact);root apical initial (exact);c&#233lula apical de la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);\u6839\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0030008.definition: A sporophyte meristematic apical cell that is part of a root tip.
PO:0030008.label: root meristematic apical cell

PO:0030110.definition: A berry fruit (PO:0030108) which develops from an inferior gynoecium (PO:0009062) and at maturity comprises a fleshy exocarp (PO:0009085), fleshy mesocarp (PO:0009087), and hardened endocarp (PO:0009086) and has as a part a fleshy hypanthium (PO:0009065) which is indistinct from the exocarp (PO:0009085).
PO:0030110.label: pome fruit

PO:0025160.synonyms: bract internal face (exact);\u82de\u5411\u8ef8\u5074 \u8868\u76ae (Japanese;exact);epidermis adaxail de la br&#225ctea (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025160.definition: A portion of bract epidermis that covers the adaxial/upper surface of a bract.
PO:0025160.label: bract adaxial epidermis

PO:0025309.definition: A sporangium wall endothecium (PO:0030049) that is part of a microsporangium wall (PO:0025307).
PO:0025309.label: microsporangium endothecium

PO:0000349.synonyms: epidermal initial (exact);c&#233lula inicial de la epidermis (Spanish;exact);\u8868\u76ae\u59cb\u539f\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000349.definition: An initial cell (PO:0004011) that is part of an epidermis (PO:0005679) and gives rise to specialized cell types of the epidermis.
PO:0000349.label: epidermal initial cell

PO:0025406.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that is part of a portion of phloem tissue (PO:0005417), has sieve areas in its walls, and lacks a nucleus in its mature protoplast.
PO:0025406.label: sieve element

PO:0025301.synonyms: conjunci&#243n del hipoc&#243tile-ra&#237z en la pl&#225ntula (Spanish;exact);\u5b9f\u751f\u80da\u8ef8-\u6839\u5408\u6d41\u70b9 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025301.definition: A hypocotyl-root junction (PO:0004724) that develops from an embryo hypocotyl-root junction (PO:0025300) .
PO:0025301.label: seedling hypocotyl-root junction

PO:0025300.synonyms: embryonic hypocotyl-root junction (exact);conjunci&#243n del hipoc&#243tile-ra&#237z en el embri&#243n (Spanish;exact);\u80da\u4e0b\u80da\u8ef8-\u6839\u5408\u6d41\u70b9 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025300.definition: A hypocotyl-root junction (PO:0004724) that is part of an plant embryo axis (PO:0019018).
PO:0025300.label: embryo hypocotyl-root junction

PO:0025303.definition: A plant embryo (PO:0009009) that forms as a result of the fusion of gametes.
PO:0025303.label: zygotic plant embryo

PO:0025302.definition: A plant embryo (PO:0009009) that arises from previously differentiated somatic cells, rather than from fused gametes, i.e. the plant zygote (PO:0000423).
PO:0025302.label: somatic plant embryo

PO:0025305.synonyms: embri&#243n cultivado derivado de la microspora vegetal (Spanish;exact);\u5c0f\u80de\u5b50\u7531\u6765\u57f9\u990a\u690d\u7269\u80da (Japanese;exact);microspore-derived haploid embryo (exact)
PO:0025305.definition: A cultured somatic plant embryo that develops from isolated microspores.
PO:0025305.label: microspore-derived cultured plant embryo

PO:0025304.synonyms: embri&#243n cultivado derivado del cigoto vegetal (Spanish;exact);cultured zygotic embryo (exact);\u57f9\u990a\u63a5\u5408\u5b50\u7531\u6765\u690d\u7269\u80da (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025304.definition: A zygotic plant embryo that is grown or maintained in vitro.
PO:0025304.label: cultured zygote-derived plant embryo

PO:0025307.definition: A sporangium wall (PO:0025306) that is part of a microsporangium (PO:0025202).
PO:0025307.label: microsporangium wall

PO:0025306.synonyms: sporangium jacket layer (exact);sporangium jacket layers (exact);pared del esporangio (Spanish;exact);\u80de\u5b50\u56a2\u58c1 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025306.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is composed of the outer layers of a sporangium (PO:0025094) and bounds the archesporium (PO:0030074) or plant spores (PO:0025017).
PO:0025306.label: sporangium wall

PO:0006070.definition: The chloroplast-containing, photosynthetic parenchymatous tissue situated between the two epidermal layers of the leaf or leaf like organs.
PO:0006070.label: mesophyll

PO:0006071.definition: The chloroplast-containing, photosynthetic parenchymatous tissue situated between the two epidermal layers of the petal.
PO:0006071.label: petal mesophyll

PO:0006072.definition: The chloroplast-containing, photosynthetic parenchymatous tissue situated between the two epidermal layers of the sepal.
PO:0006072.label: sepal mesophyll

PO:0006073.definition: A shoot system meristem (PO:0006079) that is intercalated between two portions of non-meristematic tissue and results in an increase in length as part of primary growth.
PO:0006073.label: intercalary meristem

PO:0006075.definition: A portion of phloem (PO:0005417) tissue that develops from the procambium (PO:0025275).
PO:0006075.label: primary phloem

PO:0006076.definition: A portion of primary phloem (PO:0006075) tissue that has as parts companion cells (PO:0000071, in angiosperms) or albuminous cells (PO:0025412, in gymnosperms) associated with the sieve elements (PO:0025406) and that develops after the protophloem (PO:0006077).
PO:0006076.label: metaphloem

PO:0006077.definition: A portion of primary phloem (PO:0006075) tissue has as parts the first-formed sieve elements (PO:0025406) at a particular location and does not have companion cells (PO:0000071, in angiosperms) or albuminous cells (PO:0025412, in gymnosperms) associated with the sieve elements.
PO:0006077.label: protophloem

PO:0006079.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) that is part of a shoot system (PO:0009006).
PO:0006079.label: shoot system meristem

PO:0025093.synonyms: anillo de la c&#225psula de musgos (Spanish;exact);\u80de\u5b50\u84b4\uff08\u3055\u304f\uff09\u74b0\u5e2f (Japanese;exact);capsule dehiscence zone (exact);spore capusule annuli (exact;plural)
PO:0025093.definition: A dehiscence zone (PO:0025092) that is part of a spore capsule.
PO:0025093.label: spore capsule annulus

PO:0025092.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is part of a plant structure and consists of a narrow band of cells that undergoes dehiscence upon maturation of the structure.
PO:0025092.label: dehiscence zone

PO:0025095.definition: A portion of parenchyma tissue (PO:0005421) that is part of a root (PO:0009005).
PO:0025095.label: root parenchyma

PO:0025094.definition: A plant organ (PO:0009008) in which plant spores (PO:0025017) are produced.
PO:0025094.label: sporangium

PO:0025097.definition: A portion of phyllome epidermis (PO:0025157) that is part of a stamen (PO:0009029).
PO:0025097.label: stamen epidermis

PO:0025096.definition: A portion of phyllome epidermis (PO:0025157) that is part of a carpel (PO:0009030).
PO:0025096.label: carpel epidermis

PO:0020003.definition: A plant organ (PO:0009008) that has as parts a nucellus (PO:0020020) in which a female gametophyte (PO:0025279) is located, one or two integuments (PO:0020021), and a funicle (PO:0020006).
PO:0020003.label: plant ovule

PO:0008017.definition: A more or less abrupt swelling, especially at the apex or base of a leaf sheath.
PO:0008017.label: leaf sheath pulvinus

PO:0025259.definition: A portion of shoot procambium (PO:0025276) tissue that is part of a vascular leaf (PO:0009025).
PO:0025259.label: leaf procambium

PO:0030111.definition: A berry fruit (PO:0030108) which develops from an inferior carpel (PO:0009030) and at maturity comprises a fleshy exocarp (PO:0009085), fleshy mesocarp (PO:0009087), and fleshy endocarp (PO:0009086), and has as a part a hard receptacle (PO:0009064) which surrounds, and is indistinct from, the exocarp (PO:0009085).
PO:0030111.label: pepo fruit

PO:0006090.definition: A cultured plant callus that is capable of forming plant organs.
PO:0006090.label: organogenic callus

PO:0006091.definition: A cultured plant callus (PO:0000009) that is capable of forming somatic embryos.
PO:0006091.label: embryogenic callus

PO:0020002.synonyms: \u846f\u58c1\u5185\u76ae (Japanese;exact);endotecio de la pared the la antera (Spanish;exact);pollen sac endothecium (exact);Zea endothecium (narrow);Poaceae endothecium (narrow)
PO:0020002.definition: An microsporangium endothecium (PO:0025309) that part of an anther wall (PO:0000002).
PO:0020002.label: anther wall endothecium

PO:0000007.synonyms: c&#233lula cultivada de hoja (Spanish;exact);leaf-derived cultured cell (exact);\u8449\u7531\u6765\u690d\u7269\u57f9\u990a\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000007.definition: A cultured plant cell that was derived from leaf tissue.
PO:0000007.label: leaf-derived cultured plant cell

PO:0000006.definition: A cultured plant cell from which the entire plant cell wall has been removed.
PO:0000006.label: plant protoplast

PO:0000005.definition: A plant cell (PO:0009002) that is grown or maintained in vitro.
PO:0000005.label: cultured plant cell

PO:0000004.definition: A plant structure (PO:0009011) that is grown or maintained in vitro.
PO:0000004.label: in vitro plant structure

PO:0000003.definition: A plant structure (PO:0005679) which is a whole organism.
PO:0000003.label: whole plant

PO:0000002.synonyms: \u846f\u58c1 (Japanese;exact);pollen sac wall (exact);pared de la antera (Spanish;exact);Poaceae anther wall (narrow);Zea anther wall (narrow)
PO:0000002.definition: A microsporangium wall (PO:0025307) that is part of an anther (PO:0009066).
PO:0000002.label: anther wall

PO:0000001.definition: An embryonic plant structure (PO:0025099) that is the body of a developing plant embryo (PO:0009009) attached to the maternal tissue in an plant ovule (PO:0020003) by a suspensor (PO:0020108).
PO:0000001.label: plant embryo proper

PO:0025563.definition: A portion of root exarch protoxylem (PO:0025555) tissue in which the primary xylem (PO:0005849) of the root system (PO:0025025) has more than five protoxylem strands or poles, and differentiation progresses centripetally, with the oldest elements (protoxylem) farthest from the center of the plant axis (PO:0025004).
PO:0025563.label: polyarch protoxylem

PO:0025600.definition: A flower (PO:0009046) that includes as part an androecium (PO:0009061), and the gynoecium (PO:0009062) is absent or has aborted during development.
PO:0025600.label: staminate flower

PO:0025512.definition: A collective organ part structure (PO:0025269) that is a slender, hollow extension of a corolla and has as parts segments of two more fused petals.
PO:0025512.label: corolla spur

PO:0000009.definition: A plant callus (PO:0005052) grown or maintained in vitro.
PO:0000009.label: cultured plant callus

PO:0000008.synonyms: c&#233lula cultivada de ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);root-derived cultured cell (exact);\u6839\u7531\u6765\u690d\u7269\u57f9\u990a\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000008.definition: A cultured plant cell that was derived from root tissue.
PO:0000008.label: root-derived cultured plant cell

PO:0006034.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is the edge of a leaflet (PO:0020049) and the area immediately internally adjacent to it.
PO:0006034.label: leaflet margin

PO:0025311.definition: An exothecium that is part of a microsporangium wall.
PO:0025311.label: microsporangium exothecium

PO:0025482.definition: A phyllome anlagen (PO:0025430) that will give rise to a bract primordium (PO:0025487) and is part of a peripheral zone (PO:000225) of a reproductive shoot apical meristem (PO:0008028).
PO:0025482.label: bract anlagen

PO:0030039.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is the elongated, apical part of an archegonium (PO:0025126).
PO:0030039.label: archegonium neck

PO:0025478.synonyms: primordium del androecio (Spanish;exact);\u96c4\u854a\u7fa4\u539f\u57fa(\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09 (Japanese;exact);portion of androecium primordium tissue (exact)
PO:0025478.definition: A floral structure primordium (PO:0025477) that is committed to the development of an androecium (PO:0009061).
PO:0025478.label: androecium primordium

PO:0025592.definition: A phyllome founder cell (PO:0025586) that is part of a vascular leaf anlagen (PO:0025431).
PO:0025592.label: vascular leaf founder cell

PO:0006416.definition: This is the ultimate branch of the pedicellate tassel spikelet.
PO:0006416.label: pedicel of tassel spikelet

PO:0006417.definition: A peduncle of a maize tassel, below the lowest tassel node.
PO:0006417.label: tassel peduncle

PO:0006415.synonyms: \u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u5c0f\u82b1\u67c4 (Japanese;exact);pedicelo de la espiguilla de la espiga (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006415.definition: This is the ultimate branch of the pedicellate ear spikelet.
PO:0006415.label: pedicel of ear spikelet

PO:0005679.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) composed of epidermal cells (PO:0004013) that develops from the protoderm (PO:0006210) and covers the surface of a plant structure (PO:0009011).
PO:0005679.label: epidermis

PO:0025234.definition: A stomatal pore that is part of a phyllome stomatal complex.
PO:0025234.label: phyllome stomatal pore

PO:0025513.definition: A lamina (PO:0025060) that is part of a plant organ (PO:0009008).
PO:0025513.label: plant organ lamina

PO:0000191.definition: Cell, usually two in number, in the micropylar end of the embryo sac of angiosperms associated with the egg in the egg apparatus.
PO:0000191.label: synergid

PO:0025315.definition: A tapetum (PO:0025313) that is part of a megasporangium wall (PO:0025308).
PO:0025315.label: megasporangium tapetum

PO:0025397.definition: A leaf mesophyll intercellular space that is part of a palisade mesophyll.
PO:0025397.label: palisade mesophyll intercellular space
