PO:0025237.definition: A phyllome guard cell that is part of a leaf stomatal complex.
PO:0025237.label: leaf guard cell

PO:0006418.definition: A peduncle of a maize ear, below the lowest ear node.
PO:0006418.label: ear peduncle

PO:0025604.definition: An epidermal cell (PO:0004013) that secretes plant resin (PO:0025603), and may line resin canals (PO:0005665) and/or be associated with resin blisters (or cysts).
PO:0025604.label: resin cell

PO:0025605.definition: An abscission zone (PO:0000146) that forms as a swelling or joint on a fruit pedicel (PO:0030114).
PO:0025605.label: fruit pedicel abscission zone

PO:0025606.definition: A plant cell (PO:0009002) that is either part of a multicellular whole plant (PO:0000003) 'in vivo' or a unicellular organism 'in natura' (i.e. part of a natural environment).
PO:0025606.label: native plant cell

PO:0025607.definition: A shoot system (PO:0009006) that has as parts only vegetative tissues and organs.
PO:0025607.label: vegetative shoot system

PO:0006328.synonyms: par de meristemas de la espiguilla (Spanish;exact);\u5c0f\u7a42\u5bfe\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006328.definition: The meristem that produces two spikelet meristems, each of which produces two floral meristems.
PO:0006328.label: spikelet pair meristem

PO:0025601.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049) that includes as part only staminate flowers (PO:0025600).
PO:0025601.label: staminate inflorescence

PO:0030038.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is the enlarged basal part of an archegonium (PO:0025126) and has an archegonium egg cell (PO:0025122) located in it.
PO:0030038.label: venter

PO:0025603.definition: A portion of plant substance (PO:0025161) that consists of a complex mixture of organic aromatic compounds such as mono-, sesqui-, and diterpenoids.
PO:0025603.label: plant resin

PO:0006324.synonyms: espiga central del penacho (borla) de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact);\u96c4\u7a42(\u82b1\uff09\u4e2d\u592e\u306e\u7a42 (Japanese;exact);central axis of tassel inflorescence (exact);tassel rachis (exact)
PO:0006324.definition: A first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104) that is the primary axis of a tassel inflorescence (PO:0020126).
PO:0006324.label: first order tassel inflorescence axis

PO:0006325.definition: A shoot axis node (PO:0005004) that is part of an inflorescence axis (PO:0020122).
PO:0006325.label: inflorescence axis node

PO:0006326.definition: A shoot axis internode (PO:0005005) that is part of an inflorescence axis (PO:0020122).
PO:0006326.label: inflorescence axis internode

PO:0025236.definition: A guard cell that is part of a phyllome stomatal complex.
PO:0025236.label: phyllome guard cell

PO:0025608.definition: An abscission zone (PO:0000146) that forms as a swelling or joint on a flower pedicel (PO:0030113).
PO:0025608.label: flower pedicel abscission zone

PO:0025230.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that forms the central axis of a plant structure such as a fruit (PO:0009001) or moss capsule (sporangium; PO:0025094).
PO:0025230.label: columella

PO:0025233.synonyms: tejido embri&#243nico vegetal (Spanish;exact);portion of embryonic plant tissue (exact);\u690d\u7269\u80da\u6027\u7d44\u7e54 \u306e\u4e00\u90e8   (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025233.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0025233.label: portion of embryo plant tissue

PO:0025609.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that forms a tough, protective outer layer on a shoot axis and includes as parts a shoot axis hypodermis (PO:0005057) and a shoot axis epidermis (PO:0000112).
PO:0025609.label: shoot axis tegument layer

PO:0025613.definition: A petiole (PO:0020038) that is sclerified and persistent.
PO:0025613.label: spine petiole

PO:0009069.definition: A collective plant organ structure (PO:0025007) that is part of an anther (PO:0009066) and consists of a pair of sporangia (PO:0025094) that dehisce down a common slit.
PO:0009069.label: anther theca

PO:0006322.synonyms: secondary inflorescence branch (exact);second order inflorescence branch (exact);eje de tercero orden de la inflorescencia  (Spanish;exact);second order paraclade (exact)
PO:0006322.definition: A higher order inflorescence axis (PO:0009081) that develops from an inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009105) of a second order inflorescence axis (PO:0006322).
PO:0006322.label: third order inflorescence axis

PO:0025514.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is a projection on a phyllome margin (PO:0025018) for which the corresponding phyllome sinus (PO:0025383) extends one quarter or more of the distance to the center of the long axis of the phyllome lamina (PO:0025396).
PO:0025514.label: phyllome lamina lobe

PO:0025599.definition: A flower (PO:0009046) that includes as part a single carpel (PO:0009030) or a gynoecium (PO:0009062), but the androecium (PO:0009061) is absent or has aborted during development.
PO:0025599.label: pistillate flower

PO:0003020.synonyms: \u5074\u6839\u306e\u5074\u6839\u51a0 (Japanese;exact);caliptra de la ra&#237z lateral de la ra&#237z lateral (Spanish;exact)
PO:0003020.definition: A lateral root cap that is part of a root cap of lateral root.
PO:0003020.label: lateral root cap of lateral root

PO:0003021.synonyms: \u4e00\u6b21\u6839\u306e\u4e2d\u5fc3\u6839\u51a0 (Japanese;exact);caliptra de la ra&#237z central de la ra&#237z primaria (Spanish;exact)
PO:0003021.definition: A central root cap that is part of a root cap of primary root.
PO:0003021.label: central root cap of primary root

PO:0003022.synonyms: caliptra de la ra&#237z lateral de la ra&#237z primaria (Spanish;exact);\u4e00\u6b21\u6839\u306e\u5074\u6839\u51a0 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0003022.definition: A central root cap that is part of a root cap of primary root.
PO:0003022.label: lateral root cap of primary root

PO:0006323.definition: An inflorescence branch (PO:0009081) arising on a first order tassel inflorescence axis (PO:0006324) or from a higher order inflorescence branch (PO:0009081) that is part of a tassel inflorescence (PO:0020126).
PO:0006323.label: tassel inflorescence branch

PO:0003024.definition: A branch that is slender, prostrate or trailing and above-ground and produces roots and sometimes erect shoots at its nodes.
PO:0003024.label: stolon

PO:0030095.definition: A capsule fruit (PO:0030091) which at maturity dehisces through pores on a pericarp (PO:0009084).
PO:0030095.label: poricidal capsule fruit

PO:0008001.definition: A cardinal part of multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025498) that is the end of a fruit (PO:0009001) distal from a fruit pedicel (PO:0004536).
PO:0008001.label: fruit distal end

PO:0000071.definition: A parenchyma cell (PO:0000074) that is adjacent to a sieve tube element (PO:0000289) and arises from the same phloem mother cell (PO:0000400) as the sieve tube element.
PO:0000071.label: companion cell

PO:0000076.definition: A parenchyma cell containing chloroplasts; a component of leaf mesophyll and other green parenchyma tissue.
PO:0000076.label: chlorenchyma cell

PO:0000077.definition: A ground tissue cell (PO:0025030) with a lignified secondary cell wall.
PO:0000077.label: sclerenchyma cell

PO:0000074.definition: A relatively unspecialized ground tissue cell with a nucleate protoplast.
PO:0000074.label: parenchyma cell

PO:0000075.definition: An elongated plant cell with unevenly thickened non-lignified primary walls that is alive at maturity.
PO:0000075.label: collenchyma cell

PO:0025617.definition: A portion of carpel epidermis (PO:0025096) that covers the abaxial surface of a carpel (PO:0009030).
PO:0025617.label: carpel abaxial epidermis

PO:0000078.definition: A cell with wall ingrowths (or invaginations) that increase the surface of the plasmalemma.
PO:0000078.label: transfer cell

PO:0000079.definition: An elongated cambial initial cell (PO:0000295) with approximately wedge-shaped ends that is part of the vascular cambium (PO:0005598) and gives rise to axial cells.
PO:0000079.label: fusiform initial cell

PO:0025231.synonyms: columela de la c&#225psula de musgo (Spanish;exact);\u30b3\u30b1\u985e\u3000\u84b4\uff08\u3055\u304f\uff09\u8ef8\u67f1 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025231.definition: A columella (PO:0025230) that forms the central axis of a spore capsule.
PO:0025231.label: spore capsule columella

PO:0030091.definition: A fruit (PO:0009001) which develops from a gynoecium (PO:0009062) and at maturity comprises a dry exocarp (PO:0009085), dry mesocarp (PO:0009087), and dry endocarp (PO:0009086) that usually dehisce.
PO:0030091.label: capsule fruit

PO:0025616.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) which is a short, abrupt, flexible point at the apex of the lemma (PO:0009037).
PO:0025616.label: lemma apiculus

PO:0025134.synonyms: \u82b1\u5e8f\u679d \u51a0 (Japanese;exact);corona de la ramificaci&#243n de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact);Musa crown (narrow);banana crown (narrow)
PO:0025134.definition: A shoot system that forms the basal part of an inflorescence to which the pedicels are attached and in which the internodes do not elongate, giving the appearance of a ridge of raised tissue.
PO:0025134.label: inflorescence branch crown

PO:0006390.synonyms: \u96c4\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u6709\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u82b1\u5e8f\u8ef8 (Japanese;exact);raquilla de la espiguilla pedicelada del penacho (borla) (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006390.definition: The axis of the tassel pedicellate spikelet, above the glumes.
PO:0006390.label: rachilla of pedicellate spikelet of tassel

PO:0025540.definition: A plant sap (PO:0025538) that is an aqueous solution which may contain sugars, mineral elements, and plant hormones, and is transported through the phloem sieve elements (PO:0025406).
PO:0025540.label: phloem sap

PO:0030090.definition: A portion of root periderm (PO:0005047) formed in response to a disruption of the root epidermis (PO:0006036).
PO:0030090.label: root periderm scar

PO:0025515.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is an angular projection on a phyllome margin (PO:0025018) for which the corresponding phyllome sinus (PO:0025383) extends less than one quarter of the distance to the center of the long axis of the phyllome lamina (PO:0025396).
PO:0025515.label: phyllome lamina tooth

PO:0025083.definition: A reproductive shoot system (PO:0025082) consisting of a number of sporophylls (PO:0009026) or plant ovule (PO:0020003)-bearing modified leaves (PO:0025034) grouped terminally on a stem (PO:0009047).
PO:0025083.label: strobilus

PO:0025544.synonyms: c&#233lula del tapete del microsporangio (Spanish;exact);\u5c0f\u80de\u5b50\u56a2\u30bf\u30da\u30fc\u30c8\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);microsporangium tapetal cell (exact)
PO:0025544.definition: A tapetum cell (PO:0025543) that is part of a microsporangium tapetum (PO:0025314).
PO:0025544.label: microsporangium tapetum cell

PO:0025327.definition: A boat-shaped collective phyllome structure (PO:0025023) that consists of the two lowest petals (PO:0009032) of a papilionaceous corolla (PO:0009059).
PO:0025327.label: keel

PO:0000064.definition: A pericycle cell that is adjacent to the protoxylem of a vascular bundle.
PO:0000064.label: xylem pole pericycle cell

PO:0025200.definition: A shoot axis stele that is part of a stem.
PO:0025200.label: stem stele

PO:0009039.definition: One of a pair of inflorescence bracts that is part of a spikelet and subtends the two florets.
PO:0009039.label: glume

PO:0009044.definition: Sac-like bract subtending the pistillate flower, as in Carex.
PO:0009044.label: perigynium

PO:0009045.definition: An inflorescence bract (PO:0009054) of an involucre (PO:0009100).
PO:0009045.label: involucral bract

PO:0009046.synonyms: \u82b1 (Japanese;exact);flor (Spanish;exact);Asteraceae floret (narrow);hermaphrodite flower (narrow);perfect flower (narrow);monoclinous flower (narrow);basal flower (narrow);double flower (narrow)
PO:0009046.definition: A determinate reproductive shoot system (PO:0025082) that has as part at least one carpel (PO:0009030) or at least one stamen (PO:0009029) and does not contain any other determinate shoot system (PO:0009006) as a part.
PO:0009046.label: flower

PO:0009047.definition: A shoot axis (PO:0025029) that is the primary axis of a plant.
PO:0009047.label: stem

PO:0009040.definition: A flower bract in the position of a lemma, but not enclosing floral organs.
PO:0009040.label: sterile lemma

PO:0009041.definition: A lemma that encloses a functional flower, with androecium, gynoecium or both.
PO:0009041.label: fertile lemma

PO:0009042.definition: A phyllome that is the first organ or one of the first two organs formed at the base of an axillary shoot, often smaller and/or in a distinctively different position from leaves formed subsequently.
PO:0009042.label: prophyll

PO:0009043.definition: A prophyll (PO:0009042) which is borne singly or in pairs on a pedicel (PO:0030112).
PO:0009043.label: bracteole

PO:0025510.definition: An initial cell (PO:0004011) that divides asymmetrically to form an archegonium central cell (PO:0025509) and a smaller archegonium neck canal cell (PO:0030035).
PO:0025510.label: archegonium initial cell

PO:0020031.definition: An embryo root (PO:0000045) that is the basal continuation of a hypocotyl (PO:0020100) in a plant embryo (PO:0009009) or a seedling (PO:0000003).
PO:0020031.label: radicle

PO:0020032.definition: The shoot apex (PO:0000037) of the plant embryo (PO:0009009), above the cotyledonary node (PO:0025321).
PO:0020032.label: plumule

PO:0020033.definition: A sheath-like plant organ (PO:0009008) that surrounds the plumule (PO:0020032) of a plant embryo (PO:0009009) or the emerging shoot apex (PO:0000037) of a seedling.
PO:0020033.label: coleoptile

PO:0020034.definition: A sheath-like plant organ (PO:0009008) that surrounds the radicle (PO:0020031) of a plant embryo (PO:0009009) or the emerging root (PO:0009005) of a seedling (PO:0000003).
PO:0020034.label: coleorhiza

PO:0002000.definition: A portion of shoot system epidermis (PO:0006035) that has as parts two guard cells (PO:0000293) and a stomatal pore (PO:0008032). May also contain subsidiary cells (PO:0000284).
PO:0002000.label: stomatal complex

PO:0025040.synonyms: yema vegetativa axilar de tub&#233rculo (Spanish;exact);tuber bud (exact);\u584a\u830e\u814b\u6804\u990a\u82bd (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025040.definition: An axillary vegetative bud (PO:0004712) that is part of a shoot axis tuber (PO:0004543).
PO:0025040.label: shoot axis tuber axillary vegetative bud

PO:0020037.definition: A stem internode (PO:0020142) that is the part of a plant embryo axis (PO:0019018) or a seedling stem (PO:0009047) above the scutellum (PO:0020110) and below the coleoptile (PO:0020033).
PO:0020037.label: mesocotyl

PO:0025121.definition: A plant sperm cell (PO:0000084) that is part of the pollen (PO:0025281).
PO:0025121.label: pollen sperm cell

PO:0025120.synonyms: spermatozoid (exact);c&#233lula esperm&#225tica del anteridio (Spanish;exact);antheridial sperm cell (exact);antherozoid (exact);\u9020\u7cbe\u5668\u7cbe\u5b50\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025120.definition: A plant sperm cell (PO:0000084) which develops from a spermatogenous cell (PO:0025525) and is located in an antheridium (PO:0025125).
PO:0025120.label: antheridium sperm cell

PO:0025123.definition: A plant egg cell (PO:0020094) that is part of an egg apparatus (PO:0020096).
PO:0025123.label: embryo sac egg cell

PO:0025122.definition: A plant egg cell (PO:0020094) that develops from the archegonium central cell (PO:0025509) and is located in the venter (PO:0030038).
PO:0025122.label: archegonium egg cell

PO:0025125.definition: A multicellular plant gametangium (PO:0025124) that produces antheridium sperm cells (PO:0025120) and has as parts an antheridium jacket layer (PO:0030053) and an antheridium stalk (PO:0030035).
PO:0025125.label: antheridium

PO:0006043.definition: A portion of epidermis (PO:0005679) that is part of an integument (PO:0020021).
PO:0006043.label: integument epidermis

PO:0025127.synonyms: primordio (Spanish;exact);\u539f\u57fa\uff08\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09  (Japanese;exact);portion of primordial tissue (exact);primordia (exact;plural);portion of primordium tissue (exact)
PO:0025127.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) that has as parts protoderm (PO:0006210) and sub-epidermal meristematic tissue and is committed to the development of a particular plant structure (PO:0009011).
PO:0025127.label: primordium

PO:0025126.definition: A multicellular plant gametangium (PO:0025124) that develops from an archegonium initial cell (PO:0025510) and has as parts a venter (PO:0030038) and an archegonium neck (PO:0030039).
PO:0025126.label: archegonium

PO:0025280.definition: A whole plant (PO:0000003) in the gametophyte development stage (PO:0028003) that produces plant sperm cells (PO:0000084).
PO:0025280.label: microgametophyte

PO:0006351.synonyms: florete inferior de la espiguilla pedicelada de la espiga (Spanish;exact);\u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u7121\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u4e0b\u4f4d\u5c0f\u82b1 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006351.definition: An ear floret that is the lower of the two florets on a sessile spikelet of an ear inflorescence.
PO:0006351.label: lower floret of sessile spikelet of ear

PO:0025282.definition: A megagametophyte (PO:0025279) that has as parts one or more archegonia (PO:0025126).
PO:0025282.label: archegonium megagametophyte

PO:0025085.definition: A bud that develops into a strobilus.
PO:0025085.label: strobilus bud

PO:0025284.synonyms: embryonic meristematic apical cell (exact);c&#233lula apical del embri&#243n (Spanish;exact);\u80da\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025284.definition: A sporophyte meristematic apical cell that is part of a plant embryo and is the uppermost cell formed after the first division of a zygote.
PO:0025284.label: embryo apical cell

PO:0025285.definition: A parenchyma cell that is part of a plant callus.
PO:0025285.label: callus parenchyma cell

PO:0025286.definition: A coleoptile (PO:0020033) that is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0025286.label: plant embryo coleoptile

PO:0006350.synonyms: \u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u6709\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u4e0a\u4f4d\u5c0f\u82b1 (Japanese;exact);florete superior de la espiguilla pedicelada de la espiga (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006350.definition: An ear floret that is the upper of the two florets of a pedicellate spikelet rachilla of an ear inflorescence.
PO:0006350.label: upper floret of pedicellate spikelet of ear

PO:0020121.definition: A root (PO:0009005) that develops from a lateral root primordium (PO:0000016) that is part of another root on the same plant.
PO:0020121.label: lateral root

PO:0006369.synonyms: gluma inferior la espiga de la espiguilla (Spanish;exact);\u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u7b2c\u4e00\u82de\u9834(first glume) (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006369.definition: A lower glume that is part of an ear spikelet.
PO:0006369.label: lower glume of ear spikelet

PO:0020126.definition: A staminate inflorescence (PO:0025601) in Zea species that bears the tassel spikelet (PO:0006309) on a terminal inflorescence axis (PO:0020122).
PO:0020126.label: tassel inflorescence

PO:0025001.synonyms: \u57fa\u672c\u7684\u306a\uff08\u4e3b\u8981\u306a\uff09\u5668\u5b98\u90e8 (Japanese;exact);cardinal part of plant organ (exact);parte de un &#243rgano cardinal (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025001.definition: A cardinal part of multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025498) that is a proper part of a plant organ (PO:0009008) and includes portions of plant tissue (PO:0009007) of at least two different types.
PO:0025001.label: cardinal organ part

PO:0020136.definition: A pistillate inflorescence (PO:0025598) in Zea species that is highly compacted and bears the ear spikelets (PO:0006320) on a lateral inflorescence axis (PO:0020122).
PO:0020136.label: ear inflorescence

PO:0020127.definition: A root (PO:0009005) that develops directly from a seedling radicle (PO:0020127).
PO:0020127.label: primary root

PO:0025517.synonyms: \u8449\u8eab\u88c2\u7247(Japanese;exact);l\xf3bulo de la l\xe1mina de la hoja (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025517.definition: A phyllome lobe (PO:0025514) that is a projection on a leaf lamina margin (PO:0025009) for which the corresponding leaf sinus (PO:0025384) extends one quarter or more of the distance to the center of the long axis of the leaf lamina (PO:0020039).
PO:0025517.label: leaf lamina lobe

PO:0020124.definition: A stele (PO:0025197) that is part of a root (PO:0009005).
PO:0020124.label: root stele

PO:0005352.definition: A portion of vascular tissue (PO:0009015) that has as part one or more tracheary elements (PO:0000290).
PO:0005352.label: xylem

PO:0030023.synonyms: gametophore axis apical cell (exact);cauloid apical cell (exact);non-vascular shoot axis apical cell (exact);\u830e\u8449\u4f53\u8ef8\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula apical del eje del gamet&#243foro (Spanish;exact);gametophore axis apical initial (exact)
PO:0030023.definition: A shoot axis meristematic apical cell at the tip of a gametophore axis.
PO:0030023.label: gametophore axis meristematic apical cell

PO:0030004.definition: A portion of protonema tissue that consists of only chloronema cells.
PO:0030004.label: chloronema

PO:0025429.definition: A phyllome plate meristem (PO:0025428) in the vascular leaf (PO:0009025).
PO:0025429.label: leaf plate meristem

PO:0025451.definition: A xylem vessel (PO:0025417) that is part of a portion of secondary xylem tissue (PO:0005848).
PO:0025451.label: secondary xylem vessel

PO:0025576.definition: A primary xylem tracheary element (PO:0025444) that may have helical, scalariform, reticulate and/or pitted secondary wall thickening.
PO:0025576.label: metaxylem tracheary element

PO:0025545.synonyms: anther wall tapetal cell (exact);\u846f\u58c1\u7d68\u6bef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c\xe9lula de la pared del tapete de la antera (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025545.definition: A microsporangium tapetum cell (PO:0025544) that is part of the anther wall tapetum (PO:0009071).
PO:0025545.label: anther wall tapetum cell

PO:0025387.definition: A portion of plant substance (PO:0025161) that is the inner layer of a plant cuticle (PO:0000022), composed primarily of cutin (PO:0025385), embedded and overlayed with cuticular wax (PO:0025386).
PO:0025387.label: plant cuticle proper

PO:0006211.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is part of an abscission zone (PO:0000146) and contains cells that develop an abnormal wall chemistry and swelling resulting in their easily being pulled apart along the pectin-rich middle lamella (GO:0009519).
PO:0006211.label: separation layer

PO:0005417.definition: A portion of vascular tissue (PO:0009015) that has as parts sieve elements (PO:0025406).
PO:0005417.label: phloem

PO:0025398.definition: A substomatal cavity that is part of a phyllome.
PO:0025398.label: phyllome substomatal cavity

PO:0020108.definition: An embryonic plant structure at the base of a plant embryo that develops from an embryonic basal cell and connects an embryo proper to the wall of a megagametophyte.
PO:0020108.label: suspensor

PO:0020109.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that is the uppermost cell of a suspensor (PO:0020108) and from which part of the root (PO:0009005) and root cap (PO:0020123) in a plant embryo (PO:0009009) of angiosperms are derived.
PO:0020109.label: embryo hypophysis

PO:0000229.synonyms: mersitema floral (Spanish;exact);\u82b1\u82bd\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);floral meristem (exact);ear floret meristem (narrow);tassel floret meristem (narrow);Poaceae floret meristem (narrow);floret meristem (narrow)
PO:0000229.definition: A portion of reproductive shoot apical meristem tissue (PO:0008028) that gives rise to the floral organs (PO:0025395).
PO:0000229.label: flower meristem

PO:0020104.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is the lower part of a vascular leaf (PO:0009025), and which more or less encases the stem (PO:0009047).
PO:0020104.label: leaf sheath

PO:0000226.definition: The region of the shoot apical meristem that lies below the central zone and is flanked by the peripheral zone.
PO:0000226.label: rib zone

PO:0000225.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) which is the organogenic region of the meristem, characterized by higher rates of cell division.
PO:0000225.label: peripheral zone

PO:0000224.definition: An area of densely packed cells in the shoot apex that divide infrequently.
PO:0000224.label: central zone

PO:0000223.synonyms: \u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u8ef8\u76ae\u5c64 (Japanese;exact);cortex del eje del epiblasto (epiblastema) del tallo (Spanish;exact);portion of shoot axis cortex tissue (exact);branch cortex (narrow)
PO:0000223.definition: A portion of cortex (PO:0005708) that is part of a shoot axis (PO:0025029).
PO:0000223.label: shoot axis cortex

PO:0025348.definition: A vascular bundle (PO:0005020) that is part of a phyllome lamina (PO:0025396).
PO:0025348.label: phyllome lamina vein

PO:0020102.synonyms: \u4f1d\u9054\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u4e00\u90e8 (Japanese;exact);porci&#243n del tejido de transmisi&#243n (Spanish;exact);Poaceae transmitting tissue (narrow)
PO:0020102.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) in the style of a carpel through which a pollen tube grows; it connects a stigma and the inside of an ovary.
PO:0020102.label: portion of transmitting tissue

PO:0020103.definition: The last mature leaf before the inflorescence in a cereal crop plant.
PO:0020103.label: flag leaf

PO:0025558.definition: A portion of root exarch protoxylem (PO:0025555) tissue in which the primary xylem (PO:0005849) of the root system (PO:0025025) has only one protoxylem strand or pole, and differentiation progresses centripetally, with the oldest element (protoxylem) farthest from the center of the plant axis (PO:0025004).
PO:0025558.label: monarch protoxylem

PO:0025198.definition: A stele that is part of a shoot axis.
PO:0025198.label: shoot axis stele

PO:0025199.definition: A shoot axis stele that is part of a branch.
PO:0025199.label: branch stele

PO:0025042.synonyms: yema vegetativa axilar de tub&#233rculo subterr&#225neo (Spanish;exact);\u5730\u4e0b\u584a\u830e\u814b\u6804\u990a\u82bd (Japanese;exact);swollen eye (narrow);potato eye (narrow)
PO:0025042.definition: A tuber axillary vegetative bud that is part of a subterranean tuber.
PO:0025042.label: subterranean tuber axillary vegetative bud

PO:0025194.synonyms: meristema del n&#243dulo de la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);\u6839\u7c92\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025194.definition: A root meristem (PO:0006085) that gives rise to a root nodule (PO:0003023).
PO:0025194.label: root nodule meristem

PO:0025195.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that develops from a microgametophyte vegetative cell (PO:0020099) and forms a tubular extension of the pollen (PO:0025281).
PO:0025195.label: pollen tube cell

PO:0025196.synonyms: capa de transferencia del endosperma basal (Spanish;exact);\u57fa\u5e95\u80da\u4e73\u8ee2\u9001\u5c64 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025196.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is part of an endosperm (PO:0009089) and is composed of basal endosperm transfer cells (PO:0009018).
PO:0025196.label: basal endosperm transfer layer

PO:0025197.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is the central column of a plant axis that consists of the primary vascular tissue and associated ground tissue.
PO:0025197.label: stele

PO:0025190.synonyms: leaf abaxial epidermis stomatal complex (exact);\u8449\u80cc\u8ef8\u5074\u6c17\u5b54\u88c5\u7f6e (Japanese;exact);leaf abaxial epidermal stomatal complex (exact);complejo estom&#225tico de la superficie abaxial de la hoja (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025190.definition: A leaf stomatal complex (PO:0025183) that is part of a leaf abaxial epidermis (PO:0006019).
PO:0025190.label: leaf abaxial stomatal complex

PO:0025471.definition: A cotyledon (PO:0020030) that is part of a whole plant (PO:0000003) in the seedling development stage (PO:0007131).
PO:0025471.label: seedling cotyledon

PO:0025192.definition: A portion of tepal epidermis that covers the abaxial/lower surface of a tepal.
PO:0025192.label: tepal abaxial epidermis

PO:0025193.definition: A portion of tepal epidermis that covers the adaxial/upper surface of a tepal.
PO:0025193.label: tepal adaxial epidermis

PO:0025399.definition: A phyllome substomatal cavity that is part of a leaf mesophyll.
PO:0025399.label: leaf substomatal cavity

PO:0006062.definition: A portion of carpel epidermis (PO:0025096) that is part of a style (PO:0009074).
PO:0006062.label: style epidermis

PO:0025561.definition: A portion of root exarch protoxylem (PO:0025555) tissue in which the primary xylem (PO:0005849) of the root system (PO:0025025) has four protoxylem strands or poles, and differentiation progresses centripetally, with the oldest elements (protoxylem) farthest from the center of the plant axis (PO:0025004).
PO:0025561.label: tetrarch protoxylem

PO:0020110.definition: An embryonic plant structure that is a more or less shield-shaped and absorptive portion of a plant embryo of Poaceae.
PO:0020110.label: scutellum

PO:0009053.definition: A shoot axis that extends from the last foliage leaf on a stem or branch until the next distal node.
PO:0009053.label: peduncle

PO:0030068.definition: An epidermal initial cell (PO:0000349) that gives rise to an epidermal rhizoid (PO:0030071).
PO:0030068.label: epidermal rhizoid initial cell

PO:0030069.definition: A portion of epidermis (PO:0005679) tissue that is an outgrowth from the epidermis between the leaves of a gametophore axis (PO:0030020).
PO:0030069.label: paraphyllium

PO:0030066.synonyms: canal del cuello del arquegonio (Spanish;exact);archegonial neck canal (exact);\u9020\u5375\u5668\u981a\u6e9d (Japanese;exact)
PO:0030066.definition: A canal (PO:0025132) in the center of an archegonium neck (PO:0030039).
PO:0030066.label: archegonium neck canal

PO:0030067.synonyms: protonemal side branch initial cell (exact);\u539f\u7cf8\u4f53\u5074\u679d\u59cb\u539f\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);rama lateral inicial del protonema (Spanish;exact);protonema side branch initial (exact)
PO:0030067.definition: An protonema sub-apical initial that gives rise to a branch of a protonema.
PO:0030067.label: protonema side branch initial cell

PO:0030064.synonyms: gametophore axillary hair base cell (exact);c&#233lula basal del pelo axilar del gamet&#243foro (Spanish;exact);\u830e\u8449\u4f53\u814b\u6bdb\u57fa\u5e95\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0030064.definition: An axillary hair basal cell that is part of a gametophore axillary hair base.
PO:0030064.label: gametophore axillary hair basal cell

PO:0030065.synonyms: \u9020\u5375\u5668\u981a\u6e9d\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula del canal del cuello del arquegonio (Spanish;exact);archegonial neck canal cell (exact)
PO:0030065.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that is one of the axial row of cells in an immature archegonium neck (PO:0030039).
PO:0030065.label: archegonium neck canal cell

PO:0030062.synonyms: \u830e\u8449\u4f53\u814b\u6bdb\u7d42\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula terminal de pelo axilar del gamet&#243foro (Spanish;exact)
PO:0030062.definition: An axillary hair terminal cell that is the long terminal cell of a gametophore axillary hair.
PO:0030062.label: gametophore axillary hair terminal cell

PO:0006068.definition: A portion of parenchyma tissue that is part of a sepal.
PO:0006068.label: sepal parenchyma

PO:0030060.definition: An axillary hair that grows in a leaf axil of a non-vascular leaf.
PO:0030060.label: gametophore axillary hair

PO:0030061.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that has as parts tmema cells (PO:0030059).
PO:0030061.label: tmema

PO:0005647.definition: Leaf mesophyll parenchyma characterized by little elongated cells, that are not closely packed and have conspicuous intercellular spaces.
PO:0005647.label: spongy mesophyll

PO:0005645.definition: The chloroplast-containing, photosynthetic parenchymatous tissue situated between the two epidermal layers of the foliage leaf.
PO:0005645.label: leaf mesophyll

PO:0030016.synonyms: seta apical initial (exact);seta apical cell (exact);c&#233lula apical de la seta (Spanish;exact);\u67c4\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0030016.definition: A shoot axis meristematic apical cell at the tip of a seta.
PO:0030016.label: seta meristematic apical cell

PO:0030030.definition: A bract (PO:0009055) that subtends an archegonium (PO:0025126).
PO:0030030.label: perichaetal bract

PO:0025334.definition: A unifacial leaf that is round in cross section throughout all of part of the length of the leaf.
PO:0025334.label: terete vascular leaf

PO:0025474.definition: A portion of reaction wood (PO:0025472) found on the upper side of a shoot axis (PO:0025029) that is or was angled away from vertical and that has as parts gelatinous fiber cells (PO:0025422).
PO:0025474.label: tension wood

PO:0025383.definition: A plant anatomical space that is a phyllome marginal embayment, incision or indentation between marginal projections of any sort, typically lobes, teeth, or the base of cordate phyllomes.
PO:0025383.label: phyllome sinus

PO:0005648.definition: Parenchyma containing closely packed elongated chlorenchymatous cells oriented perpendicular to the leaf surface and which are active in photosynthesis.
PO:0005648.label: palisade mesophyll

PO:0030032.definition: A stalk (PO:0025066) that supports a spore capsule, the sporangium (PO:0025094).
PO:0030032.label: seta

PO:0009034.definition: A bract (PO:0009055) that subtends a perianth (PO:0009058) that is part of a flower (PO:0009046).
PO:0009034.label: flower bract

PO:0025385.definition: A portion of plant substance (PO:0025161) that is the inner layer of a plant cuticle (PO:0000022), and is composed of a polyester matrix of hydroxy- and hydroxy epoxy fatty acid C16 and C18 chains.
PO:0025385.label: cutin

PO:0025119.definition: A cardinal organ part that is part of a plant axis and is located behind the elongation zone and contains cells that are differentiating into their final form and function.
PO:0025119.label: plant axis differentiation zone

PO:0025384.definition: A phyllome sinus that is a marginal embayment, incision or indentation between marginal projections of any sort, typically lobes, teeth, or the base of cordate leaves.
PO:0025384.label: leaf sinus

PO:0000258.synonyms: cortex de la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);portion of root cortex tissue (exact);\u6839\u76ae\u5c64 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000258.definition: A portion of cortex (PO:0005708) that is part of a root (PO:0009005).
PO:0000258.label: root cortex

PO:0000293.definition: One of a pair of cells flanking the stomatal pore.
PO:0000293.label: guard cell

PO:0025575.definition: A primary xylem tracheary element (PO:0025444) with predominately annular or helical secondary wall thickening that are the first formed tracheary elements (PO:0000290) at a particular location.
PO:0025575.label: protoxylem tracheary element

PO:0004719.definition: A canal (PO:0025132) that is a longitudinal groove in the testa through a prominent hilum (PO:0020063) of a seed (PO:0009010).
PO:0004719.label: hilum groove

PO:0006023.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) which comprises a layer or layers of cells surrounding the vascular bundles (PO:0005020) of leaves. It may consist of parenchyma (PO:0005421) or sclerenchyma (PO:0005427).
PO:0006023.label: bundle sheath

PO:0006022.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) which forms a strip along the leaf veins and extending from the bundle sheath (PO:0006023) to the epidermis. It may be present on one or both sides of the vein and may consist of parenchyma or sclerenchyma.
PO:0006022.label: bundle sheath extension

PO:0006021.definition: A root apical meristem (PO:0020147) that gives rise to a shoot-borne root (PO:0000042).
PO:0006021.label: shoot-borne root apical meristem

PO:0006020.definition: A root apical meristem (PO:0020147) that gives rise to a lateral root (PO:0020121).
PO:0006020.label: lateral root apical meristem

PO:0000256.synonyms: c&#233lula del pelo de la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);\u6839\u6bdb\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000256.definition: A root epidermal cell (PO:0025164) that develops from a trichoblast (PO:0000262) and has as part a root hair (GO:0035618).
PO:0000256.label: root hair cell

PO:0025388.definition: A portion of cuticular wax (PO:0025386) that forms crystalloids or a smooth film on the exterior of a plant cuticle (PO:0000022).
PO:0025388.label: epicuticular wax

PO:0006025.definition: The inner endodermal sheath of a two layered bundle sheath. The cells are smaller in diameter compared to those in outer wall (starch sheath). The cell walls are thick and contain suberized lamellae. They are analogous to endodermis.
PO:0006025.label: mestome sheath

PO:0006024.definition: A single layered, parenchymatous bundle sheath characterized by presence of large quantity of starch.
PO:0006024.label: parenchyma sheath

PO:0020138.synonyms: vena de la hoja (Spanish;exact);leaf lamina vascular bundle (exact);\u8449\u8eab\u8449\u8108 \uff1f   (Japanese;exact)
PO:0020138.definition: A phyllome lamina vein (PO:0025348) that is part of a leaf lamina vascular system (PO:0000048).
PO:0020138.label: leaf lamina vein

PO:0020140.definition: A leaf lamina vein (PO:0020138) arising from a primary leaf vein (PO:0025413).
PO:0020140.label: secondary leaf vein

PO:0006327.definition: An inflorescence apical meristem that gives rise to the two or more florets of a grass inflorescence.
PO:0006327.label: spikelet meristem

PO:0020141.definition: A shoot axis node (PO:0005004) that is part of a stem (PO:0009047).
PO:0020141.label: stem node

PO:0005004.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) of a shoot axis (PO:0025029) where a bud (PO:0000055) may form and develop into a branch (PO:0025073), leaf (PO:0025034), flower (PO:0004541), inflorescence (PO:0009049) or nodal root (PO:0003005).
PO:0005004.label: shoot axis node

PO:0005005.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) of a shoot axis (PO:0025029) that is between two shoot axis nodes (PO:0005004).
PO:0005005.label: shoot axis internode

PO:0005006.synonyms: portion of articulated laticifer tissue (exact);latic&#237fero articulado (Spanish;exact);\u9023\u5408\u4e73\u7ba1\uff08\u6709\u7bc0\u4e73\u7ba1\uff09 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0005006.definition: A portion of secretory tissue (PO:0005656) that has as parts articulated laticifer cells (PO:0006221).
PO:0005006.label: articulated laticifer

PO:0020055.definition: A stalk (PO:0025066) that is the main axis of a pinnate or more highly compound leaf, that bears leaflets or divisions of the axis.
PO:0020055.label: leaf rachis

PO:0002004.definition: A cardinal part of multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025498) which is composed of the shriveled remains of the silk (PO:0006488), and the base of the style (PO:0009074), and is located on the distal end of a developing or mature kernel (caryopsis fruit; PO:0030104).
PO:0002004.label: silk scar

PO:0020142.definition: A shoot axis internode (PO:0005005) that is part of a stem (PO:0009047).
PO:0020142.label: stem internode

PO:0005002.definition: An axillary branch that forms from a leaf above the very base of the shoot.
PO:0005002.label: cauline axillary shoot

PO:0005003.synonyms: \u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u8ef8\u6bdb\uff08\u6bdb\u8338\u3001\u7cf8\u72b6\u4f53\uff09 (Japanese;exact);eje de tricoma del epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact);branch trichome (narrow);stem trichome (narrow)
PO:0005003.definition: A trichome that is part of a shoot axis epidermis.
PO:0005003.label: shoot axis trichome

PO:0006203.synonyms: portion of pericycle tissue (exact);portion of pericyclic tissue (exact);periciclo (Spanish;exact);\u5185\u9798 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006203.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) that is part of a root stele located between the phloem and endodermis.
PO:0006203.label: pericycle

PO:0006202.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) located between vascular bundles in a shoot axis.
PO:0006202.label: interfascicular region

PO:0006201.definition: A portion of vascular cambium (PO:00055980) that develops from cells in an interfascicular region (PO:0006202) that is part of a shoot system (PO:0009006).
PO:0006201.label: interfascicular cambium

PO:0006200.definition: A portion of vascular cambium (PO:0005598) that develops from a procambium (PO:0025275) in a vascular bundle (PO:0005020) that is part of a shoot system (PO:0009006).
PO:0006200.label: fascicular cambium

PO:0006207.definition: A short cell in the dimorphic type of exodermis with cell wall that remains non-thickened.
PO:0006207.label: exodermal passage cell

PO:0006206.definition: Elongated chlorenchymatous cell oriented perpendicular to the leaf surface and which is active in photosynthesis.
PO:0006206.label: palisade mesophyll cell

PO:0006205.definition: Irregularly-shaped, chlorenchymatous cell, separated by large air spaces.
PO:0006205.label: spongy mesophyll cell

PO:0006204.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) which is diploid (2n), and undergoes meiosis (GO:0007126) to produce four haploid (1n) plant spores (PO:0025017).
PO:0006204.label: sporocyte

PO:0025382.definition: An intercellular space that is located directly below and contiguous with a stomatal pore.
PO:0025382.label: substomatal cavity

PO:0006208.definition: Cell in the endodermal layer of the root with cell wall that remains non-thickened.
PO:0006208.label: endodermal passage cell

PO:0025256.synonyms: \u5074\u6839\u4f38\u9577\u5e2f\uff08\u5c64\uff09   (Japanese;exact);zona de elongaci&#243n de la ra&#237z lateral (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025256.definition: A root elongation zone that is part of a lateral root tip.
PO:0025256.label: lateral root elongation zone

PO:0025207.definition: A phyllome vascular system (PO:0025206) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a tepal (PO:0009033).
PO:0025207.label: tepal vascular system

PO:0006320.definition: A spikelet (PO:0009051) that is part of the ear inflorescence (PO:0020136) and bears a single ear floret (PO:0006354) at maturity.
PO:0006320.label: ear spikelet

PO:0000038.definition: Cell produced by the fusion of sperm cell nucleus and two polar nuclei of the central cell (or diploid secondary endosperm nucleus, in cases where two polar nuclei fuse together before double fertilization). The first cell of the endosperm, often triploid.
PO:0000038.label: primary endosperm cell

PO:0000039.synonyms: \u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u8ef8\u7dad\u7ba1\u7cfb (Japanese;exact);sistema vascular del eje del epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact);branch vascular system (narrow);stem vascular system (narrow)
PO:0000039.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a shoot axis (PO:0025029).
PO:0000039.label: shoot axis vascular system

PO:0000036.definition: A phyllome vascular system (PO:0025206) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a vascular leaf (PO:0009025).
PO:0000036.label: leaf vascular system

PO:0000037.definition: A shoot axis (PO:0025029) that is the most distal part of a shoot system (PO:0009006) and has as parts a shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148) and the youngest primordia (PO:0025127).
PO:0000037.label: shoot axis apex

PO:0000034.definition: A maximal portion of vascular tissue (PO:0009015) in a whole plant (PO:0000003), collective plant structure (PO:0025497), multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025496), or cardinal part of multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025498).
PO:0000034.label: vascular system

PO:0000035.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that is part of a cotyledon (PO:0020030).
PO:0000035.label: cotyledon vascular system

PO:0000032.definition: A portion of plant tissue consisting of four microspores that remained joined together shortly after meiosis. Each cell will give rise to a male gametophyte.
PO:0000032.label: tetrad of microspores

PO:0000033.definition: A valve that is a part of a fruit that splits apart when the fruit dehisces.
PO:0000033.label: fruit valve

PO:0000030.definition: A collective organ part structure composed of two or more layers of various tissues that is a partition that divides a cavity formed by the fusion of two or more organs.
PO:0000030.label: septum

PO:0000031.definition: A portion of periderm tissue (PO:0005046) characterized by the presence of intercellular spaces between the cells of the phellem (PO:0004003) and phelloderm (PO:0005050)
PO:0000031.label: lenticel

PO:0020063.definition: A cardinal part of multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025498) that is a scar on a seed (PO:0009010) at the place where it was attached to a funicle (PO:0020006).
PO:0020063.label: hilum

PO:0020137.synonyms: &#225pice de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u5148 (Japanese;exact);leaf lamina apex (narrow);phyllid apex (narrow)
PO:0020137.definition: A phyllome apex (PO:0025139) that is part of a leaf (PO:0025034).
PO:0020137.label: leaf apex

PO:0000283.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that markedly differs in form, size, or contents from other cells in the same tissue.
PO:0000283.label: idioblast

PO:0025386.definition: A portion of plant substance (PO:0025161) comprised predominantly of very long chain aliphatic lipids and is part of a plant cuticle (PO:0000022).
PO:0025386.label: cuticular wax

PO:0020062.definition: A cardinal organ part that is an oil-secreting outgrowth of a seed or fruit.
PO:0020062.label: elaiosome

PO:0030130.synonyms: double umbel (exact);compound umbel (exact);heterothetic double umbel (narrow);heterothetic compound umbel (narrow);homothetic double umbel (narrow);homothetic compound umbel (narrow)
PO:0030130.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049), with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of a first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104) with compressed inflorescence axis internodes (PO:0006326) and pedicellate (PATO:0001438) flowers (PO:0009046) on higher order inflorescence axes with compressed inflorescence axis internodes (PO:0006326).
PO:0030130.label: compound umbel inflorescence

PO:0000012.definition: Hook-like structure which develops at the apical part of the hypocotyl in dark-grown seedlings in dicots.
PO:0000012.label: apical hook

PO:0025452.definition: A sieve element (PO:0025406) that is part of a portion of primary phloem (PO:0006075).
PO:0025452.label: primary phloem sieve element

PO:0020027.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is a ridge on a plant ovule (PO:0020003) where a funicle (PO:0020006) is or was fused to the ovule.
PO:0020027.label: raphe

PO:0025489.synonyms: primordio de la br&#225ctea de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact);\u82b1\u5e8f\u82de\u539f\u57fa (Japanese;exact);inflorescence bract primordia (exact;plural)
PO:0025489.definition: A bract primordium (PO:0025128) is committed to the development of an inflorescence bract (PO:0009054).
PO:0025489.label: inflorescence bract primordium

PO:0006321.synonyms: eje de segundo orden de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact);first order paraclade (exact);first order inflorescence branch (exact);primary inflorescence branch (exact)
PO:0006321.definition: A higher order inflorescence axis (PO:0009081) that develops from an inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009105) of a first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104).
PO:0006321.label: second order inflorescence axis

PO:0025012.definition: A leaf margin (PO:0020128) that is part of a cotyledon (PO:0020030).
PO:0025012.label: cotyledon margin

PO:0000282.definition: A unicellular or multicellular plant structure (PO:0009011) that forms a non-sclerified outgrowth from the epidermis (PO:0005679).
PO:0000282.label: trichome

PO:0025559.definition: A portion of root exarch protoxylem (PO:0025555) tissue in which the primary xylem (PO:0005849) of the root system (PO:0025025) has two protoxylem strands or poles, and differentiation progresses centripetally, with the oldest elements (protoxylem) farthest from the center of the plant axis (PO:0025004).
PO:0025559.label: diarch protoxylem

PO:0006440.synonyms: gluma superior de la espiguilla s&#233sil de la espiga (Spanish;exact);\u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u306e\u7121\u67c4\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u7b2c\u4e8c\u82de\u9834(second glume) (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006440.definition: An upper glume of ear spikelet that is part of an ear sessile spikelet.
PO:0006440.label: upper glume of sessile spikelet of ear

PO:0025618.definition: A portion of carpel epidermis (PO:0025096) that covers the adaxial surface of a carpel (PO:0009030).
PO:0025618.label: carpel adaxial epidermis

PO:0025543.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that is part of the tapetum (PO:0025313).
PO:0025543.label: tapetum cell

PO:0004537.definition: A somatic plant embryo derived directly from nucellus cells.
PO:0004537.label: nucellar plant embryo

PO:0025546.definition: A primary inflorescence branch (PO:0006321) borne in the same axil (PO:0025224) as an existing primary inflorescence branch (PO:0006321).
PO:0025546.label: accessory paraclade

PO:0008025.definition: Regions of the petiole that does not include petiole distal end and petiole proximal end.
PO:0008025.label: central zone of the petiole

PO:0008024.definition: The region of the petiole proximal to its stem attachment site.
PO:0008024.label: petiole proximal end

PO:0008027.definition: A portion of petiole epidermis that covers the adaxial/upper surface of a petiole.
PO:0008027.label: petiole adaxial epidermis

PO:0008026.definition: The region of the petiole distal to its stem attachment site or proximal to the leaf lamina.
PO:0008026.label: petiole distal end

PO:0025169.definition: A portion of epidermis (PO:0005679) that is a sclerified outgrowth.
PO:0025169.label: prickle

PO:0008020.synonyms: zona central de la l&#225mina de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u8eab(\u8449\u7247)\u306e\u4e2d\u592e\u5e2f (Japanese;exact)
PO:0008020.definition: Region that includes the widest or majority portion of leaf lamina and that does not include leaf apex and leaf lamina base.
PO:0008020.label: central zone of the leaf lamina

PO:0008023.definition: A leaf lamina vein (PO:0020138) arising from a quaternary (PO:0008022) or other higher order leaf vein.
PO:0008023.label: higher order leaf vein

PO:0008022.definition: A leaf lamina vein (PO:0020138) arising from a tertiary leaf vein (PO:0008021).
PO:0008022.label: quaternary leaf vein

PO:0025165.definition: An epidermal cell that is part of a shoot epidermis.
PO:0025165.label: shoot epidermal cell

PO:0025164.definition: An epidermal cell that is part of a root epidermis.
PO:0025164.label: root epidermal cell

PO:0025167.definition: A papilla cell that is part of a leaf epidermis.
PO:0025167.label: leaf papilla cell

PO:0025166.definition: An epidermal pavement cell with a short protuberance.
PO:0025166.label: papilla cell

PO:0008029.definition: A portion of petiole epidermis that covers the abaxial/lower surface of a petiole.
PO:0008029.label: petiole abaxial epidermis

PO:0008028.definition: A shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148) that gives rise to the apical growth of reproductive tissues and organs.
PO:0008028.label: reproductive shoot apical meristem

PO:0025163.definition: A trichome cell (PO:0008030) that forms a branch of a multicellular trichome (PO:0025162).
PO:0025163.label: multicellular trichome branch cell

PO:0025162.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that forms a non-sclerified outgrowth from the epidermis (PO:0005679).
PO:0025162.label: multicellular trichome

PO:0025244.synonyms: \u7b2c\u4e00\u679c\u5e8f\u8ef8 (Japanese;exact);infructescence rachis (exact);eje de la infructescencia de primer orden (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025244.definition: An infructescence axis (PO:0025242), which is the primary or main axis of an infructescence (PO:0006342), that develops from a first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104).
PO:0025244.label: first order infructescence axis

PO:0025245.definition: A phyllome that develops from a sepal and remains attached to a fruit at maturity.
PO:0025245.label: persistent sepal

PO:0025246.definition: A phyllome (PO:0006001) that develops from a tepal (PO:0009033) and remains attached to a fruit (PO:0009001) at maturity.
PO:0025246.label: persistent tepal

PO:0025247.definition: A phyllome that develops from a stamen and remains attached to a fruit at maturity.
PO:0025247.label: persistent stamen

PO:0025240.definition: A reproductive shoot system (PO:0025082) that is part of an inflorescence (PO:0009049) and has as parts a second order inflorescence axis (PO:0006321) and any shoot axes (PO:0025029) and flowers (PO:0009046) that arise from it.
PO:0025240.label: second order inflorescence

PO:0025241.synonyms: hand of fruit (exact);infructescencia de segundo orden (Spanish;exact);\u7b2c\u4e8c\u679c\u5e8f (Japanese;exact);secondary infructescence (exact);hand of bananas (narrow)
PO:0025241.definition: A reproductive shoot system that is part of an infructescence and has as parts a second order infructescence axis and any infructescence axes and fruits that arise from it.
PO:0025241.label: second order infructescence

PO:0025242.definition: A shoot axis (PO:0025029) that is part of an infructescence (PO:0006342).
PO:0025242.label: infructescence axis

PO:0025243.definition: An infructescence axis (PO:0025242), which is a branch (PO:0025073) in an infructescence (PO:0006342), that develops from a higher order inflorescence axis (PO:0009081).
PO:0025243.label: higher order infructescence axis

PO:0008030.definition: A plant cell (PO:0009002) that is part of a multicellular trichome (PO:0000282).
PO:0008030.label: trichome cell

PO:0025248.definition: A collective organ part structure that forms a cylindrical false stem composed concentric leaf sheaths.
PO:0025248.label: pseudostem

PO:0025249.synonyms: epidermis de la vaina de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u9798\u8868\u76ae (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025249.definition: A portion of leaf epidermis that is part of a leaf sheath.
PO:0025249.label: leaf sheath epidermis

PO:0000423.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) which is a whole plant (PO:0000003) in the plant zygote stage (PO:0001097).
PO:0000423.label: plant zygote

PO:0000146.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that has as part a separation layer (PO:0006211) and a protective layer (PO:0006212), and is involved in the abscission (GO:0009838) of a fruit (PO:0009001), flower (PO:0009046), leaf (PO:0025034) or other plant structure (PO:0009011).
PO:0000146.label: abscission zone

PO:0025048.synonyms: \u5730\u4e0b\u584a\u830e \u8868\u76ae (Japanese;exact);epidermis de tub&#233rculo subterr&#225neo (Spanish;exact);young potato tuber skin (narrow)
PO:0025048.definition: A tuber epidermis that is part of a subterranean tuber.
PO:0025048.label: subterranean tuber epidermis

PO:0025049.definition: A tuber interfascicular region that is part of a subterranean tuber storage parenchyma.
PO:0025049.label: subterranean tuber interfascicular region

PO:0006368.definition: A glume that is part of a tassel spikelet.
PO:0006368.label: glume of tassel spikelet

PO:0025046.definition: A portion of shoot axis epidermis (PO:0000112) that is part of a shoot axis tuber (PO:0004543).
PO:0025046.label: shoot axis tuber epidermis

PO:0025511.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is a slender, hollow extension of a petal (PO:0009032).
PO:0025511.label: petal spur

PO:0006360.synonyms: par de meristemas de la espiga de la espiguilla (Spanish;exact);\u96cc\u7a42\uff08\u82b1\uff09\u5c0f\u7a42\u5bfe\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006360.definition: An ear inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009110) that produces two ear spikelet meristems (PO:0006378), each of which produces two flower meristems (PO:0000229) in an ear inflorescence (PO:0020136).
PO:0006360.label: ear spikelet pair meristem

PO:0006362.synonyms: \u80da\u6027\u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u9802\u7aef\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);embryonic shoot apical meristem (exact);meristema embri&#243nico apical del epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006362.definition: A vegetative shoot apical meristem at the apex of the embryonic axis.
PO:0006362.label: embryo shoot apical meristem

PO:0025044.definition: A portion of tuber periderm that is part of an aerial tuber.
PO:0025044.label: aerial tuber periderm

PO:0006367.synonyms: \u96cc\u7a42\u5c0f\u7a42\u306e\u82de\u9834 (Japanese;exact);gluma de la espiga de la espiguilla (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006367.definition: A glume that is part of an ear spikelet.
PO:0006367.label: glume of ear spikelet

PO:0020148.definition: A shoot system meristem (PO:0006079) formed at the apex of the shoot axis (PO:0025029), including those originating from an axillary bud meristem (PO:0000232).
PO:0020148.label: shoot apical meristem

PO:0020149.synonyms: centro de division de c&#233lulas del meristema (Spanish;exact);\u9759\u6b62\u4e2d\u5fc3 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0020149.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) that is part of a root apical meristem (PO:0020147) and consists of mitotically and metabolically inactive cells and is located behind the protoderm (PO:0006210) of the root (PO:0009005).
PO:0020149.label: quiescent center

PO:0030033.definition: A stalk (PO:0025066) that supports an antheridium head (PO:0030075).
PO:0030033.label: antheridiophore

PO:0030035.definition: A stalk (PO:0025066) that is the basal part of an antheridium (PO:0025125).
PO:0030035.label: antheridium stalk

PO:0030034.definition: A stalk (PO:0025066) that supports an archegonium head (PO:0030034).
PO:0030034.label: archegoniophore

PO:0030037.synonyms: spore capsule calyptrae (exact;plural);caliptra de la c&#225psula productora de esporas (Spanish;exact);\u30b3\u30b1\u985e\u3000\u861a\u5e3d (Japanese;exact)
PO:0030037.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that develops from an archegonium (PO:0025126) and is a cap or hood enclosing the sporangium (syn: spore capsule; PO:0025094).
PO:0030037.label: spore capsule calyptra

PO:0030036.definition: A stalk (PO:0025066) that the basal part of an archegonium (PO:0025126).
PO:0030036.label: archegonium stalk

PO:0025420.definition: A libriform fiber cell (PO:0004520) that has as parts one or more thin internal partitions or septa.
PO:0025420.label: septate libriform fiber cell

PO:0025421.definition: A phloem fiber cell (PO:0004519) that has as parts one or more thin internal partitions or septa.
PO:0025421.label: septate phloem fiber cell

PO:0025422.definition: A xylem fiber cell (PO:0000274) in which the inner-most layer of the secondary cell wall (GO:0009531) contains abundant cellulose and is poor in lignin.
PO:0025422.label: gelatinous fiber cell

PO:0020144.definition: A maximal portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) located at a shoot apex (PO:0000037) or root tip (PO:0000025).
PO:0020144.label: apical meristem

PO:0020145.definition: A portion of meristem (PO:0009013) tissue located parallel to the sides of a shoot axis (PO:0025029) or root (PO:0009005) that participates in lateral growth.
PO:0020145.label: lateral meristem

PO:0025043.definition: A portion of shoot axis periderm (PO:0005048) that is part of a shoot axis tuber (PO:0004543).
PO:0025043.label: shoot axis tuber periderm

PO:0025011.definition: A phyllome margin (PO:0025018) that is part of a bract (PO:0009055).
PO:0025011.label: bract margin

PO:0025542.synonyms: celula clorenquimatica de la vaina del haz vascular (Spanish;exact)  (exact);\u7dad\u7ba1\u675f\u9798\u540c\u5316\u7d44\u7e54\u3001\u8449\u7dd1\u7d44\u7e54\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025542.definition: A chlorenchyma cell (PO:0000076) that is part of a bundle sheath (PO:0006023).
PO:0025542.label: bundle sheath chlorenchyma cell

PO:0020061.definition: A portion of seed coat epidermis (PO:0006048) that consists of multiple seed trichomes (PO:0004511) at the seed micropyle (PO:0006334).
PO:0020061.label: coma

PO:0020060.definition: An arilloid that is an outgrowth of a seed next to the micropyle.
PO:0020060.label: caruncle

PO:0025547.definition: A primary inflorescence branch (PO:0006321) borne on the elongated first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104).
PO:0025547.label: cauline paraclade

PO:0002003.definition: A tracheary element (PO:0000290) that is part of a xylem vessel (PO:0025417) and has as parts perforation plates.
PO:0002003.label: xylem vessel member

PO:0025017.definition: A whole plant (PO:0000003) that arises through meiosis and is contained in a spore wall.
PO:0025017.label: plant spore

PO:0025016.definition: A phyllome margin (PO:0025018) that is part of a sporophyll (PO:0009026).
PO:0025016.label: sporophyll margin

PO:0025018.definition: A plant organ margin (PO:0025005) that is part of a phyllome lamina (PO:0025396).
PO:0025018.label: phyllome margin

PO:0025549.definition: A plant structure (PO:0009011) that is the apical most portion of a trichome apex (PO:0025550).
PO:0025549.label: trichome tip

PO:0025548.definition: A primary inflorescence branch (PO:0006321) borne on the compacted first order inflorescence axis (PO:0025104), forming the rosette.
PO:0025548.label: rosette paraclade

PO:0009051.definition: A reproductive shoot system (PO:0025082) that is the ultimate and congested inflorescence branch (PO:0009081) of the grasses.
PO:0009051.label: spikelet

PO:0004515.definition: A portion of secondary xylem (PO:0005848) that is a part of a growth ring (PO:0004514) formed during the early part of a growing season, has lower density than late wood (PO:0004516) of the same growth ring, and has as parts early wood tracheary elements (PO:0025461) with generally larger lumens than the late wood tracheary elements (PO:0025462) of the same growth ring.
PO:0004515.label: early wood

PO:0004514.synonyms: anillo de crecimiento (Spanish;exact);growth layer (exact);\u5e74\u8f2a\uff08\uff1dannual ring) (Japanese;exact);annual ring (narrow);tree ring (narrow);false annual ring (narrow)
PO:0004514.definition: A portion of secondary xylem (PO:0005848) that has as parts a single layer of early wood (PO:0004515) and a single layer of late wood (PO:0004516) from the same growth season and is part of a shoot axis (PO:0025029) or root (PO:0009005).
PO:0004514.label: growth ring

PO:0004517.definition: A portion of secondary xylem (PO:0005848) that includes the last-formed late wood (PO:0004516) of one growth ring (PO:0004514) and the earliest-formed early wood (PO:0004515) of the next growth ring.
PO:0004517.label: growth ring boundary

PO:0004516.definition: A portion of secondary xylem (PO:0005848) that is a part of a growth ring (PO:0004514) formed during the later part of a growing season, has higher density than early wood (PO:0004515) of the same growth ring, and has as parts late wood tracheary elements (PO:0025462) with generally smaller lumens than the early wood tracheary elements (PO:0025461) of the same growth ring.
PO:0004516.label: late wood

PO:0004511.definition: A trichome that develops from seed coat epidermis.
PO:0004511.label: seed trichome

PO:0004513.definition: A portion of secondary xylem (PO:0005848) that has as parts living secondary xylem parenchyma cells (PO:0004525).
PO:0004513.label: sapwood

PO:0004512.definition: A portion of secondary xylem (PO:0005848) that lacks living secondary xylem parenchyma cells (PO:0004525).
PO:0004512.label: heartwood

PO:0025051.definition: A tuber interfascicular region that is part of an aerial tuber storage parenchyma.
PO:0025051.label: aerial tuber interfascicular region

PO:0030071.definition: A rhizoid (PO:0030078) that develops from an epidermal rhizoid initial cell (PO:0030068).
PO:0030071.label: epidermal rhizoid

PO:0004519.definition: A fiber cell (PO:0025407) that is part of a portion of phloem (PO:0005417) tissue.
PO:0004519.label: phloem fiber cell

PO:0004518.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) outside the vascular cambium (PO:0005598) or the xylem (PO:0005352); in older trees may be divided into dead outer bark and living inner bark, which consists of secondary phloem (PO:0005043).
PO:0004518.label: bark

PO:0030070.definition: A slender, usually uniseriate multicellular trichome (PO:0025162) that grows intermixed with the gametangia.
PO:0030070.label: paraphysis

PO:0009000.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) at the apex or base of a petiole, petiolule, leaf sheath, or branch that is differentiated from the remaining organ parts by its enlarged cross section.
PO:0009000.label: pulvinus

PO:0009001.definition: A multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025496) that develops from a gynoecium (PO:0009062), or a single carpel (PO:0009030), and at maturity may have as parts one or more seeds (PO:0009010).
PO:0009001.label: fruit

PO:0009002.definition: A cell which is a plant structure (PO:0009011).
PO:0009002.label: plant cell

PO:0025499.definition: An epidermal pavement cell (PO:0000332) that is part of sepal epidermis (PO:0006040) and is approximately one fifth the length of a sepal.
PO:0025499.label: sepal epidermis giant cell

PO:0030073.definition: A portion of epidermis (PO:0005679) that is the outermost layer of a sporangium wall (PO:0025306).
PO:0030073.label: exothecium

PO:0009006.definition: A collective plant organ structure (PO:0025007) that produces shoot-borne portions of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) and the plant structures (PO:0009011) that arise from them.
PO:0009006.label: shoot system

PO:0009007.definition: A plant structure (PO:0009011) that consists predominantly of similarly specialized plant cells (PO:0009002) of one or more types.
PO:0009007.label: portion of plant tissue

PO:0030105.definition: A fruit (PO:0009001) which develops from a carpel (PO:0009030) and at maturity comprises a dry exocarp (PO:0009085), dry mesocarp (PO:0009087), and dry endocarp (PO:0009086) that dehisce along a single fruit valve (PO:0000033).
PO:0030105.label: follicle fruit

PO:0009009.definition: A whole plant (PO:0000003) that participates in the plant embryo stage (PO:0007631).
PO:0009009.label: plant embryo

PO:0030107.definition: A fruit (PO:0009001) which develops from a carpel (PO:0009030) or gyneocium (PO:0009062) and at maturity comprises a dry exocarp (PO:0009085), a dry mesocarp (PO:0009087), and a dry endocarp (PO:0009086) that are connected to a seed coat (PO:0009088) by a funicle (PO:0020006).
PO:0030107.label: achene fruit

PO:0030106.definition: A fruit (PO:0009001) which develops from a gynoecium (PO:0009062) and at maturity comprises a dry exocarp (PO:0009085), dry mesocarp (PO:0009087), and dry endocarp (PO:0009086), that dehisce along two fruit valves (PO:0000033) and separate from a persistent fruit replum (PO:0025267).
PO:0030106.label: silique fruit

PO:0025491.definition: A plant ovule (PO:0020006) that is part of an ovuliferous scale (add).
PO:0025491.label: ovuliferous scale ovule

PO:0030100.definition: A fruit (PO:0009001) which develops from a carpel (PO:0009030) and at maturity comprises a dry exocarp (PO:0009085), dry mesocarp (PO:0009087), and dry endocarp (PO:0009086) that dehisce along two fruit valves (PO:0000033).
PO:0030100.label: legume fruit

PO:0025493.synonyms: primordio de ra&#237z lateral no peric\ufffdclica (Spanish;exact);\u5185\u9798\u4ee5\u5916\u306e\u7d44\u7e54\u304b\u3089\u767a\u751f\u3059\u308b\u5206\u679d\u6839\u59cb\u539f\u4f53 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025493.definition: A lateral root primordium (PO:0000016) that develops from a portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) other than a pericycle (PO:0006203) and is committed to the development of a non-pericyclic lateral root (PO:0025495).
PO:0025493.label: non-pericyclic lateral root primordium

PO:0025492.definition: A lateral root primordium (PO:0000016) that develops from a portion of pericycle tissue (PO:0006203) and is committed to the development of a pericyclic lateral root (PO:0025494).
PO:0025492.label: pericyclic lateral root primordium

PO:0000351.synonyms: c&#233lula madre de la c&#233lula guardiana (Spanish;exact);\u5b54\u8fba\u6bcd\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000351.definition: A shoot epidermal cell that divides to produce the guard cells.
PO:0000351.label: guard mother cell

PO:0025077.definition: A terminal reproductive bud that develops into a strobilus.
PO:0025077.label: terminal strobilus bud

PO:0020022.definition: An integument (PO:0020021) which is the innermost of the two layers of tissue that usually cover the ovule, contiguous to the nucellus and usually contributing to the formation of the micropyle at the apex.
PO:0020022.label: inner integument

PO:0028005.definition: A collective plant organ structure (PO:0025007) which is a cluster of gametophore branches (PO:0030021) or non-vascular leaves (PO:0025075) at the top of the gametophore axis (PO:0030020), forming a tuft.
PO:0028005.label: gametophyte coma

PO:0028004.definition: A shoot axis apex (PO:0000037) that is part of a branch (PO:0025073).
PO:0028004.label: branch apex

PO:0025129.definition: A lamina (PO:0025060) that is part of a petiole (PO:0020038).
PO:0025129.label: petiole lamina

PO:0025074.definition: A megagametophyte (PO:0025279) that is located in a plant ovary ovule (PO:0025490).
PO:0025074.label: embryo sac

PO:0030088.definition: A lateral root (PO:0020121) that is sclerified and pointed.
PO:0030088.label: lateral root spine

PO:0030089.definition: A shoot-borne root (PO:0000042) that is sclerified and pointed.
PO:0030089.label: shoot-borne root spine

PO:0025128.synonyms: primordio del filoma (Spanish;exact);portion of phyllome primordium tissue (exact);phyllome primordia (exact;plural);\u30d5\u30a3\u30ed\u30e0\u539f\u57fa\uff08\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09  (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025128.definition: A primordium (PO:0025127) that develops from a phyllome anlagen (PO:0025430) and is part of a shoot apex (PO:0000037) and is committed to the development of a phyllome (PO:0006001).
PO:0025128.label: phyllome primordium

PO:0030084.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the outer layer or layers of a sporangium (PO:0025094) early in sporangium development (GO:0043582).
PO:0030084.label: amphithecium

PO:0025335.definition: An adult ensiform leaf with a lamina that develops in a median plane, rather a transverse plane, throughout the length of the leaf and is a result of increased activity of the adaxial meristem early in development.
PO:0025335.label: phyllode leaf

PO:0000355.definition: A xylem fiber cell (PO:0000274) with bordered pits with pit cavities.
PO:0000355.label: fiber tracheid

PO:0030087.synonyms: non-vascular leaf initial (exact);\u975e\u7dad\u7ba1\u675f\u8449\u306e\u59cb\u539f\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);c&#233lula inicial de la hoja no vascular (Spanish;exact)
PO:0030087.definition: An initial cell (PO:0004011) that is part of a gametophore (PO:0030018) and gives rise to a non-vascular leaf (PO:0025075).
PO:0030087.label: non-vascular leaf initial cell

PO:0000353.definition: A ground tissue cell that is part of an exodermis or an endodermis and remains thin walled when the associated cells develop thick secondary walls.
PO:0000353.label: passage cell

PO:0000352.definition: A cell containing glucosinolates ("mustard oil glucosides") and myrosinases, enzymes hydrolyzing the glucosinolates.
PO:0000352.label: myrosin cell

PO:0025332.definition: A small flower (PO:0009046) in the center of a head-type (capitulum) inflorescence (PO:0009049).
PO:0025332.label: disk flower

PO:0025333.definition: A unifacial leaf that is flat in cross section due to a lamina that develops in a median plane (perpendicular to the axis), rather a transverse plane (tangent to the axis) throughout all of part of the length of the leaf.
PO:0025333.label: ensiform vascular leaf

PO:0005048.synonyms: \u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u8ef8\u5468\u76ae (Japanese;exact);peridermis del eje del epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact);branch periderm (narrow);stem periderm (narrow)
PO:0005048.definition: A portion of periderm tissue (PO:0005046) that is part of a shoot axis (PO:0025029).
PO:0005048.label: shoot axis periderm

PO:0006066.definition: A portion of parenchyma tissue that is part of a petiole.
PO:0006066.label: petiole parenchyma

PO:0006065.definition: A portion of endodermis (PO:0000252) that is part of a hypocotyl (PO:0020100).
PO:0006065.label: hypocotyl endodermis

PO:0025283.definition: A microgametophyte (PO:0025280) that has as parts one or more antheridia (PO:0025125).
PO:0025283.label: antheridium microgametophyte

PO:0006063.definition: A portion of epidermis (PO:0005679) that is part of an plant ovary wall (PO:0005022).
PO:0006063.label: plant ovary epidermis

PO:0025178.definition: A portion of shoot axis epidermis (PO:0000112) that is part of a stem (PO:0009047).
PO:0025178.label: stem epidermis

PO:0006061.definition: A portion of carpel epidermis (PO:0025096) that is part of a stigma (PO:0009073).
PO:0006061.label: stigma epidermis

PO:0006060.definition: A portion of stamen epidermis that is part of a filament.
PO:0006060.label: filament epidermis

PO:0005040.definition: A portion of pith (PO:0006109) that is part of a root stele (PO:0020124).
PO:0005040.label: root pith

PO:0005041.synonyms: \u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u8ef8\u9ac4 (Japanese;exact);m&#233dula del eje del epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact);branch pith (narrow);stem pith (narrow)
PO:0005041.definition: A portion of pith (PO:0006109) that is part of a shoot axis (PO:0025029).
PO:0005041.label: shoot axis pith

PO:0005043.synonyms: floema secundario (Spanish;exact);portion of secondary phloem tissue (exact);\u4e8c\u6b21\u5e2b\u90e8 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0005043.definition: A portion of phloem (PO:0005417) tissue that develops from a vascular cambium (PO:0005598).
PO:0005043.label: secondary phloem

PO:0006069.definition: A portion of parenchyma (PO:0005421) tissue that is part of a petal (PO:0009032).
PO:0006069.label: petal parenchyma

PO:0005047.definition: A portion of periderm tissue (PO:0005046) that is part of a root (PO:0009005).
PO:0005047.label: root periderm

PO:0025560.definition: A portion of root exarch protoxylem (PO:0025555) tissue in which the primary xylem (PO:0005849) of the root system (PO:0025025) has three protoxylem strands or poles, and differentiation progresses centripetally, with the oldest elements (protoxylem) farthest from the center of the plant axis (PO:0025004).
PO:0025560.label: triarch protoxylem

PO:0025176.definition: A shoot axis trichome that is part of a stem epidermis.
PO:0025176.label: stem trichome

PO:0000400.definition: A cambial initial cell (PO:0000295) which is destined to differentiate into secondary phloem.
PO:0000400.label: phloem mother cell

PO:0019022.definition: A cardinal part of multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025498) that is a fleshy outgrowth of a seed (PO:0009010).
PO:0019022.label: arilloid

PO:0025177.definition: A shoot axis trichome that is part of a branch epidermis.
PO:0025177.label: branch trichome

PO:0025349.definition: A cardinal organ part that is a slender, more or less straight and stiff, fine-pointed, terminal or subterminal appendage of a glume, lemma, or palea.
PO:0025349.label: awn

PO:0030109.definition: A berry fruit (PO:0030108) which develops from a superior gynoecium (PO:0009062) and at maturity comprises a thickened exocarp (PO:0009085), thickened mesocarp (PO:0009087), and endocarp (PO:0009086), and has as parts juice sacs (PO:0006013) on a carpel adaxial epidermis (PO:0025618).
PO:0030109.label: hesperidium fruit

PO:0025287.definition: A coleoptile (PO:0020033) that is part of a whole plant (PO:0000003) in the seedling development stage (PO:0007131).
PO:0025287.label: seedling coleoptile

PO:0030108.definition: A fruit (PO:0009001) which at maturity comprises a fleshy endocarp (PO:0009086), fleshy mesocarp (PO:0009087), and fleshy exocarp (PO:0009085).
PO:0030108.label: berry fruit

PO:0006089.synonyms: \u846f\u539f\u57fa(\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09 (Japanese;exact);portion of anther primordium tissue (exact);primordio de la antera (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006089.definition: A floral structure primordium (PO:0025477) that is committed to the development of an anther (PO:0009066).
PO:0006089.label: anther primordium

PO:0025133.definition: A canal that is part of a petiole.
PO:0025133.label: petiole canal

PO:0006081.definition: A root apical meristem (PO:0020147) that gives rise to a primary root (PO:0020127).
PO:0006081.label: primary root apical meristem

PO:0006083.synonyms: portion of adaxial protoderm tissue (exact);\u5411\u8ef8\u5074\u524d\u8868\u76ae (Japanese;exact);protodermis adaxial (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006083.definition: A portion of protoderm (PO:0006210) tissue that is the outermost layer of the shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148), and gives rise to the leaf adaxial epidermis (PO:0006018).
PO:0006083.label: adaxial protoderm

PO:0006082.synonyms: protodermis abaxial (Spanish;exact);portion of abaxial protoderm tissue (exact);\u80cc\u8ef8\u5074\u524d\u8868\u76ae (Japanese;exact)
PO:0006082.definition: A portion of protoderm (PO:0006210) tissue that is the outermost layer of the shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148), and gives rise to the leaf abaxial epidermis (PO:0006019).
PO:0006082.label: abaxial protoderm

PO:0006085.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) that gives rise to a root (PO:0009005).
PO:0006085.label: root meristem

PO:0006084.definition: Tissue consisting of tracheids and parenchyma cells, associated with the vascular bundle.
PO:0006084.label: portion of transfusion tissue

PO:0025056.definition: A portion of tuber cortex that is part of an aerial tuber storage parenchyma.
PO:0025056.label: aerial tuber cortex

PO:0020099.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that is the larger cell of a microgametophyte (PO:0025280) in seed plants. It does not divide further and develops into a pollen tube cell (PO:0025195).
PO:0020099.label: microgametophyte vegetative cell

PO:0025495.definition: A lateral root (PO:0025495) that develops from a non-pericyclic lateral root primordium (PO:0025493).
PO:0025495.label: non-pericyclic lateral root

PO:0025170.definition: A prickle (PO:0025169) that is part of a root (PO:0009005)
PO:0025170.label: root prickle

PO:0030104.definition: A fruit (PO:0009001) which develops from a gynoecium (PO:0009062) and at maturity comprises a dry exocarp (PO:0009085), dry mesocarp (PO:0009087), and dry endocarp (PO:0009086) that are fused to a seed coat (PO:0009088).
PO:0030104.label: caryopsis fruit

PO:0030024.synonyms: c&#233lula apical del eje del epiblasto vascualr (Spanish;exact);vascular shoot axis apical initial (exact);\u7dad\u7ba1\u675f\u3092\u6301\u3064\u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u8ef8\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54\u306e\u9802\u7aef\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);vascular shoot axis apical cell (exact);fern shoot axis apical cell (exact)
PO:0030024.definition: A shoot axis meristematic apical cell at the tip of a shoot apex in a shoot system that has as part vascular tissue.
PO:0030024.label: vascular shoot axis meristematic apical cell

PO:0025078.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) at the interface between two plant structures, one of which is in a gametophyte development stage (PO:0028003) and one of which is in a sporophyte development stage (PO:0028002), and that has as parts transfer cells (PO:0000078).
PO:0025078.label: placenta
