PO:0025497.definition: A plant structure (PO:0009011) that is a proper part of a whole plant (PO:0000003) and includes two or more adjacent plant organs (PO:0009008) or adjacent cardinal organ parts (PO:0025001), along with any associated portions of plant tissue (PO:0009007).
PO:0025497.label: collective plant structure

PO:0004723.definition: A phyllome vascular system (PO:0025206) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a sepal (PO:0009031).
PO:0004723.label: sepal vascular system

PO:0030114.definition: A pedicel (PO:0030112) that bears a fruit (PO:0009001).
PO:0030114.label: fruit pedicel

PO:0025496.definition: A plant structure (PO:0009011) that has as parts two or more portions of plant tissue (PO:0009007) of at least two different types and which through specific morphogenetic processes forms a single structural unit demarcated by primarily bona-fide boundaries from other structural units of different types.
PO:0025496.label: multi-tissue plant structure

PO:0025270.definition: A locule (PO:0025263) that is a cavity in a fruit (PO:0009001) and develops from a plant ovary locule (PO:0025266).
PO:0025270.label: fruit locule

PO:0020128.definition: A phyllome margin (PO:0025018) that is part of a leaf (PO:0025034).
PO:0020128.label: leaf margin

PO:0030101.definition: A legume fruit (PO:0030100) which at maturity separates into indehiscent, one-seeded segments.
PO:0030101.label: loment fruit

PO:0020096.definition: A cardinal organ part that has as parts an egg cell and two synergids and is located at the micropylar end of the embryo sac.
PO:0020096.label: egg apparatus

PO:0025054.definition: A portion of tuber pith (PO:0025052) that is part of an aerial tuber storage parenchyma (PO:0025039).
PO:0025054.label: aerial tuber pith

PO:0025498.synonyms: parte cardinal de estructura vegetal con m&#250ltiples tejidos (Spanish;exact);\u8907\u6570\u306e\u7d44\u7e54\u304b\u3089\u306a\u308b\u690d\u7269\u69cb\u9020\u306e\u57fa\u672c\uff08\u4e3b\u8981\uff09\u90e8\u5206 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025498.definition: A plant structure (PO:0009011) that is a proper part of a multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025496) and includes portions of plant tissues (PO:0009007) of at least two different types.
PO:0025498.label: cardinal part of multi-tissue plant structure

PO:0006012.definition: A thin band of intercalary meristematic tissue at the junction of a leaf blade (lamina) and a leaf sheath found in grasses.
PO:0006012.label: leaf collar

PO:0006013.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) which is composed of highly vacuolated cells forming closely-packed, club-shaped sacs with long slender stalks and containing juice.
PO:0006013.label: juice sac tissue

PO:0006010.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) which is formed by the division of a male archesporial cell (PO:0006014), and is part of the anther wall primary parietal cell layer (PO:0006006).
PO:0006010.label: primary parietal cell

PO:0006011.definition: An unbranched second order leaf vein (PO:0020140) that runs between two adjacent primary leaf veins (PO:0025413).
PO:0006011.label: lateral leaf vein

PO:0006016.synonyms: foliage leaf epidermis (exact);epidermis de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u8868\u76ae (Japanese;exact);phyllid epidermis (exact)
PO:0006016.definition: A portion of phyllome epidermis (PO:0025157) that is part of a leaf (PO:0025034).
PO:0006016.label: leaf epidermis

PO:0030103.definition: A fruit (PO:0009001) which develops from a carpel (PO:0009030) and at maturity comprises a fleshy exocarp (PO:0009085), fleshy mesocarp (PO:0009087), and a stony endocarp (PO:0009086).
PO:0030103.label: drupe fruit

PO:0006014.synonyms: c&#233lula masculina arquesporial (Spanish;exact);\u96c4\u6027\u80de\u539f\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);male archesporial initial (exact);anther archesporial cell (narrow)
PO:0006014.definition: An archesporial cell (PO:0030056) that is part of a microsporangium (PO:0025202) and divides to gives rise to a microsporocyte (PO:0020047).
PO:0006014.label: male archesporial cell

PO:0006015.synonyms: c&#233lula femenina arquesporial (Spanish;exact);\u96cc\u80de\u539f\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);female archesporial initial (exact);ovule archesporial cell (narrow)
PO:0006015.definition: An archesporial cell (PO:0030056) that is part of a megasporangium (PO:0025201) and divides to give rise to a megasporocyte (PO:0000431).
PO:0006015.label: female archesporial cell

PO:0006018.definition: A portion of leaf epidermis (PO:0006016) that covers the adaxial/upper surface of a leaf.
PO:0006018.label: leaf adaxial epidermis

PO:0000272.definition: A portion of primary xylem (PO:0000272) tissue that has as part one or more protoxylem tracheary elements (PO:0025575) embedded in parenchyma (PO:0005421) tissue.
PO:0000272.label: protoxylem

PO:0025274.definition: A portion of shoot axis procambium gives rise to the primary vascular tissue of a branch.
PO:0025274.label: branch procambium

PO:0006333.synonyms: portion of seed chalaza (exact);\u7a2e\u5b50 \u30ab\u30e9\u30b6 (Japanese;exact);calaza de la semilla (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006333.definition: A remnant of the ovular chalaza that is part of the seed.
PO:0006333.label: seed chalaza

PO:0025201.definition: A sporangium in which megaspores are produced.
PO:0025201.label: megasporangium

PO:0025202.definition: A sporangium (PO:0025094) in which microspores (PO:0020048) are produced.
PO:0025202.label: microsporangium

PO:0025203.definition: A vascular bundle (PO:0005020) that is part of a pericarp (PO:0009084).
PO:0025203.label: pericarp vascular bundle

PO:0025204.definition: A shoot axis internode (PO:0005005) that is part of a rhizome (PO:0004542).
PO:0025204.label: rhizome internode

PO:0025205.synonyms: sistema vascular del sistema del epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact);\u30b7\u30e5\u30fc\u30c8\u7cfb\u7dad\u7ba1\u7cfb (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025205.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that is part of a shoot system (PO:0009006).
PO:0025205.label: shoot system vascular system

PO:0025206.definition: A vascular system (PO:0000034) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a phyllome (PO:0006001).
PO:0025206.label: phyllome vascular system

PO:0006334.definition: A plant anatomical space that is enclosed by and forms an opening in a seed coat at the apex of a seed and is the remnant of a micropyle.
PO:0006334.label: seed micropyle

PO:0025208.definition: A phyllome trichome that is part of a bract epidermis.
PO:0025208.label: carpel trichome

PO:0025209.definition: A phyllome trichome that is part of a stamen epidermis.
PO:0025209.label: stamen trichome

PO:0006339.definition: A vascular leaf that is distinct from adult leaves, being characterized by particular anatomical traits namely, wax and trichome distribution, presence or absence of epidermal cell types, cell wall shape and biochemistry.
PO:0006339.label: juvenile vascular leaf

PO:0006338.definition: A vascular leaf that is part of a plant embryo and is one of the first few leaves to develop from the embryonic shoot apical meristem.
PO:0006338.label: embryo leaf

PO:0004704.synonyms: sepal primordia (exact;plural);\u304c\u304f\u7247\u539f\u57fa\uff08\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09  (Japanese;exact);portion of sepal primordium tissue (exact);primordio de s&#233palo (Spanish;exact)
PO:0004704.definition: A phyllome primordium (PO:0025128) that develops from a sepal anlagen (PO:0025485) and is committed to the development of a sepal (PO:0009031).
PO:0004704.label: sepal primordium

PO:0004705.synonyms: primordio de estambre (Spanish;exact);\u96c4\u854a\u539f\u57fa\uff08\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09 (Japanese;exact);stamen primordia (exact;plural);portion of stamen primordium tissue (exact)
PO:0004705.definition: A phyllome primordium (PO:0025128) that develops from a stamen anlagen (PO:0025486) and is committed to the development of a stamen (PO:0009029).
PO:0004705.label: stamen primordium

PO:0004707.definition: A dehiscence zone (PO:0025092) that is part of a fruit.
PO:0004707.label: fruit dehiscence zone

PO:0004700.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) directly internal to an anther wall endothecium (PO:0020002) that develops from an anther wall secondary parietal cell layer (PO:0006007).
PO:0004700.label: anther wall middle layer

PO:0004701.definition: Shoot system in which the internodes elongate little or at all, bearing reproductive structures and/or leaves.
PO:0004701.label: short shoot

PO:0004702.definition: Shoot system in which all or most of the internodes elongate.
PO:0004702.label: long shoot

PO:0004703.synonyms: \u5fc3\u76ae\u539f\u57fa(\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09 (Japanese;exact);portion of carpel primordium tissue (exact);primordio de carpelo (Spanish;exact);carpel primordia (exact;plural)
PO:0004703.definition: A phyllome primordium (PO:0025128) that develops from a carpel anlagen (PO:0006005) and is committed to the development of a carpel (PO:0009030).
PO:0004703.label: carpel primordium

PO:0004708.definition: A stem node (PO:0020141) that is part of a plant embryo axis (PO:0019018) where the scutellum (PO:0020110) is attached.
PO:0004708.label: scutellar node

PO:0004709.definition: A bud (PO:0000055) that develops from an axillary bud meristem (PO:0000232).
PO:0004709.label: axillary bud

PO:0000061.synonyms: c&#233lula inicial del caliptra de la ra&#237z lateral (Spanish;exact);lateral root-cap epidermal initial (exact);lateral root-cap-epidermal stem cell (exact);\u5074\u6839\u51a0\u8868\u76ae\u59cb\u539f\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000061.definition: A root initial cell that produces lateral root-cap cells and root epidermis.
PO:0000061.label: lateral root-cap epidermal initial cell

PO:0000060.synonyms: root cortex-endodermis initial (exact);c&#233lula inicial del cortex/endodermis de la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);root cortex-endodermis stem cell (exact);\u6839\u76ae\u5c64\u5185\u76ae\u59cb\u539f\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000060.definition: A root initial cell that produces root cortex and endodermis. In direct contact with quiescent center.
PO:0000060.label: root cortex-endodermis initial cell

PO:0000063.synonyms: leaf procambium cell (exact);c&#233lula procambial de la hoja (Spanish;exact);dispersed meristematic cell (exact);DMC (exact);\u8449\u524d\u5f62\u6210\u5c64\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000063.definition: A procambial cell (PO:0025258) that is part of a leaf procambium (PO:0025259).
PO:0000063.label: leaf procambial cell

PO:0000062.definition: An epidermal initial cell (PO:0000349) that undergoes several rounds of uneven division, each time giving rise to a larger daughter cell that differentiates into an epidermal ground cell and a smaller daughter cell that remains meristematic, until the meristematic cell (PO:0004010) differentiates into a guard mother cell (PO:0000351).
PO:0000062.label: stomatal initial cell

PO:0025045.synonyms: peridermis de tub&#233rculo subterr&#225neo (Spanish;exact);\u5730\u4e0b\u584a\u830e \u5468\u76ae (Japanese;exact);mature potato tuber skin (narrow)
PO:0025045.definition: A portion of tuber periderm that is part of a subterranean tuber.
PO:0025045.label: subterranean tuber periderm

PO:0025228.definition: A cardinal organ part that is a part of a plant structure that splits apart when the structure dehisces.
PO:0025228.label: valve

PO:0000067.definition: A root (PO:0009005) that forms one or more clusters of closely spaced lateral roots (PO:0020121) of limited growth along its length.
PO:0000067.label: proteoid root

PO:0000066.definition: A parenchyma cell of the mesophyll of a hydathode found between the xylem endings and the epidermis.
PO:0000066.label: epithem cell

PO:0020094.definition: A gamete (PO:0025006) produced by an archegonium (PO:0025126) or an embryo sac (PO:0025074).
PO:0020094.label: plant egg cell

PO:0025229.synonyms: valva de la c&#225psula de musgo (Spanish;exact);\u30b3\u30b1\u985e\u3000\u84b4\uff08\u3055\u304f\uff09\u5f01 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025229.definition: A valve that is a part of a spore capsule that splits apart when the spore capsule dehisces.
PO:0025229.label: spore capsule valve

PO:0005028.definition: A shoot system vascular system  (PO:0025205) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in an inflorescence (PO:0009049).
PO:0005028.label: inflorescence vascular system

PO:0020075.definition: A cardinal part of multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025498) which is one carpellate unit of a schizocarp fruit (PO:0030098) consisting of pericarp (PO:0009084) and one or more seeds (PO:0009010).
PO:0020075.label: mericarp

PO:0025226.definition: An axil that is the space between a shoot axis and a branch that branches from the shoot axis.
PO:0025226.label: branch axil

PO:0005029.synonyms: primordio de ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);root primordia (exact;plural);\u6839\u539f\u57fa\uff08\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09  (Japanese;exact);portion of root primordium tissue (exact)
PO:0005029.definition: A primordium (PO:0025127) that develops from a root anlagen (PO:0025433) and is committed to the development of a root (PO:0009005).
PO:0005029.label: root primordium

PO:0025320.synonyms: wurtzelhalsrhizoid (exact);collar rhizoid (exact);rizoide del nodo del cotiled&#243n (Spanish;exact);\u5b50\u8449\u7bc0\u4eee\u6839 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025320.definition: An epidermal rhizoid that grows form a cotyledonary node.
PO:0025320.label: cotyledonary node rhizoid

PO:0025519.synonyms: crena de la l\xe1mina de la hoja (Spanish;exact);leaf lamina crenae (exact;plural);\u8449\u8eab\u920d\u92f8\u6b6f (Japanese;exact);leaf lamina scallop (exact);leaf lamina crenule (narrow)
PO:0025519.definition: A phyllome lamina crena (PO:0025516) that is a rounded projection on a leaf margin (PO:0020128) for which the corresponding leaf sinus (PO:0025384) extends less than one quarter of the distance to the center of the long axis of the leaf lamina (PO:0020039).
PO:0025519.label: leaf lamina crena

PO:0006310.definition: A small staminate flower (PO:0025600) that is part of a tassel spikelet (PO:0006309).
PO:0006310.label: tassel floret

PO:0006005.definition: A phyllome anlagen (PO:0025430) that will give rise to a carpel primordium (PO:0004703) and is part of a peripheral zone (PO:000225) of a flower meristem (PO:0000229).
PO:0006005.label: carpel anlagen

PO:0025413.definition: A leaf lamina vein (PO:0020138) that connects directly to a petiole vascular system (PO:0000052) or a shoot axis vascular system (PO:0000039).
PO:0025413.label: primary leaf vein

PO:0025224.definition: A plant anatomical space that is the space between a shoot axis and a leaf, bract, or branch that branches from the shoot axis.
PO:0025224.label: axil

PO:0025225.definition: An axil that is the space between a shoot axis and a bract that branches from the shoot axis.
PO:0025225.label: bract axil

PO:0025059.definition: Any portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) other than epidermis (PO:0005679) or vascular tissue (PO:0009015).
PO:0025059.label: portion of ground tissue

PO:0025058.definition: A portion of parenchyma (PO:0005421) that is the outer layer of the pith (PO:0006109).
PO:0025058.label: perimedullary zone

PO:0020029.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) which is an outgrowth of the funicle, that forms a bridge between the micropyle and other tissues.
PO:0020029.label: obturator

PO:0020028.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is the part of a plant ovule (PO:0020003) on the opposite side from a raphe (PO:0020027).
PO:0020028.label: antiraphe

PO:0025055.definition: A portion of cortex (PO:0005708) that is part of a tuber storage parenchyma (PO:0025036).
PO:0025055.label: tuber cortex

PO:0006315.definition: A tassel floret that is the lower of the two florets of a sessile spikelet of a tassel inflorescence.
PO:0006315.label: lower floret of sessile spikelet of tassel

PO:0025057.synonyms: Outer storage tissue (exact);corteza del tub&#233rculo subterr&#225neo (Spanish;exact);\u5730\u4e0b\u584a\u830e \u76ae\u5c64 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025057.definition: A portion of tuber cortex that is part of a subterranean tuber storage parenchyma.
PO:0025057.label: subterranean tuber cortex

PO:0020024.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) which is composed of cells of the inner epidermis of the inner (or only) integument of the ovule that are radially elongated and metabolically very active.
PO:0020024.label: endothelium

PO:0020023.definition: An integument (PO:0020021) which is one of the two layers of tissue that usually cover the ovule, contiguous to the inner integument and usually involved in forming the micropyle at the apex.
PO:0020023.label: outer integument

PO:0025050.definition: An interfascicular region that is part of a tuber storage parenchyma.
PO:0025050.label: tuber interfascicular region

PO:0020021.synonyms: integumento (Spanish;exact);\u73e0\u76ae (Japanese;exact);portion of integument tissue (exact);Zea integument (narrow);Poaceae integument (narrow)
PO:0020021.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that usually covers a plant ovule (PO:0020003), enveloping a nucellus (PO:0020020) and forming a micropyle (PO:0020025) at the apex.
PO:0020021.label: integument

PO:0025052.definition: A portion of pith (PO:0006109) that is part of a tuber storage parenchyma (PO:0025036).
PO:0025052.label: tuber pith

PO:0025114.synonyms: eje de cuarto orden de la infructescencia (Spanish;exact);third order infructescence branch (exact)
PO:0025114.definition: A higher order infructescence axis (PO:0025243) which arises from a third order infructescence axis (PO:0025113) and develops from a fourth order inflorescence axis (PO:0025105).
PO:0025114.label: fourth order infructescence axis

PO:0005022.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is composed of plant ovary abaxial (outer) epidermis (PO:0005023), plant ovary adaxial (inner) epidermis (PO:0005024), and a plant ovary wall middle layer (PO:0005025)
PO:0005022.label: plant ovary wall

PO:0025116.synonyms: eje de sexto orden de la infructescencia (Spanish;exact);fifth order infructescence branch (exact)
PO:0025116.definition: A higher order infructescence axis (PO:0025243) which arises from a fifth order infructescence axis (PO:0025115) and develops from a sixth order inflorescence axis (PO:0025107).
PO:0025116.label: sixth order infructescence axis

PO:0025117.definition: An anatomical space that is part of a plant.
PO:0025117.label: plant anatomical space

PO:0025110.synonyms: eighth order inflorescence branch (exact);eje de noveno orden de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025110.definition: A higher order inflorescence axis (PO:0009081) that develops from an inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009105) of a eighth order inflorescence axis (PO:0025110).
PO:0025110.label: ninth order inflorescence axis

PO:0025111.synonyms: eje de d\xe9cimo orden de la inflorescencia (Spanish;exact);ninth order inflorescence branch (exact)
PO:0025111.definition: A higher order inflorescence axis (PO:0009081) that develops from an inflorescence axillary meristem (PO:0009105) of a ninth order inflorescence axis (PO:0025110).
PO:0025111.label: tenth order inflorescence axis

PO:0025112.synonyms: primary infructescence branch (exact);eje de segundo de la infructescencia (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025112.definition: A higher order infructescence axis (PO:0025243) which arises from a first order infructescence axis (PO:0025244) and develops from a second order inflorescence axis (PO:0006321).
PO:0025112.label: second order infructescence axis

PO:0005023.definition: A portion of ovary epidermis (PO:0006063) which is the outer surface of a plant ovary (PO:0009072)..
PO:0005023.label: plant ovary abaxial epidermis

PO:0025297.definition: A radicle (PO:0020031) that is part of a whole plant (PO:0000003) in the seedling development stage (PO:0007131).
PO:0025297.label: seedling radicle

PO:0025296.definition: A radicle (PO:0020031) that is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0025296.label: plant embryo radicle

PO:0025295.definition: A mesocotyl (PO:0020037) that develops from an embryo mesocotyl (PO:0025294).
PO:0025295.label: seedling mesocotyl

PO:0025294.definition: A mesocotyl (PO:0020037) that is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0025294.label: embryo mesocotyl

PO:0025293.definition: An epicotyl (PO:0020035) that is part of a whole plant (PO:0000003) in the seedling development stage (PO:0007131).
PO:0025293.label: seedling epicotyl

PO:0025292.definition: An epicotyl (PO:0020035) that is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0025292.label: embryo epicotyl

PO:0025291.definition: A hypocotyl (PO:0020100) that is part of a whole plant (PO:0000003) in the seedling development stage (PO:0007131).
PO:0025291.label: seedling hypocotyl

PO:0025290.definition: A hypocotyl (PO:0020100) that is part of a plant embryo axis (PO:0019018).
PO:0025290.label: embryo hypocotyl

PO:0025494.definition: A lateral root (PO:0025495) that develops from a pericyclic lateral root primordium (PO:0025492).
PO:0025494.label: pericyclic lateral root

PO:0000018.synonyms: primordio de &#243vulo (Spanish;exact);portion of ovule primordium tissue (exact);\u80da\u73e0\u539f\u57fa\uff08\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09 (Japanese;exact)
PO:0000018.definition: A floral structure primordium (PO:0025477) that is committed to the development of an ovule (PO:0020003).
PO:0000018.label: ovule primordium

PO:0020038.definition: A stalk (PO:0025066) of a vascular leaf (PO:0009025).
PO:0020038.label: petiole

PO:0030096.definition: A capsule fruit (PO:0030091) which at maturity dehisces through the release of a fruit operculum (PO:0025298).
PO:0030096.label: circumscissile capsule fruit

PO:0025590.definition: A portion of pith (PO:0006109) that is part of a receptacle (PO:0009064).
PO:0025590.label: receptacle pith

PO:0025591.definition: A portion of cortex (PO:0005708) that is part of a receptacle (PO:0009064).
PO:0025591.label: receptacle cortex

PO:0025619.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is the edge of a laminar portion of a leaf sheath (PO:0020104) and the area immediately internally adjacent to it.
PO:0025619.label: leaf sheath margin

PO:0025593.definition: A shoot-borne root (PO:0000042) that arises from a shoot axis internode (PO:0005005).
PO:0025593.label: shoot-borne internode root

PO:0025594.definition: A portion of meristem tissue (PO:0009013) that gives rise to a portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059).
PO:0025594.label: ground meristem

PO:0025595.definition: A ground meristem (PO:0025594) that gives rise to a portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) in the shoot system (PO:0009006).
PO:0025595.label: shoot system ground meristem

PO:0025596.definition: A ground meristem (PO:0025594) that gives rise to a portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) in the root system (PO:0025025).
PO:0025596.label: root system ground meristem

PO:0025597.definition: An infructescence (PO:0006342) in Zea species that bears kernels (i.e. caryopsis fruit; PO:0030104) on a compact ear infructescence axis (PO:0025623) and develops from the ear inflorescence (PO:0020136).
PO:0025597.label: ear infructescence

PO:0025598.definition: An inflorescence (PO:0009049) that includes as part only pistillate flowers (PO:0025599).
PO:0025598.label: pistillate inflorescence

PO:0025612.definition: A portion of shoot axis cortex (PO:0000223) that is part of a stem (PO:0009047).
PO:0025612.label: stem cortex

PO:0025611.definition: A portion of shoot axis tegument layer (PO:0025609) that a tough, protective outer layer on a stem (PO:0009047) and includes as parts a stem hypodermis (PO:0025610) and a stem epidermis (PO:0025178).
PO:0025611.label: stem tegument layer

PO:0025610.definition: A portion of hypodermis (PO:0005051) that is part of a stem cortex (PO:0025612).
PO:0025610.label: stem hypodermis

PO:0000199.definition: A portion of endosperm (PO:0009089) in which the first karyokinesis event is accompanied by cytokinesis.
PO:0000199.label: cellular endosperm

PO:0000198.definition: A portion of endosperm (PO:0009089) tissue in which at least the first karyokinesis is not followed by cytokinesis.
PO:0000198.label: free nuclear endosperm

PO:0025615.definition: A collective leaf structure (PO:0025022) consisting of a group of rosette leaves (PO:0000014), generally borne at the base of the plant, that are separated by very short stem internodes (PO:0020142).
PO:0025615.label: rosette

PO:0025614.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) which is a small ball of cells born on a thallus (PO:0030027) and is involved in asexual reproduction.
PO:0025614.label: gemma

PO:0025378.definition: An arilloid that is an elaborate outgrowth of a seed at the micropylar end.
PO:0025378.label: arillode

PO:0025217.synonyms: complejo estom&#225tico del carpelo (Spanish;exact);carpel epidermal stomatal complex (exact);\u5fc3\u76ae\u6c17\u5b54\u88c5\u7f6e (Japanese;exact);carpel epidermis stomatal complex (exact)
PO:0025217.definition: A phyllome stomatal complex that is part of a carpel.
PO:0025217.label: carpel stomatal complex

PO:0025005.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is the edge of a plant organ (PO:0009008) and the area immediately internally adjacent to it.
PO:0025005.label: plant organ margin

PO:0025216.synonyms: bract epidermis stomatal complex (exact);bract epidermal stomatal complex (exact);complejo estom&#225tico de la br&#225ctea (Spanish;exact);\u82de\u6c17\u5b54\u88c5\u7f6e (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025216.definition: A phyllome stomatal complex (PO:0025215) that is part of a bract (PO:0009055).
PO:0025216.label: bract stomatal complex

PO:0000245.definition: In monosporic and bisporic megasporogenesis: the megaspore(s) that would not participate in megagametogenesis.
PO:0000245.label: degenerate megaspore

PO:0004725.synonyms: lado abaxial del primordio de hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u539f\u57fa\u306e\u88cf\u5074\u3001\u80cc\u8ef8\u5074 (Japanese;exact)  (exact)
PO:0004725.definition: A portion of vascular leaf primordium (PO:0000017) that is distal to the axis of the shoot apical meristem (PO:0020148) and develops into the abaxial side of the leaf lamina (PO:0020039).
PO:0004725.label: vascular leaf primordium abaxial side

PO:0020039.definition: A phyllome lamina (PO:0025396) that is the part of a leaf (PO:0025034) exclusive of the petiole (PO:0020038) or leaf sheath (PO:0020104), if either is present.
PO:0020039.label: leaf lamina

PO:0006344.synonyms: \u830e\u5074\u5206\u88c2\u7d44\u7e54 (Japanese;exact);shoot lateral growth meristem (exact);meristema lateral del epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish;exact)
PO:0006344.definition: A lateral meristem (PO:0020145) that is part of a shoot axis (PO:0025029).
PO:0006344.label: shoot lateral meristem

PO:0000244.definition: A megaspore(s) that forms an embryo sac.
PO:0000244.label: functional megaspore

PO:0025473.definition: A portion of reaction wood (PO:0025472) found on the lower side of a shoot axis (PO:0025029) that is or was angled away from vertical and that has as parts heavily lignified tracheids (PO:0000301) with a specialized S2 layer that contains more lignin and has a larger (more horizontal) microfibril angle.
PO:0025473.label: compression wood

PO:0025472.definition: A portion of secondary xylem (PO:0005848) found on either the upper or lower side of a shoot axis (PO:0025029) that is or was angled away from vertical, with anatomical characteristics that depend on whether it is compression wood (PO:0025473) or tension wood (PO:0025474).
PO:0025472.label: reaction wood

PO:0020058.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) which is diploid nutritive tissue in an angiosperm seed derived from nucellar tissue.
PO:0020058.label: perisperm

PO:0025470.definition: A cotyledon (PO:0020030) that is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0025470.label: plant embryo cotyledon

PO:0025477.synonyms: primordio de organo floral (Spanish;exact);portion of floral structure primordium tissue (exact);\u82b1\u5668\u5b98\u539f\u57fa (Japanese;exact);floral structure primordia (exact;plural)
PO:0025477.definition: A primordium (PO:0025127) that is committed to the development of a floral organ (PO:0025395) and is part of a reproductive shoot apex (PO:0025222).
PO:0025477.label: floral organ primordium

PO:0025476.definition: A root (PO:0009005) that develops from a tuberous root (PO:0025523) and is further radially enlarged for storage.
PO:0025476.label: tuberous root tuber

PO:0025586.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that is part of the phyllome anlagen (PO:0025430).
PO:0025586.label: phyllome founder cell

PO:0030085.definition: A portion of ground tissue (PO:0025059) that is the tissue internal to an amphithecium early in sporangium development.
PO:0030085.label: protosporangium endothecium

PO:0025213.synonyms: c&#233lula de pavimento de la superficie abaxial de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u80cc\u8ef8\u5074\u88ab\u84cb\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025213.definition: A leaf pavement cell that is part of a leaf abaxial epidermis.
PO:0025213.label: leaf abaxial pavement cell

PO:0025479.synonyms: portion of basal root primordium tissue (exact);primordio basal de la ra&#237z (Spanish;exact);\u4e0b\u80da\u8ef8\u7531\u6765\u306e\u6839\u306e\u539f\u57fa(\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09\u3001\u4e0d\u5b9a\u6839\u539f\u57fa(\u53ef\u8996\u7684\uff09  (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025479.definition: A root primordium (PO:0005029) that is committed to the development of a basal root (PO:0025002).
PO:0025479.label: basal root primordium

PO:0020051.definition: Stipule-like appendage(s) at the base of a leaflet (in unifoliolate or simple leaves, found at the top of the petiole).
PO:0020051.label: stipel

PO:0020056.synonyms: \u5185\u7a2e\u5b50(internal seed coat;inner seed coat;secundine) (Japanese;exact);tegmen (Spanish;exact);portion of tegmen tissue (exact)
PO:0020056.definition: That part of the seed coat that develops from the inner integument.
PO:0020056.label: tegmen

PO:0030086.synonyms: c&#233lula subapical inicial del protonema (Spanish;exact);protonema sub-apical initial (exact);\u539f\u7cf8\u4f53\u6b21\u9802\u7aef\u59cb\u539f\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact)
PO:0030086.definition: An initial cell that is produced by longitudinal division of a sub-apical cell of a protonema.
PO:0030086.label: protonema sub-apical initial cell

PO:0020054.definition: A scale leaf that surrounds a dormant or perennating bud.
PO:0020054.label: bud scale leaf

PO:0025212.definition: An epidermal pavement cell that is part of a leaf epidermis.
PO:0025212.label: leaf pavement cell

PO:0025183.synonyms: leaf epidermal stomatal complex (exact);complejo estom&#225tico de la hoja (Spanish;exact);leaf epidermis stomatal complex (exact);\u8449\u6c17\u5b54\u88c5\u7f6e (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025183.definition: A phyllome stomatal complex (PO:0025215) that is part of a leaf.
PO:0025183.label: leaf stomatal complex

PO:0025182.definition: A phyllome trichome that is part of a sepal epidermis.
PO:0025182.label: sepal trichome

PO:0025181.definition: A plant axis elongation zone (PO:0025180) that is part of a root tip (PO:0000025) and located proximal to a root apical meristem (PO:0020147).
PO:0025181.label: root elongation zone

PO:0025180.synonyms: zona de elongaci&#243n del eje de la planta (Spanish;exact);\u690d\u7269\u8ef8\u4f38\u9577\u5e2f (Japanese;exact)
PO:0025180.definition: A cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) which is part of a plant axis (PO:0025004), is located proximal to an apical meristem (PO:0020144), and in which plant cells (PO:0009002) are undergoing longitudinal expansion.
PO:0025180.label: plant axis elongation zone

PO:0025187.definition: A phyllome trichome that is part of a petal epidermis.
PO:0025187.label: petal trichome

PO:0025186.definition: A trichome that is part of a phyllome epidermis.
PO:0025186.label: phyllome trichome

PO:0025185.synonyms: leaf lamina epidermal stomatal complex (exact);complejo estom&#225tico de la l&#225mina de la hoja (Spanish;exact);\u8449\u8eab\u6c17\u5b54\u88c5\u7f6e (Japanese;exact);leaf lamina epidermis stomatal complex (exact)
PO:0025185.definition: A leaf stomatal complex that is part of a leaf lamina.
PO:0025185.label: leaf lamina stomatal complex

PO:0025184.definition: A portion of phyllome epidermis (PO:0025157) that is part of a tepal (PO:0009033).
PO:0025184.label: tepal epidermis

PO:0025330.synonyms: inner operculum (exact);corolla calyptrae (exact;plural);corolline operculum (exact);\u861a\u5e3d\u82b1\u51a0 (Japanese;exact);operculum corolla (exact);caliptra corola (Spanish;exact)
PO:0025330.definition: A fused corolla (PO:0025581) that is composed of fused petals (PO:0025583).
PO:0025330.label: calyptra corolla

PO:0025189.synonyms: petiole epidermal stomatal complex (exact);\u8449\u67c4 \u6c17\u5b54\u88c5\u7f6e (Japanese;exact);complejo estom&#225tico del pec&#237olo (Spanish;exact);petiole epidermis stomatal complex (exact)
PO:0025189.definition: A leaf stomatal complex that is part of a petiole.
PO:0025189.label: petiole stomatal complex

PO:0006341.definition: A shoot system (PO:0009006) that develops from an embryo shoot apical meristem (PO:0006362).
PO:0006341.label: primary shoot system

PO:0025188.definition: A phyllome trichome that is part of a tepal epidermis.
PO:0025188.label: tepal trichome

PO:0025331.definition: A small pistillate flower (PO:0025599) on the margin of a head-type (capitulum) inflorescence  (PO:0009049).
PO:0025331.label: ray flower

PO:0006221.synonyms: c&#233lula del latic&#237fero articulado (Spanish;exact);compound laticifer cell (exact);\u9023\u5408\u4e73\u7ba1\uff08\u6709\u7bc0\u4e73\u7ba1\uff09\u7d30\u80de (Japanese;exact);laticifer member (exact)
PO:0006221.definition: A laticifer cell (PO:0025031) that is joined longitudinally to other articulated laticifer cells to form a tube.
PO:0006221.label: articulated laticifer cell

PO:0009059.definition: A collective phyllome structure (PO:0025023) that is composed of one or more petals (PO:0009032), comprising the inner whorl of non-reproductive floral organs (PO:0025395) and surrounds the androecium (PO:0009061) and the gynoecium (PO:0009062).
PO:0009059.label: corolla

PO:0009058.definition: A collective phyllome structure (PO:0025023) that includes as parts the corolla (PO:0009059) and/or the calyx (PO:0009060); or one or more tepals (PO:0009033).
PO:0009058.label: perianth

PO:0030079.definition: A rhizoid that is part of a protonema and develops from a protonemal side branch rhizoid initial.
PO:0030079.label: protonemal rhizoid

PO:0030078.definition: A plant structure (PO:0009011) that is a uniseriate filament with positive geotropism that grows from an epidermis (PO:0005679) or protonema (PO:0030003).
PO:0030078.label: rhizoid

PO:0006220.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the central region of an endosperm (PO:0009089), composed of cells that are significantly larger than those at the periphery, especially the aleurone and sub-aleurone layers.
PO:0006220.label: central endosperm

PO:0030075.definition: A disk-shaped cardinal organ part (PO:0025001) that is the apical portion of an antheridiophore (PO:0030033) and bears antheridia (PO:0025125).
PO:0030075.label: antheridium head

PO:0030074.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is the internal part of a sporangium (PO:0025094), bounded by the sporangium wall (PO:0025306), and has as parts archesporial cells (PO:0030056).
PO:0030074.label: archesporium

PO:0009090.definition: An arilloid that is an outgrowth of a seed from a seed funicle.
PO:0009090.label: aril

PO:0030076.definition: An umbrella-shaped cardinal organ part that is the apical portion of an archegoniophore and bears archegonia.
PO:0030076.label: archegonium head

PO:0009057.definition: A nectary (PO:0009035), not occurring on a floral organ (PO:0025395) or other part of a flower (PO:0009046).
PO:0009057.label: extrafloral nectary

PO:0009056.definition: A nectary (PO:0009035) occurring on a floral organ (PO:0025395) or other part of a flower (PO:0009046).
PO:0009056.label: flower nectary

PO:0009055.definition: A phyllome that subtends a reproductive structure.
PO:0009055.label: bract

PO:0030072.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that is a single or double strand in the center of a non-vascular leaf (PO:0025075) and has as part hydrome (PO:0030047) or leptome (PO:0030048).
PO:0030072.label: costa

PO:0030005.definition: A portion of protonema tissue that consists of only caulonema cells.
PO:0030005.label: caulonema

PO:0005656.definition: A portion of plant tissue (PO:0009007) that form specialized structures producing a secretion.
PO:0005656.label: portion of secretory tissue

PO:0020097.definition: A spermatogenous cell (PO:0025525) of the microgametophyte (PO:0025280) that divides to produce two pollen sperm cells (PO:0025121).
PO:0020097.label: generative cell

PO:0009029.definition: A microsporophyll bearing one or more microsporangia.
PO:0009029.label: stamen

PO:0025622.definition: A primary xylem vessel member (PO:0025448) that is part of the metaxylem (PO:0000372).
PO:0025622.label: metaxylem vessel member

PO:0025440.definition: A cambial zone that is part of a shoot axis (PO:0025029).
PO:0025440.label: shoot axis cambial zone

PO:0025219.synonyms: complejo estom&#225tico del s&#233palo (Spanish;exact);\u304c\u304f\u7247\u6c17\u5b54\u88c5\u7f6e (Japanese;exact);sepal epidermal stomatal complex (exact);sepal epidermis stomatal complex (exact)
PO:0025219.definition: A phyllome stomatal complex that is part of a sepal.
PO:0025219.label: sepal stomatal complex

PO:0000274.definition: A fiber cell (PO:0025407) that is part of a portion of xylem (PO:0005352) tissue.
PO:0000274.label: xylem fiber cell

PO:0025524.definition: A native plant cell (PO:0025606) that develops from the archegonium central cell (PO:0025509), and lies at the base of the archegonium neck (PO:0030039), above the archegonium egg cell (PO:0025122) in the venter (PO:0030038).
PO:0025524.label: ventral canal cell

PO:0004714.definition: A terminal bud that develops into a flower.
PO:0004714.label: terminal flower bud

PO:0005019.definition: A phyllome vascular system (PO:0025206) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a carpel (PO:0009030).
PO:0005019.label: carpel vascular system

PO:0025364.definition: A branch that is slender and coiling.
PO:0025364.label: branch tendril

PO:0025490.definition: A plant ovule (PO:0020006) that is part of a plant ovary (PO:0009072).
PO:0025490.label: plant ovary ovule

PO:0025461.definition: A secondary xylem tracheary element (PO:0025445) that is part of a portion of early wood (PO:0004515).
PO:0025461.label: early wood tracheary element

PO:0005018.definition: A phyllome vascular system (PO:0025206) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a stamen (PO:0009029).
PO:0005018.label: stamen vascular system

PO:0025239.definition: A petiole canal on the adaxial surface of a petiole.
PO:0025239.label: adaxial petiole canal

PO:0025079.definition: An axillary shoot that develops from an aerial tuber axillary bud.
PO:0025079.label: aerial tuber axillary shoot

PO:0006058.definition: The adaxial/upper epidermal cell layer of the cotyledon.
PO:0006058.label: cotyledon adaxial epidermis

PO:0006056.definition: A leaf epidermis that is part of a cotyledon.
PO:0006056.label: cotyledon epidermis

PO:0006057.definition: The abaxial/lower epidermal cell layer of the cotyledon.
PO:0006057.label: cotyledon abaxial epidermis

PO:0006054.definition: A portion of sepal epidermis that covers the abaxial/lower surface of a sepal.
PO:0006054.label: sepal abaxial epidermis

PO:0006055.definition: A portion of sepal epidermis that covers the adaxial/upper surface of a sepal.
PO:0006055.label: sepal adaxial epidermis

PO:0006052.definition: A portion of petal epidermis that covers the abaxial/lower surface of a petal.
PO:0006052.label: petal abaxial epidermis

PO:0006053.definition: A portion of petal epidermis that covers the adaxial/upper surface of a petal.
PO:0006053.label: petal adaxial epidermis

PO:0006050.definition: A portion of seed coat epidermis (PO:0006048) which is part of the seed coat (PO:0009088), and develops from the outer surface of the outer integument (PO:0020023).
PO:0006050.label: exotesta

PO:0006051.definition: A portion of seed coat epidermis (PO:0006048) which is part of a seed coat (PO:0009088) and develops from the inner epidermis of the outer integument (PO:0020023).
PO:0006051.label: endotesta

PO:0005013.definition: The outermost primary cell layer of the hypocotyl.
PO:0005013.label: hypocotyl epidermis

PO:0005012.definition: A shoot axis vascular system (PO:0000039) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a pedicel (PO:0030112).
PO:0005012.label: pedicel vascular system

PO:0005011.definition: A dehiscence zone (PO:0025092) that is part of an anther (PO:0009066).
PO:0005011.label: anther dehiscence zone

PO:0005010.definition: A septum (PO:0000030) that is part of an anther dehiscence zone (PO:0005011).
PO:0005010.label: anther septum

PO:0005017.definition: A shoot system vascular system (PO:0025205) that includes the totality of the portions of vascular tissue in their specific arrangement in a flower (PO:0009046).
PO:0005017.label: flower vascular system

PO:0005015.definition: A portion of endodermis (PO:0000252) that is part of an plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0005015.label: embryo endodermis

PO:0005014.definition: A portion of cortex (PO:0005708) that is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009).
PO:0005014.label: embryo cortex

PO:0020147.definition: A root meristem (PO:0006085) located at the root tip (PO:0000025), behind the root cap (PO:0020123).
PO:0020147.label: root apical meristem

PO:0000431.definition: A sporocyte (PO:0006204) that produces four haploid (1n) megaspores (PO:0020019).
PO:0000431.label: megasporocyte
